reviews.review: Amazing. The tour was great, jacob the guide was so interesting and fun, a great way to see the city ang get to amazing observation points. We had a great time!

Perfect mix of fun, culture and views!. We went on a two hour private tour. Although not all of us had been on segways before, we felt safe running up and down the hills. The guide David was very interesting and fun! He made the tour a perfect mix of fun, culture and views! He also took a lot of photos which he mailed us, to ensure we had memories of our days in Prague!
Great fun.. Jakub was friendly and an excellent guide. The segways were great fun and a great way to go up the hill to see amazing views of Prague.

Segway tour of Czech Republic. Stan and Robert were amazing. They picked us up from our hotel at 7:30 AM and took us to Karlovy Vary and to other cities within the Czech Republic. Not only were they professional but personable and actually caring. My husband is not as comfortable as I am and our teenage children, however whenever there was a situation that may have made him that much more timid either Stan or Robert were there to encourage him to move along. We have done many Segway tours and found Stan and Robert to be the best guides we have had. We used Pedal Power in Vienna and would never use them again. They could learn about customer service from I LOVE SEGWAY. We returned to our hotel at 9:00 P.M. and all agree this was the best tour that we had.

Excellent segway tour, amazing guide named Clara!. We did an individual tour with a private guide because we wanted to see the more quited places in Prague. We were guided by our guide named Clara. She was an amazing guide and she spoke very good English. She knew a lot about Prague and its history and she was very kind to us. The segway was very good and stable. We went up on a hill trough a park and we had a beautifull view on Prague. At first I was scared for the segway but with Clara's help I had an amazing tour with my son. After the one hour tour we got back in their office and we spoke to the boss. He was a very honest and responsible man.Thank you for the awesome tour, we'll come back here!

Best experience in Prague!. We had a 2-hours trip with the very nice, friendly and professional guide Besim. It was our best adventure in Prague. I am a coward, but I had a very professional coaching and felt very safe during the trip. We were very lucky, because Besim is also a photographer. Somehow he made by IPhone the best photo of me and my husband together for the last 15 years (actually since our weeding day). :) Thanks a lot. Vera

Besi The Best . One of our most memorable days in Europe. Our best experience in Prague. All thanks to our tour guide Besi the best. This Segway company is the best. Highly recommended to have a different experience of Prague.
The best tour in our Prague visit. The ride was very pleasant, the guides Klara and David were exeptionally nice and friendly, the view were just gorgeous !Highly recommended !
A perfect way to meet Prague for the first time 💙. Had an amazing experience with Jacob, as our tour guide. Prague is wonderful by Segway and it's quite a thrilling ride. A must do in my opinion.

Brilliant experience. Took a segway tour for one hour. It was a great experience. I was shown around the area near Petrin Hill by Robert who was an excellent guide. It's a little pricey an event but worth every penny especially if you haven't ridden a segway before. The entire staff is very helpful and you'll pick it up in a jiffy.Go for it!
Amazing Segway tour in Prague!. I Love Segway was a great company and Ivan is a great tour guide. We had an amazing time, thank you Ivan! We highly recommend them if you are looking for Segway tours.

Great Way to See Prague..Great People, Thoughtful Service. Our family (kids all over 18) spent 3 days in Prague, and I Love Segway was one of the highlights of our trip. Conveniently located just behind the John Lennon Wall, we were immediately impressed by the easy to use (and book) mobile website and how flexible and accommodating Stanislav was via email. It couldn't have been easier for us to pick a Segway tour that was tailored to our time frame and touring interests. Stanislav and our guide Besi took time to show us how to ride our Segways before we started, and Besi was very helpful, informative and patient throughout our 2 hour tour of the hills overlooking the city (we picked this route, because it complemented the sites we had already seen). I 100% recommend these guys, and I would certainly take another tour if our travels ever bring us back to Prague. In the category of "icing on the cake" was their offer of paints to use to add our own artwork to the crowdsourced mural that is the John Lennon wall.

Prague on segway. Wonderful experience!!! You will not regret it. I was nervous when my husband suggested segway: a) I dont have a good sense of balance; b) I dont like speed and c) I dont like to fall. Ivan our guide was awesome! He showed me the basic start, stop and turn but best of all was he was caring. He knew I was nervous so he took us slowly at first till I got use to segway. Throughout the trip he would turn to check on me and warned me of bumps etc. Overall it was a fantastic experience. Now I am a segway fan. Thanks to Ivan! He was not only charming, caring but full of interesting information. We learned so much from him. Segway is a beautiful way to see all the beautiful sights in Mala Strana!

Great Tour!. Visited with 2 friends. Arrived to the beautiful John Lennon Wall and were immediately approached: "Here to Segway?" We nodded apprehensively but were quickly ushered into an incredible tour led by a both knowledgable and amiable guide. After paying the modest fee, we spent nearly 2 hours afterwards painting on the John Lennon Wall and grabbing beers nearby with employees. A great tour deserves 5 stars. Feeling at home and being shown a great time deserves much more. I love Segway is worth a visit.
10/10. Not only was the tour such an incredible experience, but what truly separates this place from the others is the friendliness and knowledge of the amazing guides. Klara and David are awesome!

Best Segway tour in Prague. Had a very good time and got a great tour of the city. Would 10/10 recommend it to anyone looking to have a good time and Segway around Prague. The guides were also some of the friendliest people I have ever met.

We had a large group and this company was AMAZING!!!. We had a large group and I Love Segway, particularly, Stanislav, accommodated us without a glitch at all. I contacted several companies via email prior to our group arriving and and Stanislav was quick to respond and all his messages were warm and friendly. Upon arriving the morning of we were not disappointed. Because of the size of our group they took us out at separate times. For those of us waiting, they entertained us! They are at the John Lennon Wall and provided us with paint to decorate the wall. After that they took us to a park and let us use their fun toys! The entire time the whole staff was engaging and had rich amounts of current and historical information about the area. An amazing experinece!!!

Awesome. After been in the beautiful city of Prague for 3 days We had plenty of time to decide on the right tour for us and we chose well!!! Our tour guide Bessi gave us time to get used to the machine and made us feel 100% safe at all time whilst giving us an insightful tour of the petrin park area.Highly recommend!

Very nice. The Owners were really kind and helpful. They focus a lot on safety and the guides give you a lot of insight on the places you visit. You have time to go take a closer look and there are enough breaks so you have time to sit and get off the segway for a bit. Very nice to go as a group

The only way to travel. Sooooo much fun and the best way to save your legs. This was brilliant and worth every CZK. Ivan (Our Guide) lead the way for three hours of zipping along the cobbled streets, parks and passageways, giving a comprehensive commentary as we went. We had never been on a Segway before but will certainly use them again. The distance covered was brilliant and the ease of use was quite surprising. Lean forward, lean backwards, turn on the spot - Lesson over! Great tour guide, great views, great fun! A big thank you to the team at I Love Segway for making sight seeing a breeze.In a word - "Excellent."Martin & Sarah.

David tour guide made our day. Within a minute of training, we were all set for an adventure. We were in prague for only a day and glad we took this tour and learnt about this beautiful city in about 2 hours (10kms). David was extremely fun, friendly, adventurous, talkative and precautious. Best part of it all, they only do private tours this we were able to go to many places around the city. He even took us to his favorite "local" dinner and beer spots and they were amazing. I highly recommend these guys for your next visit to Prague. There is no better way to see the city.

What an amazing tour with super cool guide Ivan !. This was for sure one of the best experience that I had during my Prague visit. Ivan (the guide) is such a cool guy and he had a lot of patience to introduce us to the segway machines so we felt very comfortable even we were first-timers. The rain couldn't ruin our trip since the guys that are running the tours provided us with the rain coats! So if you have similar situation with the weather, you shouldn't be worried at all. Ivan was really informative and full of informations and facts about the Prague that will make your tour super interesting. The tour last for about 2 hours but I felt like it was 15 minutes. So if you are visiting Prague, this one is a definitely must !

Such an amusing tour with Ivan. Took my best friend for a seqway tour as a surprise and it was a big success. Tour was great and included Petrin hill in where you can see amassing view of Prague and provides such an enjoyable ride where you can actually avoid crowded City center but still enjoy all the nice things of historic 'Mala Strana' including Prague Castle. And must compliment our patient and amusing tour guide Ivan Tucakovic who was kind enough to make lots of photos of us and and gave us such a lot of insight about wonderful Prague. I highly recommend this company everybody was nice and polite and patient while preparing us for the tour.

Best Segway tour in Prague. My fiancé and I recently enjoyed a private Segway tour with this company. We booked online using their website and received confirmation the same night. When arriving, the tour guide suggested that we go up in the hills for better views and to avoid the busy town centre. I am so glad we took this offer! The tour guide is friendly and very patient. This was the first time we had used a Segway and she gave us plenty of time to practice before hitting the streets. I highly recommend this company! Thank you for such a lovely tour!
excellent tour outside city center. They offer segway tours outside the city center, to avoid the crowds. Our guide (Ivan) did a great job, also giving some background about Prague. Material is good.

very nice Segway tour in Prague. We - two mothers with two teenage-Girls - really enjoyed our segway tour on the Petrin hill with our lovely guide Ivan, who told us many nice Stories about this wonderful City!

Great fun!. I visited Prague with my parents (aged 29, 55 and 56) and did the Segway tour with Ivan Tucaković. Ivan was a great tour guide and him and his colleagues were very helpful and patient in teaching us how to ride the segways safely and so we could have the most fun.Our tour was of the Castle side of Prague and Ivan was very knowledgeable and was happy to answer questions and allow us time to take pictures etc.I would recommend the guys at I love Segway for anyone wanting to explore the city on two wheels!

Ivan was a great guide for first-timers. 4 of us (my mother, father, brother and I) did a 75 min Segway tour around Mala Strana. Three of them had never ridden a Segway before and were a little nervous. Ivan (the guide) did a great job of teaching them and making them comfortable in the practice area before we stepped on to the streets. Most other companies start tours from the Old Town but we had already covered that area in a walking tour, so decided to do the tour in Mala Strana. It was a great experience because we went up to the Prague Castle and got a great view from there before going into the parks on Petrin Hill. Ivan was very friendly and gave us little snippets of information (such as about Gaston the seal) which made the trip more enjoyable. Would have been 5 stars except it is a bit pricy (we paid 34 euros per head).

Great Tour!. Last year I arranged a private segwaytour as a birthday present for my younger sister and she loved it. We chose to go to the Petřin hill, because there are beautifull views of Prague and way less people then in the streets. It was very easy to leanr how to use the segway, we covered a lot of ground and it was a lot of fun!I had no trouble booking a tour with this company and the whole team is very kind and friendly, so if you decide to go on one of their tours, you will have a really good time with them :)Thank you for everithing!

I've always thought Segway tours are silly BUT.... I've always thought Segway tour are far lazy people and I have to be honest, I kind of looked down on the people who did. Man, was I wrong and did I miss out until now. The beauty of doing this tour with Stanislav and his guides is that he takes you of the hectic city center and gives you the best views of the entire city. He's very careful about guiding us and has a great sense of humor! What a great way to get on the hills around the city, get a feeling of the huge park and enjoy a beer on top of the hills.Guys, you completely changed my opinion about Segways, thank you. If you ever want to try, you should only do it with these guys, I couldn't recommend them more. They're doing it the right way, totally worth it!

Best way to explore secrets of Prague!. I was born in Prague and I have been living here for more than 20 years. I love how beautiful Prague is, and I know it here pretty well. I took a tour with extremely friendly guide Robert, who knows so many interesting facts that even I didn't know. I explored so much new "hidden" tiny streets with truly magical atmosphere. We went through Malá Strana up to Petřín hill, where you can perfectly enjoy the ride on Segways (my first time with Segway and I have to do it again asap, loved it!), because there are not many people and you ride through park on nice twisty pavement. View from the top of Peřín is spectacular. We ended up in nice pub with delicious beer. What a day, can't wait to repeat!

Awesome time!. I can't say enough about this tour! Was an AWESOME way to see the city! It was mine and my girlfriends first time on a Segway! The tour guide did a great job explaining how to ride this thing lol. Can't wait to do this again! You should definitely see Prague from one of these!

Awesome. Had an awesome tour on Segway. Was the first time on one of them and it is easy. Our guide Klara was very helpful and nice and I thoroughly enjoyed the experience. I would recommend all to try the tour for sure...

Great family fun. This was our first time to Prague and our first Segway tour. Our instructor was wonderful. She was very knowledgable and made the tour fun for the whole family. I highly recommend if you have children (10+) that get bored with the standard city walking tour.

Great Fun for Everyone - I Love Segway. My family (71, 55 and 17 years old twins) took a ride on this “thing” – and we had fun all the way. After a few minutes of training we went out “to the hills”. We came up to the Strahov Monastery and tasted beer in the local monastic brewery. Then we rode down to the Royal Castle and had a great view over Prague´s Old Town. After about 80 minutes of riding we “landed” back at the John Lennon Wall. All the way we were very well looked after by our guide Standa, who gave us a lot of information and told us a number of stories – and he did it in a very entertaining way. WE LOVE SEGWAY.

Great experience. Great care from A-Z. First you get proper explanation how it works and try it with a help of your guide. In the end it is easy and fun way how to explore the city from different point of you. Do not expect detailed historical tour, but your guide will tell you many stories from the past, present and future not written in a guide book. He takes side streets that even locals do not come across so often. Enjoy it, I love Segway is the best I experienced !

The best tour guide and the most fun. I went and rented from "I love Segway". Great tour guide the segways were well taken care of. Great price our guide took pictures for us and we ended up with some great shots and videos. Highly recommend this tour. Very knowledgeable guide. Great experience. SteveFinland/USA

Excellent . 'I love Segway' is the best Segway in Prague. Stanislav was great - really informative on the tour and he was super with children. They loved the Segways! Don't bother with the other tours around Prague. Just head for the Lennon Wall. Enjoy!

I Love Segway is Amazing!. There are Segway teams all over Prague looking for the next tourist to lure onto a tour. Our recommendation is to stay away from them, especially those in Old Town Square. Operators like I Love Segway are the antithesis to those you find stalking you. This team is knowledgeable, personable, and incredibly willing to go out of their way to provide you with an amazing morning or afternoon in Prague! Our guide was Jakob. He is a student with excellent English and big dreams of attending a great college. He was perfect for our family. We highly recommend I Love Segway!

Superb tour and service. Our first time on a Segway. Stan was an excellent host, very easy and helpful to communicate with. We started a few minutes late as the city marathon was and the previous tour was running behind, but this was a blessing as Stan told us a bit about Prague, and the John Lennon Wall and indeed himself and company - all of which was really cool. We had Besi as our guide who was very helpful. We went up the hills to Petrin, it was smooth and enjoyable. I really like these guys and their operation. Perfect service, and they were good company, recommending places to eat, and where to go to see Prague etc.

Amazing. This review will have two parts, one full review and a short pro and con list near the end, followed by our final thoughts.The tour was simply amazing. The tour guide was really nice. Though we have been on a lot of tours with a lot of guides and I can honestly say this was the best yet. Riding the Segway is really easy and after just a few minutes it was no problem to control them. We had ages ranging from 12 all the way to 62 and nobody had any sort of problem learning.The tour was around some of the prettiest parks in Prague and gave us some amazing views. We would have never done it on foot, seeing as there is a lot of uphill. We only did two hours but you could easily spend 3 or more hours. What was especially nice was how personal the service was. It almost felt like we had known them before. After the tour we spent around 45 Minutes with the whole crew, for which they did not charge us any money. While spending time with them we talked about politics but also about what to visit in Prague after the tour had ended. This is a very young establishment. It is located right by the famous sight, John Lennon wall, and while it is easy to miss this “backyard office” is hugely helpful as it provides a space where to learn to ride these advanced pieces of machinery. Do not let their low profile office and young crew fool you. This service is absolutely TOP. There is no better Segway service in our experience.Pro:- Great service - Very personal tour - Good prizes compared to other companies- Great tour guide- Great equipment- Easy to learn - Easy to understand tour guide - Fun tour- They chose the perfect area for a Segway tour- Absolutely worth the money- There is lots of other things that we liked but we are trying to keep it as short as possibleCon: - While this place was a little cheaper than the other, overall Segway tours are expensive - Hard to find, if you don’t know they are there- Everything else was great! – No complaintsWe can really only recommend this service. Despite the fact that it’s not very cheap we are certain the money was well spent and we would do it again in a heartbeat.

Wonderful experience. We had a private Segway tour and i had a great experience. Robert was our guide for the tour.His knowledge about the city is wonderful. The whole team is friendly and knowledgable. I would definitely recommend everyone for this tour.

Birthday trip. Booked this trip as a surprise for my girlfriend. We had never been on segways before but our guide was great and took the time to talk us through it. The tour was informative and varied and we both had a great time. Would recommend this trip to anyone coming to Prague. Stanis knows his stuff and is a great guide

Amazone private tour. I arrived at the tourist info and the last group had just left. So they organized a private tour with "I love Segway" for me which was amazing! Very interesting informations, great tour and views and extremely friendly people! Thank you so much, I never could've seen so much in such a short time :)! Highly recommended!!

Amazing tour with an amazing Robert!. I have been in Prague with a friend for some days and we decided to do a Segway tour for 1h30. We covered a lot of the city in a very comfortable and fun way. The tour guide Robert was very much fun, knew a lot of stories and was really entertaining. Their location is next to the Jhon Lennon wall where the atmosphere is beautiful. DO IT!

A lot of fun. What can be more fun then friends together on sagways. I highly recommend to anyone who is seeking fun conected with education. Yes, you will not get deep history lesson but it is good enough to get basic info about history of Prague and tips where to go and what to se later on. It was really great experience.
Superb!. I absolutely recommend to contact Segway guys in Prague 1 and rent one of the funny to drive electric vehicles on a tour! We had a 1 hour trip and it was brilliant.

A bespoke tour of Prague. Having a personally tailored tour of the city was brilliant. I got to see and talk about things that I cared about, including having a beer at the monastery. My guide was extremely knowledgable, since he was a local guy born in Prague. I would highly recommend these guys if you want a down-to-earth, personal and friendly Segway tour of Prague.

A really fun tour of Prague . We visited Prague as a group of 8 and the staff at the Pod Vezi hotel recommended the 'I Love Segways' tour. As there were 8 of us we had a private tour with 2 guides, Stanislav and David. Both guides were great craic and filled us in on all the history and even brought us for a pint! :) Thumbs up from our whole group! And a little word of advice...Bring gloves

A must do for your trip to Prague!!!. We went as a group of 8 & Stanislaw & David couldn't have been more informative, entertaining & welcoming. They really did make our trip to Prague that extra bit special. The tour lasted a few hours & we even got to stop for a tasting of local Prague beer. We are so happy we did this tour & i would definitely recommend you to do it! It's a private tour tailored to your specific wishes booked through our hotel!

Great fun and entertainment made to suit each party!! Fantastic!!. I Segways is absolutely the best way to see Prague!! Our tour guides were Stanislav and David; they made our package especially to suit our group of 20-30 year old... We chose a fun Segway driving experience with some knowledge about the city! The guys really know their stuff and also went the extra mile taking pics and videos for our group! Would definitely recommend this experience for anyone aging from kids to older adults. 5/5 stars! Thanks guys :D

Great way to see Prague! Ask forJakub as your guide!. My husband and I were in Prague for a week and quickly noticed all of the segway tours when we arrived. They looked like a fun way to see the city so we asked our hotel for the best segway tour company and they suggested I love Segway. There were two options and you could do a group tour or a private tour and we opted for the private tour since there wasn't a huge price difference and it's always nice to get personalized tours. We booked late at night (11:00 PM) and they sent a very nice taxi to pick us up at the hotel the next morning at 10:00 AM. We were taken to the I love Segway office where we met our guide,Jakub Š. He quickly showed us the basics and then we hopped on the segways and practiced in the courtyard before we were off. Jakub was the best guide because he was informative (but not too serious) and he allowed us to ask a lot of questions. He also took my phone before we began and snapped a lot of photos of us along the way that we'll keep forever. He also captured some great sights and a few funny videos of us on the segway. We especially appreciated that he went out of his way to take us to some very scenic places to help us capture our christmas card photo for next year. He really wanted to make sure we were satisfied and we'd definitely recommend asking for him if you're touring with this company. Some things we learned: -It's probably better to book directly with the company if you can. We decided late the night before but saw that pricing is much cheaper if you book directly through I love Segways. -This really is the best company that we saw because they don't take you through the very congested touristy streets. Many of the other company's we saw were in the thick of it all and many people looked like they were struggling to keep up with all of the crowds. I love segway took us off the beaten path and to some amazingly scenic spots. We would have never seen the city as we did with the other tour companies since so much time would've been spent dealing with crowds. -The three hour tour was perfect but longer would have been too long. We were concerned about how long 3 hours can be but once we got going we weren't rushed and even stopped at a local brewery to have a beer half way through (we also took this opportunity to ask Jakub more about what it was like to live in the city). I think you can also grab a quick lunch, too, if you prefer.

Funniest Way Just with Segway!. It is fantastic! It is the best way to know one city, especially if you dont have enought time to walk through every attractions. It is funny, fast and very nice to step on a Segway and walk around.If you want to know Prague in a funny and nice way, you must do it with a segway, especially from this company.They do private tours, in groups or individually and it is amazing!The guides treat you well, they teach you with responsability, give your time and explain every single detail of the city for you during the tour.It is simply incredible!You can choose the track or you can do what they suggest in different routes. Doesn't matter which one, I can garantee that it will be awesome.You can have nice pictures, you can run, go fast, make funny with people on the street and discover more places in less time than the average if you go by walk,It is completely nice and funny and I extremelly recommend to visit Prague and to know the city by Segway. Do it and Have fun!If this comment was helpful, please, give me a like here! ;)

Best segway tours in Prague.. Right behind the John Lennon wall there is a little segway buisness that offers you tours around the city with the best price. We went to the one hour tour and our guide was Besim. He was caring and patient and very informative. You can pay only in cash not credit cards Absolutely recommended.

Had a blast . We had the greatest time with the best guide in Prague - Jakob. He has a very comprehensive knowledge on the city history and that is why he managed to create a tour which was both teaching and fun.I would strongly recommend this tour, it helped us visit all the sites we wanted but saved us a serious walk.Also the segway club was very generous and professional. Hope everybody takes this tour!

Great segway tour around Prague. We were guided by David who took care of us well on the journey around Prague. The scenery was great and he was helpful in every respect and detail, The price was reasonable and we would highly recommend his service to anyone who likes to have a great view of the city on a segway which is easily maneuverable. Thanks again David.

Thank you "I Love Segway" and Robert!. It was actually our first stay in Prague. My friends and I wanted to visit the most exciting places so we decided to rent segways. Fortunately we met instructor Robert who helped us to manage these crazy vehicles and what's the best - he showed us the most amazing spots and gave us some great tips what to do in Prague.So if you decide to use segways, you should definitely want Robert as your instructor! :-)
Great Trip . We had a really great Trip with Robert, nice views and places of prague we haven't seen before. He also gave us some funny and interessting information aside. Highly recommendet!

New view of Prague. Me and my family have looked for a new way to explore Praque and segway crosed out mind. It was an amazing experience. You get to see a lot and travel fast around all in one trip. Out guide Jakub was helpful and nice all the time. Staff really knows about Prague and tell you things which you don't find in tourist guide. Don't hesitate and try it!

Perfect . I thought about new things I could do in Prague, so I tried this with my friend and even though I know Prague quite well (well I live there), I was impressed. Our guide Jakob knew Prague even better, so the trip was seamless. We went from Charles Bridge to Petřín, checked out a bit of a historical centre of the city and a few really nice viewpoints. Unfortunately it was quite cold outside and started to rain a little bit, but our guide borrowed us some raincoats, which is nice too. If you are a foreign tourist, I really recommend I love Segway, since it's a fun way to explore beauties of Prague.

History Fun & Sights included. we took this 3 hours tour and started from the john lennon wall, as we were familiar with segways, we could skip the training part and head for the city right away. Robert was our guide and friend for the way, we went up the hills around the castle wall, panorama of prague is just awesome from there. Robert actually showed us all the important tourist spots one would like to visit and we chose the highlighted ones to visit the next day. I appreciate the way he showed us around with his little factoids and humour, he made it even more enjoyable. I recommend this to all my fellow TA. A small tip, don't forget to try the home made beer at the monastery up hill, the ride down hill after you taste all the beers become even more enjoyable.

Great !!. We spent two hours on a Segway, it was so much fun! We got a lot of information from our tourguide (Robert). He showed us the park and told us with some fun stories about the history of Prague. We would highly recommend this to anyone who wants to see Prague in a fun way!! Greets from Belgium!

What fun! . Wow! What fun! We spent an hour and a half Segway ing around Prague, with the help of our wonderful, informative guide Jacob. I felt so safe, the instruction and practice was clear and very calm and then we headed off, through the city and up to hills to the top for a beautifully stunning view. It was so enjoyable and easy and fun to travel by Segway with my friends. I thoroughly recommend this company, there are lots to choose from here, but don't look any further, I am really picky and I Love Segway were absolutely great in every way.....and very good value for money too! Enjoy everyone! X
Excellent . Excellent people & excellent guidance !!!! We had so much fun.... Also, prices are reasonable. It is very comfartable to see around by segway
So much fun. Had a fab time during a recent trip to Prague tearing around the streets on a private Segway tour. Highly reccommend!!!

Amazing, amazing, amazing. Everything we did with Stan, the owner of I love Segway was brilliant. He was responsive and accommodating with our booking and the two hour Top views trip he took us on was fantastic. He really made sure we knew how to drive the Segway before we started and had a strong emphasis on safety. The tour takes you through parks and paths to really great sites and view points. This allows you to really enjoy the speed of the Segway and helps you avoid large crowds and pavements in say the city centre. Stan's local knowledge and his sense of humour added so much to the experience. Highly recommend that you use I love Segway.

Best place to do a segway tour in Europe guides amazing!. I loved how personalised the private tours were, we got shown a side of prague a bit off the main tourist path which was great we got incredible views of the city a comprehensive history to the areas we were in and no other people in sight! (which made for a lot of fun with the Segway's. Had wanted to do this for ages and so glad we picked I Love Segway to do it with. Special thanks to Sergio

Explore Prague with Friends. After dozens of Prague trips, this time we decided for the green heart. Why didn’t we do it much much earlier? Imagine a friend living in Prague and segwaying with you through this city. Then you know how it's to join the green heart company. Absolutely recommendable

Super tour with best guide!. If you wanna explore Prague not only as common tourist and also see the romantic hidden places, you have to experience it from Segway! I love Segway is the best choice! Smaller, very friendly company with young, intelligent stuff will show you all the "must see" places in Old Prague, but also unbelievable view of Prague's city or Prague castle. Although I live in Prague, I have chance to see hidden places where I have never been to! Moreover, Segway is super funny and you will really enjoy! Try "I love Segway", reliable company with office just next to the Lennon wall in beautiful garden, where Bethoven used to relax (because he did not know I love Segway :-)

What an absolute hoot!. If you want a most interesting experience give a Segway a try in this lovely city. We were given good instructions and practice before we took off and wandered around the scenic Castle District. Our guide Klara did an outstanding job of showing us around!

Boys Weekend. Klara was awesome guide, she spent good time in showing us around on segway. We went to hill (can't remember the name). She kindly took lot of pictures while going around, specifically mentioned we did really took loads of them stopping every now n then. This was first time for all of us so we needed a bit of training at start which I love Segway gave us good time to get acquainted with. In all very well time spent and good value for money
Amazing experience . Karla, the instructor was a perfect guide we could have asked for. We 5 friends had an amazing time. Segway was good and Karla showed us all the good places.

See Prauge. we had the 3 hour session the time went so fast the best way to see the city the guides knew all there was to know about the city. a much better way to see the sights rather than walk left time to visit other parts of the city.
must do activity. best and the most fun way to see the city. also the tour guides are a good source for local information

A must try. This I must say is an awesome lil machine that you can ever ride.. At the Town square you would have volunteers riding this and would set up a small group and show you around the place for a fee of Euro 50.

Back to school days.... Its like going back to school days. 1-3 hrs usage cost approx. 30 euros but it's worth the penny as it's the best easy way to explore the beautiful city. First I was not sure if I will be able to ride it but just one time demo by the efficient instructor - next two hours were just amazing
great fun and easy way to explore the city. Great way to see prague with exerienced guides giving you a lot more information and experience of their city deffinalty worth doing
Great way to see Prague. So easy to use....and tour guides will customize itineraries to suit. I want a Segway to get to around at home!

What a great time. OUr group had a wonderful time with a 2 1/2 hour tour. The staff was able to add to our party at the last minute. First their was 4 then we added one more then we added 2 more. Klar our guide was awsome and very knowledgable about Prague and all the history. This was the way to go to see progue especially the hillly sights. My only problem was that my lips hurt due to smiling so much.

Great fun with Klara. Our group had a wonderful time with I Love Segway. They went over and above the call of duty by lining up some extra machines to accommodate us. Klara was an excellent guide - informative, personable and funny. I would highly recommend a tour with I Love Segway.
Worth trying once. good fun, just not as awesome as where you drive is very crowded and you dare not bump into a tourist
Fantastic experience . We were a small group of 3 lads, had our own private guide. Gave a full tour of Prague in over 2 hours. Highly recommended for people who love fun and excitement.

Way to go!. We did a three hour guided Segway tour around Prague and we're delighted with the whole experience. Albert was an excellent guide, and we received all the training we needed from the very friendly owner/manager. Segway really is the perfect way to your around a city, and you can see an awful lot of Prague in three hours.
Segway. It was fun and enjoyed a lot could not do Segway in Lucerne but had great time in prague it was near my hotel .
Best Segway tour!. Excellent guide, everyone is super friendly. Incredible tour, perfectly planned for us. So much fun! Love form Mexico

Very nice way to see Prague. We booked a 2 hours tour with 2 adults and 2 children (12&10). Very good and easy training in the harden behind the John Lennon wall and of we are. Nice guide and beautiful views of the city. Lucky us, cold watermelon and an icecream after the tour. It was one of the hottest days in Prague. It is a bit expensive but well worth it for a GREAT experience. Highly recommended to book with them.

We love Segway!. We were at the John Lennon wall in Prague and saw some young people arriving on Segways. Our daughter did a Segway tour on her last holiday in Rome and she loved it! So my better half said we should give it a try. The owner Stan was very helpful and convincing and should us how it works. Within a few minutes we could manage the Segway roller. So we booked a private evening tour which was guided by a young lady named Clara. She is very sweet and knowledgeably, and she carefully took us to the top of the hill overlooking Prague with amazing views. Riding the Segway is great fun and we will do it again! Btw, we are 63 and 59 years old...

Highlight of a months trip around europe!. Our segway experience was amazing, hilarious and like nothing else we did while my friend and I were traveling around europe. The guys that took us round were great and English, so friendly and there was no where else and with no other company we would have had the experience or service we had with these guys. There price was the same as other companies we saw and we got a private tour that lasted twice as long. If you want something to do in Prague that is fun, for everyone, lets you see all of the great sights then this is the activity and this is the company to do it with.
Amazing tour!!!. I love <3 SEGWAY!!! Amazing experience - the best way how to see wonderful Prague is on Segway!! ;) <3Úžasný zážitek- nejlepší možnost jak vidět nádhernou Prahu je na segway!! :3 :)

Great way to see Prague Castle. Our family of 2 adults and 2 children loved this tour! It was our first time on Segways and we loved it! We took the Prague Castle tour up the hill, through the gardens. It was lovely. The tour lasted 3 hours. Our guide Stan was perfect.

Fantastic! . I love Segway was the highlight of our trip in Prague.Very highly recommended.
Sergio,our guide,made the whole experience indeed amazing :)

Trip with Sergio. I had so much fun on my Segway tour with Sergio. This is the only Segway tour to take because you don't have to deal with the big crowds and he takes you up the hill to see amazing views of the city. The rose gardens are beautiful and Sergio took us to a great monestari with a long history of brewing beer. The beer was delicious, some of the best beer I've ever tasted. If you want to experience Prague the right way I highly recommend this tour.

Fantastic!. We took the Segway for approximately 4 hours and it was like a fast track to cover the different sights of Prague. Our tour guide Klara was an absolute gem! We told her the different places that we wanted to go and she planned our route for us. She also made sure we were comfortable with operating the Segway. Do give it a try when you are in Prague!
Segway at Night Tour. Segway at Night tour was great - we really liked that it was only 2 people maximum. Guide was very nice and we enjoyed seeing the city lights.
It is a Must!. We were a large group with many different ages And we all absolutely loved it! We went on other Segway tours too but this is the best one We really recommend it!

Memorable private Segway tour Up the hill. I thoroughly enjoyed the Segway tour through the hills of Prague. It was an opportunity to absorb the different views of the city on a track that's away from tourists. In fact, many times, it was just Klara, the tour guide and myself. Approachable and genuine, Klara was just awesome, pointing out interesting aspects and history of the city and telling few interesting stories. Midway through the tour, the weather got cold and rain started to fall, so we had a break at a brewery near the monastery. Needless to say, I'll remember this tour for some time. There are lots of Segway tours in Prague, but I chose this one since I got a very nice and prompt reply from its owner, Stanislav, and the prices were very reasonable as far as private tours go. Highly recommended!

Segway Tour Praag. A nice and alternative way to discover the city of Praque is by Segway. You just need a minut to experience the Segway and find your balance. Then off you go. It is easy to manage and much faster than on foot. Because your standing on the Segway, you can watch everything clearly, because you see it from a higher point of view. Within an hour you can see a lot of the city. Your friendly guide gives you all the information you want. The guides speek English very Well. Segway is offered on the main squares of the city. It is a lot of fun. I liked it very much.

Don't miss this opportunity in Prague. Its one of the best things that any tourist would like to do in Prague. We were a group of 14 people , including a small kid of 7 and an old man of 70. We had a blast on segway and it was so comfortable and enjoyable.

very easy to handle. For all the first timers like me it does not take much time to get use to this machine. It is fun and the best way to see attractions especially for older people. You can get down whenever you like and click pictures and hop on again. Too much fun.
Amusing. Very amusing activity. Just be careful at the beginning, it is a bit risky. I recommend this to make a quick tour in the city.
Great trip to the castle. Nice guys both of them, taking a private tour just the two of us is better than going in a long line, like many of the other companies.

Segway tour. Sergio was the best I have ever had! If you don't get a tour with him your doing Prague wrong. The office is right by the John Lennon wall. He showed us a lot of great sites where I was able to learn so much. I got a great understanding of Prague after this tour.

I didn't expect to have that much fun!. When we arrived in Prague a day ago we saw all those people on Segways. It looked like fun and we thought about trying it ourselves. So this morning we stopped by at "I love Segway" and luckily we could go on a tour directly.We decided to take the 2 hour ride way up to Prague castle through the beautiful parks and past the monastery.Sergio, our guide, told us a lot about the city and he knew about some fun facts as well. It was great talking to him and he also had some great ideas about what we could do after our tour.He stopped at a lot of scenic places, so that we could take some pictures.He was the perfect guide and we are happy that we took the tour with him!All in all I have to say that we enjoyed the tour a lot. It was the highlight during our stay in Prague and we definitely will go on a tour again if we visit Prague once more! Thank you for the great time!

An amazing and fun tour!. I've never tried segway before so at first I was a little nervous.. BUT, after i got on it all the feelings disappeared and we started an amazing tour on an amazing day! Sweet Clara took us around Prague, our 2 hour booked tour ended up being 3 hours, so theres no stress at all. The little break with a cold beer hit the spot! If you're in Prague and want a fun and easy way to get around you should book a tour with I love segway!

Amazing experience!. I Love Segway and Stanislav created a tour that fullfilled our expectations and even more! Having explored the old town on foot we wanted to experience the other side of the river differently and decided to take Segway tour. Office was easily found by the Lennon wall. First we were properly instructed on the use of Segways. With Segways we were able to climb on top of the hill easily and see some amazing landscapes and view points. Stanislav was great tour guide; friendly and informative, and really made this tour a great experience to us. We had so much fun and highly recommend this company!
Great tour ☀️ Love segway. Great tour, great experience, great guide Klárka I've really enjoyed it. Thank you. Everyone should try this!

A fantastic ride. We can recommend you to take a private ride with this company. Nice and friendly and competent people. We took a 2,5 hours trip. Thank you, Klara for a very nice and learning tour today!

I love Prague on a Segway . We had a great private tour with Clara who was both friendly and informative. I really appreciated the personalized and more casual tour. Our 2 hour tour ended up being 3, and we enjoyed a beer and a fun conversation with Clara. I highly recommend seeing Prague with "I love Segway"

Amazing experience with perfect service. The experience was fantastic, with Segway it's really easier to look around and also have more fun. Klara, the pretty girl who was my tour guide, is soooo nice and introduced me everything she knows about Prague, and answered my questions, chatted with me. Strongly recommended to try this if u went to Prague, it's an amazing experience u should not miss

Great way to see Prague at night from the hill. Two of us had a private tour with Surge (sorry don't know your spelling) He was a wonderful guide and patient with us as he taught us how these Segways work, easy once you get the hang of it. They really seem to be serious about safety as we wore helmets and he helped us if the situation got tricky. His knowledge of Prague was very good as well.We booked a 90 minute tour and as we had alrady seen old town, they were quite happy to customize our tour to go up to Petrin hill, the Monestary, and meander through the quiet park lanes. The park was very peaceful with great views of Prague as the lights went on. One of the most relaxing things we did in busy Prague!The office a bit tricky to find but well worth the effort, just go through the John Lennon wall. Thanks for the experience

Perfect service/value for money. We had a wonderfull tour with our guide Klaara (finnish way ti write it, dont know the right way). She was a perfect guide to tell about Prague and to help us with segways. She and whole company were very helpfull and wanted to make sure that we enjoy our time with them. Its very easy to recommend them, because everything was done perfectly. Could not be done better - take a glide with them!

Laid back casual tour. We easily booked the day before and what started as a 2 hr tour ended up as 3, as our sweet tour guide Clara allowed us to stop for a delicious beer at the monastery on the way to the castle. Word recommend this new tour company
Great Segway Tour of the Parks. Had a wonderful time on the Segway tour of the two parks. Clara our tour guide was very informative and extremely nice. I recommend using I Love Segway!

I 💚 Segway. Booked the evening Segway to Petrin Tower through Kampa Park and onto the Monastery! We had a wonderful private tour with lots of local knowledge and stories shared with us! It was a perfect Prague evening and after visiting the city 3 times has been the highlight of our trips there by far!! Thanks I Segway for making our engagement weekend so special!

Best possible way to see Prague!. What a perfect tour! We're not big tour people but thought we would miss a lot in Prague without someone to guide us. Plus my husband really wanted to try a Segway and it's the best way to see hilly Prague. All four of us (ages 16-60) ADORED the tour, led by Stanislaus, who was so fantastic in every way - very safety conscious, knowledgeable about his city and country today and in the past, super fun and very relaxed. We spent a long time in the gorgeous park, seeing vistas and landmarks we never would have found on our own, ate lunch at a monastery, climbed trees, saw embassies and gorgeous private streets, touched the largest meteorite in the Czech Republic and wrote on the John Lennon wall, plus got to see the city's key sites. There is no way to improve on this tour - you've got to try it!!

Perfect!. Nicest people, our guide Clare was very kind and told us a lot of history and legends from Prague as we climbed the mountain on the segways. We were told that the other Segway company used segways without any backup system, so if the machinery fu*k up, you're screwed. This was not the case for this company's machines. Defiantly worth a try. Simple the best way to discover the mountain of Prague.

Best tour experience in Prague. Hi I'm Alfredo from Mexico City I had the opportunity to do a Segway tour with this company and I must say it has been one of the best guided tours here in Prague, out guide girl named Clara , she's just the best , she's really patient and knows a lot of things about the city, every person that visits Prague and would like a nice experience driving a Segway should come to " I love Segway" tours.

Chilly segway tour with a great guide!!. Wow! We had a such a nice afternoon with our guide Klara. I am actually from Prague and my friend from Mexico came to visit me. I wanted to try something special and I think this was probabbly our best afternoon in his 14 days stay! As a guy from Prague I can surely recommend this tour, you'll see the nicest view of Prague and enjoy Prague even more.

Awesome Segway Tour with great guides!. We came with friends in Prague and once we've seen a few groups of people driving the Segway, we thought it was a must. I love Segway is the best Segway company in Prague! The guides (David and mike) are awesome and very friendly. It's worth your money and time. So do not hesitate to take your trip with them!

I Want to be Best Friends with Sergio!!!. I couldn't have asked for a better tour or tour guide than Sergio with I Love Segway. I was told about these tours in advance by a close friend and ended up seeing Sergio in a main square before I had actually decided to do it. He let me try out the Segway and gave me a run down of the kind of tour I would get. He's such a charismatic guy - I was sold. You couldn't ask for a better way to see the city. The Segways were a blast and Sergio knew details about the city that I had never heard before, despite having studied there for a semester in college. I went with my mother and we both enjoyed in immensely. Would definitely recommend to friends and the tripadivsor community at large!By the end of the tour I felt like I had known Sergio for years. I want to be his best friend.

The tour with the awesome Sergio. How cool ain't this guy? It all started when we were looking at these go-cart-type-of-rides for hire, sure they looked interesting and cool, but it didn't fit three people. Just our great luck Mr Sergio from I Love Segway stood there and asked us if we needed help. He offered a real good deal to show us around in Prague and took us to places we never would have known about. But besides all of that, he himself was too good to be true. People spend money on time consuming tutorials to become a good tour guide with charisma and all that... This dude had it naturally. He was so good that we tried to convince his boss to give him a raise. So if you read this and go to Prague and want to see real nice fairytale places, hook up with Sergio @ I love Segway Prague. I'll be damned if he won't be able to give you the same time he gave us.

Private tour for the price of a group tour!!!. We mentioned to our concierge that we wanted to go on a Segway tour and five minutes later a private guide with I Love Segway was at our hotel. We prefer bikes in most cities but in Prague DEFINITELY stick to the Segway because of the cobblestone streets. The service from these guys was incredible. Our guide was great about giving us the tour that WE wanted which would not have been possible in a group tour. The price was actually the same as a group tour from any other company. After our tour, we got to enjoy a beer from the monastery above Prague (we picked up during our tour) in the garden where Beethoven used to sit and write. Only I Love Segway has access to this location. A really nice little extra at the end of a perfect day.What a blast. Very highly recommend I Love Segway in Prague!

Terrific way to start your day!. We went on the early morning tour -- started at 8:30 a.m. for a beautiful and crowd-less few hours enjoying the parks and castle area. We zoomed around a rose- & lavender-filled garden near Petrin tower; stopped for a quick tour of the Strahov Library -- beautiful; and ended at The John Lenbon wall!! All along the way, we learned about Prague's history and sites. Well recommended! Our tour guide was fantastic -- knowledgeable, nice, and generous!Great time.

Great Tour!!! Everybody loved the segways. The people were so nice and helpful. . This was a great thing. I loved the people and the tour was incredible. The tour guide was amazing and helpful. She was so good with the kids. I recommend it.

Didn't want the awesome tour to finish!. When visiting Prague, segwaying should be a must, particularly with this company! With our super fun guide Sergio, we explored the city, visiting not only the tourist attractions, but also other hidden beauty parts of it which made it an incredible memory. I'm not gonna forget the outstanding view from Petrin hill which is the highest place in the city and definitely the machines gave an interesting feeling to it than if we just walked. Our guide was young and with so much positive energy making us even more excited and he gave us some historical facts about Prague too. We wanted a refreshing czech beer so he took us to Strahov pivovar which I found the ideal way to finish the tour, even though we didn't want it to end. My Prague experience is even better after this tour!

Made our day. With a few days of waking in Prague we decided to try out Segwaying. We found the place after some asking around, brilliant location, literally inside the John Lennon wall. We met the owner, super enthusiastic & service minded. After a quick training session on the pedestrian we were ready to go with our guide. We headed up towards the Eiffeltower and the rose garden. Best view over town! Our guide told us so much about Prague. I wish we did the trip on our first day! We recommend a private trip if possible! I wish I knew the guides name - thank you for 75min of good laughing, great stories and a memory for life! Best of all: We were the first to pin the flag at 78°north!/regards Sandra & Pål, Longyearbyen Svalbard

Fun guides, Awesome Private Tours!. Guides are really fun. These guides get you to a history lesson and a comedy show all in one.I love Segway is a private tour company only - it was really nice to have a personal guide for me and my boyfriend.We got to see incredible views and the machines were very easy to learn.Our guide, Serj, was young and really nice. He personalized our tour to focus on what we wanted to see.If you have a small group, I highly recommend this company. A private tour on Segways especially is worth it.Met the owner of the company - Standa, such a pleasure to talk to. We got to see the company mascot, Quido the Kangaroo. You'll definitely see these guys around Prague.Next visit to Prague I'm going to take another tour with this company just because of how fun they are. <3
Best decision of the trip!. Our Segway tour with Besi was amazing! Prague is the most beautiful city I've ever seen and this tour was the PERFECT way to see it!!!

Nice friendly and patient. I really enjoyed my Segway tour with guide Clara she was friendly and patient. The beauty of a Segway tour is you can go to the top of the hill and through the park with speed and very little effort. The parks, landscape and views where beautiful. I'm very happy I did this.

Gliding down Prague in a Segway. To anyway looking at a Segway tour of Prague, I highly recommend this tour company. Extremely professional and knowledgable guides with personalised service. The route is also unique and gives you a view of Prague from a different route. Thank you Clara for giving me such a beautiful experience.

You don't have to be young, just young at heart.. What amazing fun, learning a new skill when you're in your sixties! Our hotel, Pod Vezi recommended I love Segway, and we did! My partner and I booked a private tour. We spent 10 minutes learning how to drive followed by an hour and a half gliding up and down Petrin Hill. The late afternoon sun cast a magical spell and our guide made us feel both safe and special as he showed us the spectacular views and beautiful gardens. Highly recommended.
You have to try it!. I am sure you will enjoy it because I realy did...I took 1,5 hour tour and I saw Old town, Prague castle or Petrin Towel... All in one :) Thanks for that!

YES! Do this in Prague. Choose I Love Segway tours.. OK - yes, you can label me an "American tourist" but I really try not to embarrass myself when traveling in other countries. That is why I have avoided segway tours wherever I go in Europe. In most major cities you will see them and probably think to yourself - that looks ridiculous and how lazy can one be? Well the answer is yes, it does look ridiculous and yes, one can be very lazy, esp. when on vacation, but riding a Segway actually takes some balance and endurance skills. PLUS it's FUNNNNNNNNNNN! If you ever want to try it, do it in Prague. It's hilly and some of the coolest things are spread out so you can see a lot and laugh hard doing it. I highly recommend I love Segway company for this. The owner is super low key, happy and actually interested in making sure you are safe and having a good time. DO THIS. You won't regret it.
Lots of fun . We had an awesome time, definitely a must do. Very friendly guides who are locals so know everything there is to know about Prague.

Amazing. Segway!As a couple in our mid fifties, when we were looking to tour Prague a segway was not the first option that sprung to mind, we saw a few around town and asked our receptionist at Hotel Pod Vezi if he thought this was a good way to see the sights.He said it would be great, age no problem!After a little convincing he recommended, "I Love Segway" as it's a personal tour, so not so bad if you show yourself up. we were to meet the guide at our hotel at 10 the next morning.We met Klara, who was a lot, lot, younger than we were, she took us back to there office which has a quiet courtyard for practice in front of it,after a few minutes we were surprisingly road worthy and off we went.Klara was an excellent guide, letting us set the pace,we chose to go up through the parks for great views of the city, then onto the castle and back through parts of the city to the Charles bridge. Klara's knowledge of her home town was excellent and we had a great couple of hours touring round covering a much larger area than we would would have done on foot. So if you,re thinking about it but are feeling apprehensive, don't be it is as easy as it looks!

Fun - don't miss it. Thoroughly enjoyed the ride.. Towards the end of our trip we wanted to try out the Segway, well we had already finished the sight seeing tours so this was meant to be a fun ride.. As it would turn out Tom (our guide) was pretty good - happened to be a part time tour guide n Segway guide so gave a us a great tour around town, pretty relaxed stopped over for a coffee uphill (petran) & ended up spending about 2.5hrs instead of 1.5hrs. Tip - try getting a ride later in the evening when u get a better deal

Best way to see the sight without the huge hike up the hills. My husband had been dying to try out the Segways, they are so easy to use and so much fun, we went up the hills and got amazing views of the city. Whilst going up hill we were really glad we were not on foot. The only downside was my foot got cold from extended period of standing and not walking on it - lol. Klara was great, full of information, mindful of our needs and a fun energetic guide. Can't wait to it again when I get there next week.
Took great care of my family. Stan was a very responsible and knowledgeable guide. It was a safe experience. Would recommend. Would also suggest Sunday morning.

Superb Experience!. Matous was the highlight of our two-hour tour. He was friendly, polite, informative, patient, caring, protective, helpful, kind and much much more! We covered so much ground in two hours and felt that what we paid was all worth it. If only we knew they could have come to us the following day, we would have used him again. He continues to be of service way after the tour has ended. It was a highly enjoyable and memorable experience with I love Segway!
Definitely YES!!!. In short:i subscribes to all the previus comments,thx to stanislav i spent great time GOOD CHOICE!

The best Segway tour !. We took the ČESKÝ KRUMLOV EXPLORER with Stanislav, two hours outside of Prague.
Krumlov was so beautiful, although it was out of season.
The Segways were in a good shape and safe (unlike some other Segway tours we took in Prague).
We had really good time there and Stanislav was one of the reasons.

Liked it a lot!. In the middle of February i had a pleasure to go for a trip with I love Segway. Our guide and great instructor was Stanislav who took us on a trip according to our requests - we visited many beautiful places and took some photos. It was fun and i would definitely do this once again. Everyone should try!

Really top. it could have been a cloudy and cold tuesday, with our daughters complaining about visiting another museum... Instead, Stanislas made this day unforgetteable for the 4 of us... Great segway experience, really friendly and natural connection, excellent info sharing on Praha... We felt being taken care of while having great fun...
Don't miss it!
Recomended !. Was a very interesting private tour, the owners are very kind and nice, we got lots of exsplanations and recomendation of places to go. We will come back !

More than a tour... It's an Experience!. We had the good fortune to meet Stanislav on a rainy day in April 2014 while visiting the Charles Bridge. He had recently launched iLoveSegway. After discussing his tours, we scheduled a 2 hour tour for the following morning. 2 of our group of 4, had never ridden a Segway. Standa was kind enough to send a taxi to pick us up the next morning. We arrived at his office on time and ready to go. After a safety briefing and a few minutes of instruction, we were on our way. For the next 3.5 hours, we experienced Prague! Old Town, the three hills surrounding Prague, Lennon's Wall, racing through rose gardens... you name it, we saw it! Our trip to Prague was fantastic. Our tour with iLovesegway, stands out as our favorite activity. Standa (Stanislav) understands customer service and exceeding expectations. I highly recommend iLoveSegway

Great tour for kids!. My 10 year old boys did this tour with Stanislav in October and it was their favourite thing of the trip! I was initially unsure if the boys should do without me, as I couldn't take my 3 year old, but Stanislav immediately put me at ease and we all liked him right away. The boys got a lesson and safety rules and were off and running! Stanislav made sure they had a wonderful time and got a second guide to help to make sure everyone was safe. He took pictures and even a video for me, which was above and beyond! Next time, I'd like to go and am sure the boys will want to do I love Segway again! Thanks Stanislav!!!

***TOP PICK*** Stan is indeed...the MAN!. So I'm form New England, and have lived with our...how should I say this...."uniquely" laid out streets. When our forefathers were deigning these cities, you have to wonder if they were trying to make it as difficult to navigate as possible. If you need an example: Boston. If you've ever driven there, than you know what I mean...Until I traveled to Prague, Boston was, hands down, the most frustrating place to get around in. Now, without a doubt...Prague now tops this list. Now you must understand, being a commercial fisherman, my life revolves around navigating boats, often far from the sight of an land, to our gear, around other boats and back to the same spot from which we departed. All the while, constantly being aware of the direction of wind and tide. I'm saying all of this because whether I'm consciously keeping my bearings or not, I am always doing it. So when I had a week of overcast, and couldn't use the sun as a reference, I got lost more than a few times. I when I say lost...I mean like lost...lost.So when I got back to the hotel after the first day of aimlessly roaming around this amazing city, I was thinking I really needed to come up with a better strategy than the one I had...which to be honest...wasn't one at all. So after deliberation, I came up with three options:Plan 1) Group TourNow granted, I've been on some very good and very informative trolley tours in my travels, but I've also been on some VERY bad ones. And the day before, whilst walking the Prague streets, I saw a tour trolley, driver not saying a word, playing a recorded voice over a PA, while everyone furiously snapped photos out of the one side.I'm sorry, but I would rather shoot myself in the face then have to endure this...Plan 2) Rent a bicycleNow at face value this sounds like a great idea, until it dawned on me; I would be riding around just as confused as to where I was, what I was looking at, and where I was going as I was the day before...but I would simply be doing it faster than I would on foot.Plan 3) Ask the localsPlan 3 was by far the most productive!I asked the The Kampa Garden Hotel staff what their advice was. They recommended Stan at "I love Segway".Now, I wasn't sure if I did in fact love Segways. Especially since I saw different Segway companies very loudly and agressively arguing in Russian over what appeared to be a "turf" disagreement, in the Old Town Square the day before. It honestly all seemed kind of shady.But "I love Segway" was situated quite literally right around the corner from my quiet hotel, which was in a very nice part of the city, and thought I should at least give it a look. And I'm very glad I did! Stan runs his business out of a carriage house of a centuries old building owned by some Knights of something or other, nestled quietly in the back of a grassy courtyard that Beethoven was known to write music in. I'm not joking...I will say this, this is the PERFECT way to see a city! You are unrestricted as to where you go. Stan asks with a smile, "What would you like to see today?" You can decide what to see and where to go! And I can tell you what...Stan knows his city! And he speaks perfect English, and even lived in the States when he was young! I honestly have nothing negative to state... It was the perfect and personal way to see amazing and ancient city!Hands down, the best surprise of my trip!

It Was Such A great Experience We booked A 2nd Tour. We had spent 2 full days marching around Prague trying to get all the sites in, walking place to place. We had got to see not even half of what we wanted to see on foot in 2 days!. We were lucky to have a very helpful receptionist at our hotel who provided us with the contact details to Standa, the gentleman who runs I Love Segway as there was plenty of other companies who had flyers in our reception. We initially booked the tour for around Prague city. I had never rode on a segway before this experience. My girlfriend had neither but we picked it up in 10 minutes. We headed for Charles bridge and the square beyond. We took in all the regular sites of Prague initially. Then we went to areas where , not only were there no other segways around, but no other tourists either. It was a really great tour and in a single day we took in all the sights we had already seen on foot plus the other half that we didnt get to (and had a lot more fun doing it), which gave us more time for relaxing and having a few beers the following days. Excellent fun tour, great guides who will tailor a tour for your needs, (our tour ran over by 1 hour because of the extra sites we wanted to see and it was no problem for Standa, and he didnt even chrage us for it.) My girlfriend had always wanted to visit Czesky Kromlov which is about 2/3 hour drive from Prague. We asked Standa was there a possibility he could arrange a day trip for us down there with the segways and take in the sights there. He tailored the tour to suit us, at a very reasonable price and brought us on the most memorable trip we had ever been on. We got there early morning and beat the crowds. It really was amazing.Would I reccommend using I love segway (even if you haven`t used a segway before):Yes!Will I be using their services again: Definately Yes! I really wouldnt even look at another segway company there now. It was an all around fantastic experience and made our holiday.

Premium, Fun and Adaptive Tour. After one day of walking the streets of Prague we decided to let our feet rest. We’ve browsed tripadvisor app for possible Segway tours and followed our intuition to Stanislav’s Segway tours. We’ve explained to him what we had already seen in Prague and Stanislav had tailored a tour just for us in a fairly reasonable price. We started with training the Segway and after 5 mins we got the hang of it and hit the road. The tour was fun, professional, informative and above all, Stanislav himself is a great guy! The special treats in this tour were first having our pictures taken along the way and second getting hot tips for non-tourists/local places to hang out, dine and drink. WARNING: Stay away from Segway tours offered in the center (old town etc.).

I Love Segway!. I love the segway and I'm sure John Lennon would have loved too, if he could experience the ride with Stan. We enjoyed the tour extremely and spent memorable time with this great guy. Nice place in garden next to the John Lennon memorial , new clean Segways and best guide ever! Honestly recommend!
Amazing Standa! Thanks. Everything was just perfect. I have really enjoyed that trip together with my kid and friends. Thank you Stando. Rene

Very Recommended! It's a must to do in Prague. We took a private Segway tour with Stanislav two weeks ago and it was an amazing adventure. Stanislav is very nice and talented man. He has a lot of knowledge about Prague and its history. He is also very patient and polite and he made this tour romantic and unforgettable for us!

The best sag-way!!. If you ever thought of riding sag-way than this is the very best!!!
The guide is awesome and very much friendly with a lot of knowledge and experience.
We enjoyed the tour very much!!!!
Thank you stanislav from the visitors from Israel

Best Segway Tour in Prague. The tour was great not only because of the city but also the kindness of our guide Stanislav. We went to this beautiful castle thru a park where you can se prague from a nice point of view. The guide wait us so we can visit the castle and the we went back to the Jhon Lenon wall. Th experience was great and fun.Definitely I would do the longer tour the next time I visit Prague.

Best segway tour in Prague!. A little privet company with great guides,good price and a very fun tour.Stanislav, our guide was great, informative and above all friendly!an hour and 15 minutes strached to almost 2 hours just because we had so much fun and stan wasn't itching to go back. made us feel very relaxed and welcome.i really suggest anyone who want a segway tour to go to this place and enjoy!

Best way to see Prague!. My dad and I had a 2 hour private tour of the old city (having done the castle on foot the previous day) and I have to say it was the best tour I have ever been on. Our guide, Tom, was funny and informative and gave us the local's view, albeit on a Segway, of this amazing city. I can't recommend it highly enough!
Top. We did tow toursIts was amazing only because we got the pleasure to know the coach TOM he is awesome loves to help and so giving. He made our tour on Prague.
Easy and fun. Like having a day out with a friend showing you around Prague. Excellent fun! Never fear the Segway they are easy to learn and become like an extension of your body.

Great Tour!. We met Klara on our way to the Castle and made a reservation for the next morning at 11, but later that day we had time left and wanted do it spontaniously.We showed up at the office with the question if that was possible, and it was, even when she actually was done for the day. Very nice and generous!!We first had the time to practice, which they really took the time for. After that Klara took us on a beautiful tour through the hills and the park. She gave us a lot of information about the history of the city.If we would have done this by foot, it would have taken us hours. Because there were only two of us, it was a very personal experience. She really guided us while using the Segway, so it felt completely safe (and fun!).It really IS worth it: they take the time, they're informative, and also very friendly!Thumbs up!

Great time with a great guide!. We were looking for a Segway tour in Prague and almost went with one of the large operators. Then, by chance, we saw a sign for I Love Segway and walked into their office. Fortunately, Stanislav the owner was there and had some availability that afternoon. He gave as a fantastic tour of the castle area of Prague and Petrin Hill. He customized the tour for us so that we went and saw exactly what we wanted. We had no prior experience with Segways but Stanislav gave a great intro and we felt like pros in no time. I should also mention that he is a friendly, intelligent man who speaks perfect English. Thank you, Stanislav! Family with 2 boys ages 8 and 11

Best way to see Prague. We had the most amazing 3 hours touring Prague with Stan. We went up to the castle etc through the park and even stopped to pick and eat plums along the way. Stan is so easygoing and we would highly recommend him if you want a fun day. He's easy to find as he hangs out in front of the John Lennon wall. Enjoy!

Segway Adventures. We had a fantastic day with the 'I love Segway' family, Stan went out of his way to provide a full days entertainment. We were able to visit a small village, check out one of the most impressive castles I have ever seen, had lunch with the locals and travelled through the countryside on the segways. We highly recommend this ...... It was one of the best days we had on our most recent European holiday. Ignore all the other people promoting their segway sessions in the square and head to the Lennon wall where you will find Stan and his crew > you will not regret it!!!Wayne & Sharyn Goullet (Aust)

Best Segway Tour!. This was my third Segway Tour (other cities included Toronto and Baltimore) and the I Love Segway Tour in Prague was by far the best! It was a great way to visit the park and back roads near the Prague Castle. Stanislav was a great tour guide - his personal experiences growing up in this area coupled with his insights on history, interesting places to visit, and local places for food/refreshment made this tour truly unforgettable!

Thought I'd seen it all. We took a segway tour with visiting friends as something different to do since we are locals and have seen it all. Well it was really cool! FIrst, tour aside, using the Segway is a really amazing experience. I had never been on one and the first little loops and stops and start had us shaking out heads saying this is UNREAL! The guide Stanislav, friendly polite and funny, knowing we are locals, took us to see some things we had no idea existed and his enthusiasm and knowledge about Prague and its history spread to us. Unforgettable! we got some great pictures! I would recommend it sto anyone but especially people who are 'toured-out' and want to add something unique.

Wonderful tour guide. I tried segway with my friend and felt in love with this. The vehicle is full of fun, easy to handle, a great transportation within Prague which save us lots of time and energy. It took us two and a half hours traveling around the city, covering almost every important attraction. Our tour guide is brilliant, funny, very patient and cautious in taking care of us when riding segway. My friend felt down once but no harm and still enjoy the rest of the trip. Another plus is for taking picture while we riding segway. Absolutely recommended.
awesome！. This is the most unforgettable memory in our trip. We save time and S showed us interesting place that we definitely gonna miss if walked around by ourselves. I love segway!

Personal. I cannot imagine a more personal experience. Our tour was three people including Standa(the owner). Hearing his personal stories of growing up in a communist Prague was fascinating. He lived in upstate New York for years though so his English is great. We have never felt like we just took a random tour on cool segways(which were a blast), we felt like we made a friend. We did tours two days in a row. It is so great to tour a city with a local. Do it!
Great way to get to know Prague. Stanislav is a great guide and knows many interesting facts! Amazing sights and great host! Excellent choice!!

Best memory of our whole vacation!. This was an amazing experience! Stanislav is an excellent tour guide and Segway instructor. His location is perfect on the west side of the Charles Bridge. This was our first time on a Segway, and Stanislav made us feel very comfortable and safe.
