Good outer edges of Prague tour. There was only 3 of us on the tour but we still had a front and back guide which was great as they both brought their own unique and funny spin on things. The tour goes really quickly but you get a snack box and some water and we stopped at a cute local cafe with great coffee! You avoid most of the main tourist spots apart from Prague Castle so for me this was good as I could explore the rest on my own but if you want touristy then maybe look at something else! The bikes are amazing! Mary and the staff are fantastic, really friendly and confirmed my booking even though I did it after hours.

Best Idea we had all trip!. Had never gone on an EBike before - we were not disappointed! The bikes are a great and easy way to see a lot that Prague has to offer - and also gives you a good thrill!! From the very helpful and informative booking process to the snacks they pack for you along the way, these guys know how to look after you. The tour was informative and fun - cannot recommend it enough! Thanks to all the team at Ebike Prague Tours for a great experience

Stag do. Only member of 18 man party to try out this E-Bike tour and was not let down. Riding the E-Bike was great itself, but combining seeing this beautiful city made it an amazing experience. The bikes do the majority of the work which is great especially when climbing the hills. The tour guide was fantastic allowing enough time to enjoy each stop and giving you information on each landmark. I can not recommend this high enough. A must do when visiting this city!

Segway option the best!. We chose to segway with EBike instead, and we couldn't have been happier. 3 hr tour with snacks and water provided proved to be the perfection. The segway is surprisingly easy, my father is unfit and over 60, and had no difficulty. It was also comfortable and super fun. Our guide was informative and friendly. We learnt a lot of Prague's history and saw so much. I highly recommend it!

Birthday Trip to Prague. I had a great experience with this tour. I would recommend this as a unique way to see a vast majority of the city. It was a great orientation on our first day. The bikes worked well and were so much fun! The staff were wonderfully nice and provided lots of facts about Prague.

HIGHLIGHT of Prague!. My friend and I could not stop talking about this tour our entire trip. If you want to be able to see the tourist hot spots, and then really see Prague for all it's secret beauties, THIS is the tour for you. We were greeted by the shop owners who were SO kind, and given a low-down on the bikes by our guide Jenda. We were even given free cold water bottles to strap to the bikes for the ride. Our guide Jenda took us to the most fascinating, off-the-beaten path spots, telling us all kinds of neat historic trivia along the way. Arguably the best part: the BIKE. 5 hours on that thing and I swear I barely broke a sweat. The only negative was riding along cobblestone streets, which was a little difficult. If you're a little nervous on bikes like me, wear a pair of gloves; I got a little blister from holding the handles (and brakes!) too hard while going down bumpy cobblestones.That being said, I regret NOTHING. Hands-down, THE best tour experience I've ever had and the highlight of Prague. If you want all the excitement and wisdom from seeing Prague with a local, but none of the exhaustion of regular bike tours, this is the tour to go. Worth every penny.

Don't miss out on this!. My husband and I booked the tour through Mary who is quick to respond to requests. We paid cash upon arrival to the tour. We were given instruction on how an electric bike works which is very easy. This is the only way to do a bike tour in Prague as it is so hilly and the electric bike does a lot of the hard work for you. The tour guides were both from Czech Republic, Jenda and Linda and they were excellent!!! Lots of fun as well as great history and beautiful sites. I felt like we had great overview of Prague and so glad we did this tour.

Absolutely recommended!. The ebike tour was really really fun, actually one of the best things we've done in Prague. We've got to see amazing sights and views of Prague from different angles. Riding the bike was so easy - it suits anyone who knows to how ride a regular bike. The place owners, so as our guides, were very nice and welcoming. We would definately recommend ebike tour for everyone!

Best tour in Europe!. My wife and I only had 36 hours in Prague and decided to take the ebike tour. It was great! Our guides were Jenda and Linda and they were fantastic! Very funny and personable, you could tell they loved their beautiful city. The electric bikes were easy to get the hang of and really came in handy in this hilly city. We took 4 bike tours in Europe and loved them all, but in my opinion this was the best!

Loved this experience!!!. My sister and I just finished an e-bike tour with Charlie. We loved it and can highly recommend as a good introduction and overview to the beautiful city of Prague. From Charlie, we learned so much about the history of the city as well as knowing which stops we want to return to later in our trip. Booking was easily done via email. Everyone we dealt with today was friendly and very customer-oriented. You will not be disappointed!

The best way to see Prague. A great experience. The staff (owners?) could not have been more helpful. The bikes were of good quality and well maintained. The two guides were excellent. The tour was just right, a two hour trip around the outskirts of the city including Prague Castle, various gardens and woods and a riverside ride. The views were great and an unexpected picnic lunch on a bench overlooking the city sealed the deal. The ride included several quite steep sections but the bikes were well up to it. I am no lightweight, but even so, only gentle peddling was required to whisk me uphill at speed (my wife said that riding uphill felt like coasting downhill!). Overall, I cannot recommend this tour highly enough, definitely a highlight of the holiday.

Absolutely fantastic - strongly recommend. Highly recommend This Ebike tour is great, It takes you through the various areas of Prague, in a large loop, you get to see all of the sights, and you get just enough of each of them to what your appetite without much effort. also took us into a beautiful old neighborhood for a quick stop in a local cafe (really tasty coffee).Me and my husband takes a tour, we were a group of 5 great people, none of us was real biker. Our guides were very friendly, helpful, and most importantly knowledgeable, i think they was Andy and her mate (forgot his name but he was very funny and great guide). We had so much fun on the e-bike tour of Prague, Highly recommend this activity.

Fun and Easy!. This Ebike tour is great! The ebikes make it very easy to navigate this hilly city! the guides are very friendly and knowledgeable, and you get a snack! the views were wonderful, but keep in mind you do not get to enter any of the attractions they list on the route with the exception of prague castle. moreover, may of the sites they list you don't actually bike to- simple see it from a far (example: national theater). I would say, if you want a more in-depth look at any of the locations on this bike, I would do a dedicated tour there. if you're short on time and want a great overview of the city, this tour is for you.

See the city in 1 day!. Riding on an ebike is a great way to see the entire city in one day. Then you can pick out the parts you want to go back and visit. The tour guides were funny, helpful and just great people to be with.The only surprising part of this tour was all the cobblestone roads you have to ride on, OY! Just be prepared for a bumpy ride.

Our favorite part of Prague! Beautiful views, great guides, etc.. I will simply ditto what other reviewers have said about the quick response and friendliness of the owners (Mary & husband) and the great guides! I will also ditto that this is an exhilarating and entertaining way to cover almost 10 miles of Prague with very little effort. We were considering dong Segways instead but after seeing numerous Segway accidents I'm so glad we picked EBikes.I also loved the yummy picnic snack they provide while enjoying a panoramic view of one of the world's most beautiful cities. I would highly recommend this to anyone. My boyfriend (who loves to complain) even LOVED this tour although he did recommend that the guys wear some "supportive" briefs for this ride as much of it is over bumpy cobblestone roads!

Great way to start your trip.. My husband and I ended up on a private tour when another couple didn't show. Alois was the perfect guide, informative, personable and fun to be with. The eBikes were great. In perfect condition and easy to ride. It's the perfect way to get a taste of each part of the city at the beginning of a trip. Very professional and friendly establishment. Would recommend it to anyone.

Great tour, knowledgable and friendly guides. We just finished our first Ebike tour selected based on fellow Trip Advisor ratings and were delighted with the entire process. From scheduling to arrival to the tour itself, the owners and staff are incredibly welcoming, friendly and gave us a great amount of detail in our overview tour of Prague. The e-bikes themselves are very simply to use and what a treat to fly up hills with ease. Highly recommend and would book with this company again in a heartbeat.

A great way to cover some serious distance and see the beautiful sights on Prague. If there is one way to see Prague, this is it! We did this on our first morning in Prague. There are beautiful parks and lookouts stretching for kilometres either side of the castle - this tour takes your through these beautiful parks and gardens, as well as through the castle grounds and lesser quarter.The guides are humorous and knowledgable. The packed lunch (if you do the morning tour) is fantastic and the e-bikes make a very hilly ride very easy. Highly recommended to get your bearings, see some beautiful views that you would probably miss and have a great time in the process.

Thoroughly enjoyable tour with a difference. A highly recommended activity. Great to be able to cover such a large distance and hilly terrain without much effort. Both guides were very informative, an excellent day and well worth the money. We are so impressed with the electric bikes we are going to look into getting some when we get home.

If your going to do one "touristy" thing in Prague.... This has to be it, we booked from trip advisor recommendations so expectations were mixed. When we arrived everything was done properly and the lady who I spoke to over email was friendly and welcoming and her partner sorted the equipment and bikes out. The tour then began with a small group of 5 and two guides and off we went. I found the guides brilliant, with one a local Czech girl and the other a Catalonian woman who lived in Prague for many years. They were both informative and fun. This tour was the high light of our whole trip. So much so that we talked about it non stop for the final three days we were there. We even enquired about the Segway tour they did as we enjoyed the experience so much. We couldn't recommend this higher enough.A key factor making this to be so good is the two tour guides - we tried another tour who only used one guide and we were unable to see some of the sights up close. Not with e-bike. One guide stayed with the bikes and allowed us to go inside and explore. They were brilliant. If your going to Prague you must must must use these over any other.

BEST tour ever! BEST owners and guides!. We went on our ebike tour today. We did a private tour and it was perfect! Laura was our guide and was very fun, incredibly knowledgable and all in all a fabulous guide! Mary and her husband were fantastic! Mary communicated with me via email prior to our arrival and was just so lovely! We would do this tour over and over again. The picnic area was breathtaking and the food was perfect. We have done many tours all over the world and THIS has been our favorite and we will be back

Introduction and overview perfection!. Really appreciated our tour hosted by Laura and Linda. It was our first full day in Prague, and we felt we got a perspective on the layout of the city as well as a bit of history that served us well all week. Inclusion of public art and possible interpretations especially interesting. All staff VERY friendly and helpful. We were a group of only 3 because of possible bad weather and am grateful they went ahead with small group. We had a wonderful time. Prepare for bumpy ride on cobblestones but ebikes made all the difference.

Top experience. Just finished a wonderful tour on ebikes. Our guides,Alois and Laura were so fun,friendly and informative. Saw so much in 3 hours that we'd never have made it to on foot. The bikes are brand new and seemed superior to others we saw nearby. 100% recommended,especially if you're short on time.Thanks too to the lovely English owners,so friendly and professional and very quick to respond to emails.

Great tour! Great ride! Great City!. I will totally recommend this tour! You will see the Castle and the nice parks around the lake Vistula! Some awesome views! I took an ebike tour! Riding ebike was easy and pretty straightforward. I can totally recommend my tour guide (her name was Sage). Very friendly and knowledgable! They also give you a small snack!

Tour. We did the ebike's tour.Firstly the ebikes are fun and will make you feel like a child again with the extra boost.The tour is not too tough or tiring the electric motor does almost all the work.The route brings you to many well known spots and to some cool views of the city.The ebikes at 44eurp (1200cz) is a bargain considering 3hours of tour.

120% recommended. This is my second time in Prague and my first time to take a tour on e-bike. The company has a great customer service, they responded my e-mail inmediately and booked me in without any issue.the bikes are great and suitable even for elder people, the legs do not really feel the 17 km of the tour.The tour is absolutely great and the tour guide takes the crew to best places of Prague, some of them only known by locals. Laura (from Spain) is an entusiasthic and charming tour guide that makes sure you get the best out of your trip.Keep the great job guys!Jorge Engfucxi Mexico City

Highlight of our trip. Everything about our 'ebike' experience was excellent. The bikes are amazing and so easy to use. The guides (Laura & Alois) were both great fun and gave us great info as we cycled round. We had the novelty of a snow storm half way round but Laura quickly found us a beer cellar to hide out in! The views of the city while on the tour are fantastic and its a great way to see Prague. Ebike thoroughly deserve their #1 rating. Great value and great fun.

Fantastic!!. My partner and I have just returned from a fantastic Segway tour with the lovely Alois. I could not compliment the whole experience enough to do it full justice!! I was slightly scared of the Segway to begin with but had time to get used to the machine before the tour departed. Alois was very thoughtful and helpful at all times. His knowledge of the city and advice was greatly appreciated.Once I had got settled into riding the Segway, the tour itself took in fantastic sights as well as amazing views of the city from the hills. The owners are also so welcoming and very helpful. They went above and beyond to help me find a vegetarian restaurant as well as a pedicure salon, both of which I found with ease - thank you very much!!!To put it simply - this is an experience you cannot miss when in Prague!!!!!

A great way to see the city close up. I recommend the tour. It takes you through the various areas of Prague, in a large loop, and you get just enough of each of them to whet your appetite. Three of us took the tour, none of us real bikers, so we were very happy to have the electric boost on the hills of Prague. Our guides were very friendly and helpful, and most importantly knowledgeable. We were able to see where we wanted to spend some more time later on, and which areas we could skip.

A brilliant choice to explore the parks of prague. Do not miss the private segway tour of Ebike !!Sage our guide was very professional with lots of knowledge on every spot.It's wonderful way to look at Prague with a little bit of extreme and tons of funnnnn!!!Thx for lovely experience,Osnat & Assaf

Nice new EBikes, 2 pleasant guides - a great way to see Prague. In the run up to our booking, the weather was touch and go. We explained to Mary that we would not go on the tour if the weather was poor ie. raining. This wasn't an issue for Mary which was nice. (we understand that by us cancelling, they would lose money so we appreciated this a lot)On arrival, the front desk confirmed our booking, took payment (1000Kcr per person), introduced us to our guides and gave us our bikes. This is a very organised and smoothly run business.The bikes are like new and in perfect condition (better than other companies in Prague). We were given a short demo on how to use the bikes eg. the electric functions. You also get a packed lunch for the trip.The tour itself takes 3 hours and covers some tourist spots like the Castle, the Petrin Tower and a few very nice parks with very nice views of the city. The tour guides were very informative and the tour was not rushed at any time. We had lots of time for breaks to take photos, a tour of the castle, the lennon wall etc.The bikes were great fun and the level of effort (I had a whiskey hangover) was minimal even when going up steep hills. The assistance provided by the battery/motor makes is incredibly easy, almost antigravity like! Tip: do not be put off by the physical effort required to cycle these bikes, they only require you to move your legs!I would highly recommend this company for bike tours in Prague. If you're in Prague for a few days, it's a must do.

Ebike is number 1 in my book..... Fantastic Tour!. My husband and I chose Ebike purposely rather than the highest rated Segway tour. My theory is that the number 1's get too popular and do not try as hard as the ones ranked slightly lower (and 1's tend to be more expensive). Ebike was fantastic. I highly recommend them for the service, professionalism, price, and the fact that the tour guide wore a safety helmut just like us. We booked ahead but were very unhappy as a couple of hours prior to our tour it was blowing snow. We wondered how hard it would be to cancel when they called and gave us the option to reschedule which we instantly did for the next day. Our tour guide Alois was funny and informative and flexible on our 3 hour tour zipping around the city. We also stopped at the monastery brewery for a warm soup. A much needed respite during a very cold 3 hours. This is a must-do tour for those traveling to Prague as you get to see further away places than you might see venturing just on foot. Ebike is the way to go....

Must do in Prague!!. Me and 3 friends visiting Prague for a few days decided on using eBike and it was a brilliant choice. Mary who works there was brilliant and made the whole process easy! Spoke fluent English as she was originally from Newcastle. Great tours guide and personalised the tour on what the four of us wanted to do and see. Took us to some perfect spots on the Segways and also provided a small snack box! These guys are amazing and you must choose them when you are in Prague, there are many others out there that will try and approach you and give you great deals but for what you get with these guys is great value for money. Highly recommended!

3 Hour Segway tour. my wife and I had the most amazing time, our guide was on the ball extremely knowledgable, friendly and on the ball the whole time, a must do way off seeing Prague and a Segway is just so much fun !!,it's run by a British couple, Mary and her husband were so professional, helpful and really cared about you having a great time, recommend to all, this is the company in Prague to use

Great people, great tour!. My husband and I did a Segway tour and it was just amazing. The guide was knowledgeable about the history of Prague and took us around Prague through alleys and through central locations. Excellent service, very nice people. Highly recommended.

Best way to do it!. My boyfriend and I just completed the three hour Segway tour and we can without doubt say that the ebike Segway tour was the best thing we have done! You are able to see so much of the city without feeling rushed, stopping in all the nooks and crannies that a tourist wouldn't find. Our guide was extremely knowledgable and interesting. Sol and Mary the owners were so friendly they quickly settled any nerves I had about getting on the Segway. I will be recommending the ebike Segway tour to all my friends and family!

A must do when visiting Prague!!. We had an awesome experience yesterday on the Ebike tour! We called a little later than the scheduled tour time and Mary was nice enough to set something up for my two friends and I an hour later. Very easy to ride and not much effort due to the electric "help" on the bikes lol. Check out the pictures

Excellent. On a short break with my daughter I wanted to make sure she saw as much of Prague as possible and have fun. Booking the Segway tour via the hotel concierge we saved being hassled by the many Segway guides that hang around the city centre. Sol and Mary the owners were so welcoming (fellow Brits!) they introduced us to alois our guide. The segways and e bikes they use are all new and robust. We toured for three hours and learnt and saw so much!! Whilst we had walked much of the route alois made sure we saw some hidden gems too. We felt so safe and looked after! This company just do private tours so your not stuck with a large group, loads of photo opportunities. We booked out of season but they totally accommodated our needs. Totally recommend this company for all round service, knowledge and price, we paid 1.300 czk per person (approx£40) for the 3 hours including a picnic which was a fraction of the cost of some touts in town! Loved it! Thank you

A great day out on the e bikes. Saw the great feedback for the E bikes and decided to book a tour guide was knowledgeable and helpful they tailored our tour. took us to places that we would probably not have found they must thing to do if in Prague

Fantastic Segway Tour. Could not speak more highly of the segway tour that we went on with Ebike Prague Tours! Enquired about booking a private tour for two with only 24 hours notice, received a reply within 5 minutes by e-mail and was booked/confirmed within 15 minutes. The tour itself was fantastic, my partner was a bit hesitant about riding a segway at first but got the hang of it very quickly and now seems keen to ride one again given the opportunity! Lasting for just over 3 hours and covering over 10 miles we were taken from the Ebike office near the Old Town, over the river for stunning views of city from a part you'd otherwise probably never visit, then over towards the Prague Castle. Near Prague Castle we nipped in at the Strahov Monastery Brewery for a break to warm up a bit and get a drink, our tour guide also brought a complimentary packed lunch for us which was quite nice. The ride back towards the Old Town through Petrin Park was probably the highlight for me as it offered such nice views of the city all from the comfort of a segway! Our tour guide was Alois, he was very friendly and knowledgeable and helped make the tour one of the big highlights of our trip :). If you're interested in seeing a lot of the city in a unique way without all of the walking this is definitely the way to do it!

Great bike tour. I have the highest praise for Ebike Prague Tours. The tour was fun and informative and the guides were great. It was a wonderful way to start our three days in Prague, giving us a great overview (some from an overlook!) of Prague. The guides were helpful and friendly; it was almost like having old friends take you around their town.And the ebikes were easy to use and quite fun -- I'm sold on ebike tours and will take them in the future when I visit other cities.

Highlight of my trip. I absolutely loved our ebike tour. I think everyone should do it, it's a great way to see the city. It was probably one of my favourite parts of my trip to Prague. Great value for money. Our tour guides were great, I think their names were Micheal and Laura. It was two months ago so I can't be sure. They were full of great facts and clearly loved the city. They also recommended restaurants, bars and other attractions to go see. They took the time afterwards to write down addresses and made sure we know where we were going. Lovely people, I felt like I knew them for years. The owners of ebikes were an English couple. They made sure were warm enough with hats, gloves and jackets. I feel like the staff all went the extra mile for us. It was also a very personal tour, with only four of us and two guides. The tour starts about 10 minutes from the old town and is easy to find. It's across the road from the beer museum. Which is actually a pub which offers samples of all the different types of Czech beers. We went in after our tour. The bikes were very easy to use. Very little effort required and I was not tired afterwards. Perfect way to get up those hills.

An Amazing experience!!. Me and my boyfriend took a bikes tour and its was amazing! The guides were so nice and lovely, we had a great time with them. This tour got as In love with Prague. I recommend everyone who comes to Prague to do this tour. It's gives you the opportunity to see such a beautiful places and views in Prague.
No more regular bikes!. I loved it I loved it and again I loved it. I'm not sure what's better. If the super power bikes or the people running this company. Thank you Mary and Sol! Kendra & Jack

Great way to see Prague! Excellent service and really friendly operators. My boyfriend and I were visiting Prague in early December and wanted to do a city tour. From researching and speaking to friends, we were told that the sights of Prague were quite spaced out and a walking tour would be quite tiring. We contacted eBike for the late afternoon tour and they very promptly responded and suggested a slightly earlier start time so that we can make the most of the daylight. When we arrived, the owners were very friendly and offered us very useful information and tips for staying in Prague. He also very helpfully suggested I borrow a wind breaker (which I am extremely grateful for as it was freezing that day!). Since we were the only customers that day and we essentially got a private tour of Prague from Laura who was great! You can tell she has a real passion for Prague and we got a real kick out of a trick she showed us at the Prague Castle where you stand at a small amphitheatre and when you speak you hear it echo back at you but only you can hear it. The bikes were really easy to use and needed almost no pedalling!All in all it was a great experience and we got to see the beauty of Prague in a really fun way. I would highly recommend this as a must do if visiting Prague.

The most fun sightseeing experience you can have. We had so much fun on the e-bike tour of Prague. You get to see all of the sights, as well as visit some sights off of the beaten path. The ebikes are easy to use and so much fun around town. Our tour guide also took us into a beautiful old neighborhood for a quick stop in a local cafe, where we were able to relax, talk to the other guests, and learn more about the city. Highly recommend this experience!

Absolutely fantastic - strongly recommend. An excellent and memorable experience, probably one of the highlights of our trip. Impressed by the tour guide (sorry forgot her name as it was a few months ago) and nice touch with the packed lunch for the break half way through.Rather than taking us around the usual places she showed us some quaint and interesting places around town and had a decent level of general / historical knowledge.Thanks again. would recommend.

We used ebikeprague.com and LOVED it - what a blast!. I so highly recommend this. You just pedal lightly to keep the battery charging and that's it - no effort or musclepower needed, even up the steepest of hills. It was an absolutely fantastic and fun way to see Prague and I reckon you must do it! They also give you a lunch pack to take so don't do what we did and rush down a lunch first! Saw lots of things, got lots of info and had lots of fun, with no effort!

Brilliant Tour & Guide. The ebike tour was fantastic as it was the last day of the season until spring and we were the only ones on it!! The tour guide was very knowledgable and passionate about the city and took us to places we would never have visited by foot. The bikes are superb, as there is no effort needed even when going up hills!! I want one!! On the tour you are given a little snack pack and water, which you can consume when having a rest half way round. We poted for a warm drink inside as it was rather cold on the day we were doing the tour 30th Nov. I can fully recommend this tour if you want to see more of the city from a bike but without the effort!!

The best way to see the city. This was one of the highlights of our entire trip! What a great way to see the city, and the outreaches, too, without walking your feet off. The "E" stands for "electric", in that the bikes have a small, powerful electric motor to power the bike. Very little pedaling was necessary on the entire tour, which covered a lot of territory. You will see things that you probably never would find on your own that are far outside the touristy parts of town. Our guide, a very informed and personable young man(Charles?) was just great. He was both knowledgeable and entertaining. He knew a lot of the city history and told it in a very entertaining way. Also, a small picnic snack was included and a nice rest stop for enjoying it. Highly recommend you take this tour. If you do, make sure you know where it is located and how to get there. We got lost on the way and missed our original tour time, but got in on the tour that afternoon.

I wanted to do it again!. Had so much fun on this e-bike tour. Firstly, this is the first time I've ever been on an e-bike, and it was an absolute blast. They are super easy to ride, even uphill!The tour itself was fantastic, although felt a little bit rushed at Prague Castle. Lunch stop was at a wonderful pub. I'm now looking into e-bike tours in every city I visit - that's how great my memory of this was!

A good way to visit Prague and have a large view of historical sites. Today, my wife and me visited Prague on a Segway! What a funny and restful way to visit a large part of the city in a bit more than 3 hours.It was our first time with a Segway and it just took a few minutes learn to drive it! So easy!!We've choosen eBike, discovered on an ad´ and enjoyed their professionalism and kindness (they proposed us a hot jacket and gloves).This trip allows us to decide wich site we want to discover deeper in the too coming days.I don't what about the other companies, but I can recommend eBike!!Last point: I think it's better to book your tour one or two days before (not sure but that´s what I've done by mail).

Incredible Views! Sensational experience!. From the moment I met the owners I knew I was in good hands. I had a most excellent time on the ebike tour and Karel "Charlie" was an exceptional guide. Very knowledgeable and great sense of humor. The ride was beautiful. It was my first time on the evoke and it was just awesome. Simple to use and perfect for a leisurely ride around the city. I look forward to returning to Prague with my wife and booking another tour.

Great way to see wonderful prague. In early November, my daughter and I took the tour with "EBike Prsgue" and we liked it very much. The morning was overcast and a little rainy and we got just the two of us on a tour but still we decided to go out and we enjoyed every minute of it. The staff greeted us very nicely and immediately after brief explanation how to drive the electric bicycle, whice was easy to drive and without any physical effort, we went with Karel who is an amazing guide, very nice and very knowledgeable. During the trip he took us to "Letna park" ,which is a lovely park, with beautiful autumn trees with almost no people around and where we got also a beautiful panoramic view of Prague. We toured places tourists usually do not come and we managed to see a lot in a short time. The tour was very enjoyable and the guide was great. We strongly recommend Ebike.

AMAZING! Fun & friendly - great way to spend a few hours in Prague. My wife and I booked it on the internet. From the beginning, Mary was in immediate contact answering any questions about their program and how to find them in the city. Our tour guides were Karel and Linda - both amazing people who took us on a ride around Prague, from Old Town, over the river, through the beer garden, up the hill to Castle, then a provided picnic lunch at an old monastery. Then back down the hill, along the river and back to old town. If you've ever been on a simple bike, these are a piece of cake! The motor provides the extra push when you need it and we easily pedaled up hills and around the city with virtually no physical effort. When we finished, my wife and I felt like Karel and Linda had become our friends. They showed us the city and kept a sense of humor throughout the entire trip. HIGHLY RECOMMEND IT! Worth the money - especially for your first time to Prague.

Fun way to see Prague!. We had a great time on our ebike tour of Prague! There were four of us with a guide who safely toured us through the city. Mateo of us were a bit nervous about biking on the city streets and our guide reassured us and gave very specific info regarding exactly where we would be riding. We saw so many wonderful sites and even stopped along the way for a great beer and lots of pictures.

Great views, bikes and guides!. A group of 6 of us spent weeks all over Europe and this bike tour was one of the most pleasant surprises- we all agreed. We went on a whim at the suggestion of our hotel concierge and had an AMAZING time. Our tour guide, Laura, was the best. She loves the city and tailored the sights to what she could tell our group would like (i.e., spent a little more time at the brewery!) She was so great that we invited her out with our group later that evening. She showed us how Prague really lives at night. It was great fun.

Awesome. We took the 3 hour Segway tour. It was awesome. We saw beautiful views of Prague. The guide was great and very friendly, and told us interesting stories along the way. We even had a nice small picnic. The ride was easy and we had a lot of fun. Very easy to book in the internet. A must do !!!

Great tour! I want to buy an Ebike now!. You need to know something..... an ebike will ruin you for all regular bikes in the future. They are so easy and so much fun! We had 2 great tour guides - Jerda and Andrej - that were knowledgeable and HILARIOUS! They really made the tour for us! The tour started with a quick tutorial and then we were off! The tour went all around Prague and we had some great view points of the city. We went to the castle complex and walked around (no bikes allowed) with one of the tour guides. He took as all around the castle complex. Next we went to an old monestary for a beer (not included) and a pretty good packed lunch with some snacks (included in the price of the tour). After a few more stops it was time to turn in our bikes. I loved this tour, it didnt go as in depth into some of Prague's sights as I may have wanted but it was a great overview to the city to see what I did and didn't want to go back to! Key to this tour for me were the hilarious guides, wonderful service at the home office and the EBIKES!!!!!!

Must do.. Saw the brochure at hotel reception and thought I'd give it a go. It was the highlight of my trip overseas. The staff were very friendly and most helpful. The electric bikes were fantastic and even uphill was no problem. The tour took us to places not accessible to tour buses and went much further than you could walk. Tour guides were very knowledgeable and funny too. Lunch was also provided.

My Best Tour in Prague. Me and my wife, made several tours in Prague at our first and single visit there. It is definitely the best one. Our guide explained us all interesting facts about this beautiful city, in his excellentstyle. I I think it is the best way to make a tour on bicycle , because i let us to feel the atmosphere of the city and to visit many interesting and beautiful places and views at the same time in . If we visit Prague again, we'll make Ebike tour again for sure , and recommend to do it to every visitor of this lovely city.
The best way to know prauge!. The guides (charlie and brett) were amazing! Thwy were kind and helped us locate places to party and places to travel in. Loved them so much!
great and fun trip. good way to see the city's beautiful view, also, very fun. The gides are amazing! Highly recommended.

Best tour I've been on. Beginning with amazing tour guides means you really can't go wrong in such a beautiful place as Prague. I would recommend this to everyone, it was the highlight of my Europe holiday. One of our guides took photos during the trip as well and these are emailed to you for free at the end, I really can't recommend this tour enough! Thank you so much for the great experience and the very interesting stories along the way.

The highlight of our visit !. We booked a private Segway tour for our family of four and it was great. Mary (the owner) was very friendly and helpful and we felt good that we chose this tour company over others. we had a lovely tour guide, Laura, who really loves the city of Prague and lead us safely through the alleys and hills on the Segway, providing us with information and explanation and of course the beautiful views of the city itself. Highly recommended !

Great experience . This was our first e-bike experience and we liked it a lot! The Ebike tour is a perfect supplement on the ‘standard’ visits around the city centre, it shows the area that you will not easily do by foot. Handling the Ebike is very easy and can be used by all ages and experience.The information of the guide was really interesting and he was really open to further explain on details or customize part of the tour (luckily we were the only participants). Additional he supported on recommending good restaurants and bars. Even a small picnic was included.

Highlight of our trip!. Prague is a truly beautiful city and E-bikes is a brilliant way to see vast parts of the city during the 3 hour tour. As long as you can ride a normal bike, then you will be able to ride an E-bike. It is easy to do and lots of fun. The organisers are English and are really friendly and the 2 Czech guides were fun, informative and knowledgeable (particularly about where to find the best beer!). It is great for your self-confidence to cycle uphill with virtually no effort required at all. We would recommend this for anyone who wants to get a great view of Prague. It is so good it is even worth leaving the pubs for a few hours.

A great new adventure!!!!. This was my first time on an ebike and It was a resounding success. They ensured we knew how to use the ebikes and then had a guide in the front and the back of the group. This gave us great comfort. They customized the tour based on our preferences as we progressed through the tour which made the experience all the more pleasurable. After walking through Berlin, Kraków, Bratislava and Budapest......ebikes is a great way to see a city and not exhaust yourself. Two thumbs up to Ebikes, Burt and Karol.

An experience not to be missed.. I am not a young person & I have some physical ailments that make walking long distances uninviting. My partner & I only had three days to explore this beautiful city. Ebike was the answer. I admit that I was reluctant at first because I had not ridden a bicycle for many years. All my anxieties were very quickly dispelled. The machine itself is an absolute delight to ride, one becomes very quickly adapted to it and yet you still get the joy of some physical activity in the fresh air. I found it so much better than being crowded into a tour bus and shuffled from one amazing venue to the next. The staff were very friendly and welcoming. Although we were a small group (only 3 customers) we were still provided with two guides, Karelia & Bert. As I understand it, Karel is a born and bred local and Bert, an American, has been in Prague for a long time. Their knowledge and ability to convey the real heart of Prague was exceptional. The tour took us everywhere we wanted to go, gave us the basis of an extended personal visit to magnificent sites in the following days. We had a chance to see this city from a viewpoint I am sure others missed. The lunch and the venue we enjoyed it at was brilliant. I particularly enjoyed having a beer with Bert.I was particularly impressed with the safety aspect of the tour. Like all European cities I have encountered the traffic was generally erratic. As an Australian I was not used to riding on the "wrong" side of the road. Karel led the group and Bert was the "safety" man, swinging wide at the rear of the group to ensure no unsuspected car, bus, tram surprised us. Apart from my own inadequacies, I could not have felt safer.Another pleasant surprise is that the company provided us with digital photographs of our journey, a great souvenir.I would say, without hesitation that anyone who goes to Prague and does not take this tour misses out on a great opportunity.

Fun and informative tour of the city. We were looking for a different way to tour the city - eBikes were the answer. We had two great tour guides that were a wealth of information about Prague. They provided a nice history of Prague and answered all of our questions. They also provided some recommendations for pubs, restaurants and other places to visit in Prague. The eBike was effortless. A great way to see and learn about Prague!

Fabulous!. This was the highlight of our 16 day trip to Europe! The bikes were very easy to ride and the route they take you on is absolutely beautiful and scenic. Prague is amazing! There is a tour guide in the front and one in the back. Our tour guides were Karel and Bert and both were extremely friendly and knowledgeable. They bring you around the city to the highest point where you see the incredible Prague Castle. They pack you a lunch and you have the opportunity to purchase a beer with your picnic. I was a little nervous about the electronic bikes and almost backed out And I will tell you that would of been a very big mistake. I was never nervous or felt uncomfortable at all. All I can say is do the Ebike tour you won't regret it!'

Fun and relaxing way to see the city!. This was my first time on an ebike and it was awesome! It was practically effortless. I normally get tired after walking around for a few hours touring the city, but after seeing the city by ebike I was still energetic enough for several activities afterwards! The guides were great! Very informative and funny! They took us through the city for amazing views! We even stopped at a brewery for a beer/picnic! The group we were with was really fun, we all became friends and went to the "TRAP" activity listed on tripadvisor after together!To sum it up:Amazing tourFantastic tour guidesMet great peopleAll at an amazing valueI'm sounding like a commercial, but give it a shot! You won't be disappointed!

Fantastic way to see Prague. We really enjoyed the ebike tour. We only had 2 days to explore the city and ebikes were fast and effect and effortless. If you are seeking exercise this would not be a good choice. We enjoyed our tour guides and loved Prague. They even offer a picnic lunch and gave great recommendations on local pubs to explore. Loved it!!

Loved it!. This was so fun and an extremely great way to get to know Prague! The bikes were extremely easy to ride with a good boost for the hills. Mary, Karel, and Andre were informative and extremely professional. No worries about safety- there was both a guide to lead and one in the back for safety. Mary also sent a camera along to have the guides take pictures along the way to be emailed later. They really go above and beyond.

Simply the best way to experience Prague!. Very helpful and friendly staff! Will definitely take another tour next time I visit Prague, One little tip: If you are visiting Prague in summer time (because then the sun will set later than winter time) I suggest you take the last ebike tour which was around 18:00 I think. Then you will have this beautiful sunset view while biking, all tourists will be long gone to their dinners; so streets/tourist attractions will be less crowded and you may be the only ones taking the tour-like us :) Just don't leave Prague without this experience..
Brilliant trip. Highly recommended tour _ easy,fun and informativeAbout 20km ride _ no sweatGuides friendly and very very good. Do it

The best fun in Prague. Wheeeeeeeeeeeeee! If you're in Prague, you'll have seen Petrin Hill. Imagine riding down that on a bicycle. It's more fun than I can describe. Of course, you have to cycle up it too, but with the Ebikes, it's easy. Just hit the boost button and off you go.The tour was informative and interesting, and took us to several places we wouldn't have known to visit otherwise. We stopped at a brewery for beer or wine, and sat on the grass with a free snack - a really tasty cheese roll, a twix and an apple. The guides were friendly and welcoming. One small criticism was that the pace was slower than I would have liked - but I think the guide thought so too! It wasn't his fault some members of the group kept hanging back.This was the most enjoyable part of our week's holiday - I highly recommend it! No need to worry about fitness - the bikes make riding near effortless.

Awesome adventure!. Mary and her team are awesome. E-bikes are such an easy way to get to see the sights in Prague. Our tour guide Linda was excellent and we made stops along the way to learn about Prague and take in the breathtaking views from up above the city. Our packed lunch was very yummy and we even got to buy a beer from a local brewery and each in a park outside! This tour is a must do for anyone visiting Prague for the first time or for anyone who wants a fun adventure!!

Best way to see Prague! eBike for life!. Our group of six friends spontaneously decided to do the three hour afternoon eBike tour on our last day in Prague. We all had an absolute blast and agreed it was the best way to see the city and one of the most fun activities we did during our two weeks traveling throughout Europe. The bikes are very easy to use and the motor and BOOST POWER make you feel like a professional cyclist with minimal effort. Laura was a fantastic tour guide and told us great stories about the history of Prague and tailored the tour to our interests. She has a great sense of humor and made the tour even more special. Definitely an activity we will recommend to everyone!

Fun way to see the city, little historical info. The ebike experience was a lot of fun. You get to effortlessly go around Prague especially to get to know the highest spots in the city like the castle. The bikes are new and very easy to operate, there's a team of 2 guiding you so there's always someone at the back checking that nobody is left behind, and our guide was very fun to talk to and be with. The only reason I didn't give it a 5 star rating is because in other cities I've done bike tours in (Ljubljana, Vienna, Munich) the guides have studied and give you a History lesson along the way. This was the only bike tour we did on our travels where the tour guide didn't know more that the basic facts about the city. Otherwise if you're not into Historical facts, this is the best bike tour in Prague.

Just Outstanding. This tour is outstanding in so many ways. First, their e-bikes are the best I have ever ridden. The tour itself took in most of all the major sights in Prague, including the Prague Castle. The owners are from the UK and take great care of you. There really nice folks.If you get to Prague and want a bike tour, look no further!
Best ever. First time using ebikes. What a great experience! Extremely friendly owners and tour guides did an awesome job!

Fun, effortless, informative and awesome. A class act!. Just took this tour yesterday and am extremely satisfied. First of all, Prague is a relatively compact city, but the bike tour does indeed expand your range over walking to great vistas. Second, I was concerned about the ebikes being too easy. They do make biking effortless, but if you want a little exercise, just hit the button and you're on a multispeed city bike. If you want to cruise, you're pedaling just to get going, the bikes take care of the rest. Most importantly, the staff is phenomenal. After an informative and friendly overview by Linda, our guide Karel led us on a fun, super informative and fantastic tour. He really made the tour special and shared his knowledge as well as answered any questions we had about the Czech sites and culture. Highly recommended! (even for those who don't bike)

Highly Recommend! Great service and an amazing way to familiarize yourself with Prague.. First of all, the customer service was super friendly! Mary, Bert, and Karlov were amazing! I would recommend taking this tour as soon as you get to Prauge, that way you will have a good understanding of how the city is laid out and you can better plan the rest of your stay. Biking through Prauge was beautiful and fun. The tour guides, Karlov and Bert, were very informative and never boring. They were funny, laid back guys and glad to give you advice on what to check out in Prague. Best part of the trip was when they took us across the river to some observation points. I am confident that I would have never found these on my own, and the views were absolutley gorgeous. I would have hung out with the crew from ebike all day if I could have.

Simply awesome !. I highly recommend this tour. Loads of fun coupled with interesting, some off the beaten path sights and knowledgeable and entertaining guides. I could not think of three hours in Prague spent better!

ebike tour Prague. A brilliant way to experience Prague. We had to wait until we got a window in the weather but it was well worth the wait. If we visit again we will definitely do this again. Thanks to Sol, Mary, Karel and Mark. Thank youAndy & Karen

Fantastic way to see Prague from multiple vantage points. I had never ridden an ebike (and hadn't ridden a bike in years) but I found it pretty manageable. They spend the first few minutes making sure you got it down and adjusted properly. Then you spend the next few hours going to different major spots in town and look out points to get amazing views of the city. Their English is excellent and they really can answer any question about Prague and the Czech Republic. We took the tour on a Monday and ended up being the only two doing it so we had a private tour basically. The tour guide was very friendly and had a lot of little nuggets of knowledge we would never have known by reading something or going around by ourselves.They were very thought and packed us a snack and water for our tour. So they really do make sure you have a great experience all around.

Great experience. We did this tour on our second day in Prague. It was absolutely brilliant - very informative guides who took us on a great route around Prague. We did not see too many of the typical places in Prague like the Jewish Quarter and the Old Town, which was fine for us because they were easily within walking distance anyway. Instead, we went up hills and got amazing views of the city. What made it even better was that the eBikes are so easy to use it barely feels like you're cycling!Would recommend this 100%.
E bike tour. Wonderful way to see Prague in a short amount of time.Great bikes and knowledgable guides. Picnic lunch provided.would highly recommend this company.

The best way to see most of Prague!. We did this tour the first night we were in town and it was the best idea ever! There are lots of ebike tours of Prague it seems but this one was the best. We booked ahead and thought we might just be the 3 of us on the tour but 2 others joined at the last minute. We had 2 guides and a guide-in-training so it was great to get all of their perspectives on what we were seeing. We didn't just bike past things, they took us around the Palace grounds, on a picnic and through a park festival. This is a MUST DO in Prague!

Private Segway Tour. A fantastic way to end our holiday, the guide was great and as we had seen the main sights we basically went where we wanted even up to the Eiffel Tower. The snack provided was basic but good enough for a three hour ride and gave us chance to get our " normal " legs again. All in all a good mornings outing, thank you guys

100% worth it for a segway tour!. The tour was fantastic. First of all, it was private, so it was just the two of us on the segways plus our guide. We covered all the important spots, and got some amazing views of Prag! The tour even takes you to places that no normal walking tour will reach. You do not visit the "busy" areas, such as Charles´s bridge or the astronomical clock, so you should have a look at them on your own. However, you get shown so many little non-tourist spots, personal favorites of your guide and you learn so much interesting information about the city, that the tour is absolutely worth it!
eBike tour is wonderful!. we were a family of four adults, and the tour was wonderful. The eBikes were so easy to ride, and our tour guides were very informative. Can easily recommend.

A Not-to-miss Prague experience. Thank you Karel and Laura for the BEST PART of being in Prague. Loved your ebike tour and enthusiasm to go with - not to mention your patience with all our questions. Like I said when 10 minutes on the ebike - I am looking to possibly acquire one for myself! Don't miss out on this fabulous experience seeing Prague's best sights at an affordable price!

Lovely tour. This is a great way to see Prague. The city is pretty hilly so the electric bikes are a great way to see the city for all fitness levels. They pack you a nice snack and give a great tour. I would definitely recommend this. Doing this trip on a regular bike would have been miserable given the hills, but this was so fun.

Best tour in Prague. This was great fun, we had a wonderful time. Our guides were fantastic, funny and knew everything we needed to learn about the city. The bikes were easy to handle and were helpful on the steepy hills. I would definitely recommend this tour for everyone!

excellent way to get around. Very easy to cycle with these e-powered bikes, with nice, knowledgeable guides that lead you around a whole load of places which are slightly more off the beaten track, or give you excellent views of Prague.

Fabulous day in Prague. My husband and I came to Prague for our 25th wedding anniversary and took the 2pm Ebike tour yesterday. It was fantastic and we loved every bit of it. The bikes were amazing and so easy to use, our guides Linda and Bert we're wonderful , so full of knowledge about Prague, it's history and surroundings. The picnic and beer were a lovely addition to a truly memorable afternoon for our anniversary. Special thank you to the owners too for the gorgeous champagne, another lovely surprise. My day in Prague will never be forgotten x

A fantastic effortless trip to see a beautiful city- A MUST DO!!. From the start to finish the trip was amazingly good. The induction on the bike use was very thorough and put my mind at rest as I was slightly nervous. Presented very clearly and consciously by our guide. I was very surprised by the ease of use and the distance you can travel on these bikes without breaking a sweat. The tour guide stopped at great intervals to explain in detail the history of Prague from the amazing views. Our group consisted of 6 so was a nice amount of people and Laura was very conscious to ensure we kept together as a group, the pace of the tour was perfect. I would highly recommend this company for use of E bikes in Prague, especially when Laura has 2 magical tricks to show you at the castle- really impressive and interactive. 10/10.

Ebike Prague. An absolutely brilliant way to see the city. The tour guides are really knowledgable, and just as importantly friendly and chatty. The bikes are great, novelty of not having to pedal up hills is brilliant. You'll been amazed by the party tricks at the cathedral!Loads of really good photo opportunities with some awesome views of the city.Can't recommend the tour highly enough, put it top of your to do list!Tosh, Newcastle upon Tyne, UK

An unforgettable evening . My wife and I looked for an opportunity to explore Prague a little bit beyond the usual tourist trails. Together with Linda, our local insider and guide, and equipped with state of the art e-bikes, helmets and a picnic basket we had a wonderful three hour evening tour where we visited places, mainly on the hills across the river offering beautiful sights of this magnificent city!The ebikes were actually an excellent choice because they allowed us to reach spots where you can only get by foot, while having a light exercise and a lot of fresh air.To summarize - if you can ride a bike this tour is highly recommended. And not to forget Linda - besides rediscovering the love for her city and sharing a lot of information and secret spots she also patiently answered all our questions.We look forward to visiting Prague again soon and do this again

This is a 'must do' when you visit Prague. The highlight of our visit to Prague was our EBike Tour yesterday. So much fun! The bikes are easy to use and the best way to see the city. The tour takes you away from the crowds to some of the most beautiful viewing spots in Prague. The guides are informative and fun without overloading you with facts and figures you aren't going to remember anyway! You'll see sights you would never see on foot, all with zero effort as the bikes do all of the hard work. Brilliant. You must do this. Book it now!!

Our favorite day in Prague!. My wife and I have always been hesitant about any sort of guided or arranged tour, but eBike Prague gave us the best day of the trip!The bikes themselves are really nice, and take all the work out of cycling...allowing you to just cruise through the city and up the crazy steep hills of Prague with total ease and really enjoy the sights. Our guide gave us some fantastic information about the various buildings and artwork and sights that we saw on our tour, and was knowledgable without being overbearing or eating up the whole trip with factoids. It was the perfect blend of informative and relaxing...we cruised around, enjoyed the sights, stopped for a couple of beers, and had an all-around amazing time. The eBike Prague tour is worth every penny, and was our favorite part of the trip.

Amazing!. My husband and I did the 6pm tour, it rained just a little that night so it ended up being a private tour for just my husband and I because everyone else backed out! Laura was a great tour guide, extremely knowledgeable. We covered a lot of ground in the 3 hours and were able to see most of the highlights of the city. It was a great way to figure out where things were so we could go back the next day. The bikes were great and so easy to ride. I definitely recommend this tour for anyone visiting Prague.

Best day in Prague. We took an e-bike tour the day we arrived in Prague and it ended up being the highlight of our time in Prague. This was the first time we were on e-bikes and they were a lot of fun (so much so that we rented e-bikes a second day for time on our own)! The hills were no problem with these bikes. We saw most of the sights with Gender (I may have his name spelled wrong) and Paul. They told great stories, taught us about the history of Prague and even made recommendations of where to go (neighborhoods, restaurants, attractions). As mentioned in a previous review, they include a snack (water and a few munchies) which is just a nice touch to show they care about customer service. We really enjoyed our tour and highly recommend this for travelers to Prague.
Awesome!!!. Everything was awesome. The city, weather, bikes, tour guides and everything!We can only recommend. Enjoy their tasty snack and ask for the brewery stop!

Gotta love the Prague ebike tour..... My husband and I really liked the ebike tour of Prague. It was a fun way to get around and we were able to see places you might not go on a tour bus. The bikes were really easy to ride especially up the hills and the tour guides Karel and Burt made the trip really enjoyable, fun and interesting. Saw the beer garden on top of the hill with lots of picture vistas on the way to the Prague Castle. We had a lot of fun and can recommend this tour to anyone.

Most fun with segway. The 3 hour segway tour was great fun and a special experience of Prague. Laura, our guide, was very knowledgeable about Prague history and conducted the tour in a very friendly manner with lots of laughs thrown in. A snack pack is included and the group is limited to only 3 people. Tring..tring!

Amazing Prague Experience. I went into my first Ebike experience a little unsure about what to expect. I'm not exactly what you'd call a biking enthusiast and to be honest guided tours aren't always my cup of tea either, but my wife really wanted to do it and marriage is all about compromise, right? So I went for it and I am so glad I did. First of all, the Ebikes are super easy to use and really make zipping all over town easy. I was worried that I'd be exhausted by the end of the day but the extra power from these future bikes made things easy. Climbing hills? Easy. Biking for a couple hours straight. No problem. I almost felt like a superhero. Almost. But the bigger thing was the quality of the guides. They really knew their stuff, which I guess all guides do, but more importantly they were fun and personable. The tour flew by and everything felt fun instead of the "kinda boring but I have to pretend I'm interested" vibe that some tours can have. We got along so well with our guides that we went out for beers with them after and got to see even more cool parts of Prague that we certainly would've missed. If you're visiting Prague and you've got time for a tour, this is one you'll wanna hit.

Excellent way to see Prague - Recommended.. We took a 3 hour Segway tour and absolutely loved it. The Segway's in the old town square are an absolute nuisance and thankfully e-bike has a social conscious and will not take the Segway's into the old town square. What we did do was fantastic. We had a fantastic guide in Sage. Sage has excellent knowledge of the history of Prague and made the tour so much more than a look and see. So pleased we did this.

Excellent tour - the one to book. Throughout your time in Prague, you will see that Segway tours are everywhere, in the squares etc. These must be avoided as they take you through crowded streets. Ebike however takes you to the nicer spots of Prague which you would not see yourself, especially the "Central park" of Prague which provides spectacular views and because this is a mixture of showing you the attractions and the off the beaten track route, you can really get the most out of your segway. We have used the segway before and so were given freedom with it which was great. Our guide was a really nice girl from Barcelona who had fallen in love with Prague and so stayed and her enthusiasm was clear to see. She also provided us with a packed lunch on our trip. The segway is really easy to master, it molds to your body so to speak. This is an excellent tour, do not miss out. Do the 3 hour tour, it goes by quickly and you get to see the really nice parts of Prague

A must for anyone visiting Prague. Prague is the most beautiful city I have seen to date, and I've seen many cities – when you picture Europe – this is what it looks like. Problem is, there's a lot of walking involved, and a lot of it is uphill. The highlight of our tour was the Ebike tour. Aside from the fact that the bikes are super fun and cool, the tour itself is very interesting and the guides so nice and friendly. A must for anyone wanting to enjoy Prague without having their dogs bark.

Excellent Way to See Prague. RECOMMENDED. This is a great way to start your visit to Prague. The tour gives you a chance to see a hilltop view of the city with good running commentary on where things are and how to approach the rest of your visit. You get to see city views that you might not see on your own and you can go back to the big interest points later the same day. The E-Bikes are effortless and make easy work of steep hills. Very friendly people, quick to respond on email and very knowledgable about the city. The start point is a typical interior old city courtyard off the street - it is old. There is a small EBIKE sign out on the street - you need to watch closely for the sign or you will walk right past it (Google maps is right on for directions - right across the street from the or see their FB page). You get a small picnic lunch and a bottle of water. RECOMMENDED

The Way To See Prague. E-biking is a wondeful way to cover a lot of ground and have lots of fun. Our tour guides were David, a recent university graduate who was on break before starting graduate school, and Karl, a seasoned pro. There were seven bikers in total from around the world. Our guides were fun and took us to the major spots like the Prague Castle and then to out of the way overlooks of the city. Best of all, we got to see the city from the eyes of a native. We learned about the election held last year and the history of Prague. We also met the owners and appreciate the work they put into this company. We saw severeral other tour companies while we were biking and some were struggling and tour guides were seen arguing. Not the case here, professional from start to finish. Our rating, two thumbs up, not to be missed.

Wonderful way to spend a morning!. From the moment we walked into Ebike Prague we were well looked after. Great day, informative fun tour and super guides! The ebikes were In great shape and very easy to ride. (We were very glad we took the tour with electric bikes. Prague is hilly!) 5 star day!

Great Tour!. I am excited about how many beautiful places in Prague and can be seen on a bicycle. Bicycling in parks, beautiful views, nice guide. My parents enjoyed the tour, too. I recommend to everyone:-)

Wrath every penny!. Went on the 10am tour and it was great. Our two guides were fantastic. The tour is very well organized and a Ton of ground is covered. The bikes are very easy to use. We stopped at the Prague Castle and walked inside the grounds with David. He showed us a special spot that his great uncle had shown him where you can hear a great echo. We also had a snack in Tetrin. Besides the snack which was very plentiful, you are also given water. There is a small container that is on the back of your bike that you can put small items in.I can not remember our main guides name but he was great. When the three hours were done I was not tired. I wished it was even longer. This is a great way to see the city, highly recommend doing it.

Great overview of Prague. This tour was recommended to us by a friend and I am so glad we listened. Two girl friends and I visited Prague in July and booked the e-Bike tour for the morning of our first day in the city. Working with the owners to book the tour was effortless and they even arranged for a taxi to pick us up at our hotel the morning of our tour. Great customer service!If you are looking for an informative overview of the city, this is the tour for you. And the ease of operating the e-Bike was not overstated on the website. What a fun way to tour the hills around Prague. Highly recommend!!

Top Tour. We booked this tour after reading the reviews on Tripadvisor and what a top tour it was. We booked the tour for our first morning in Prague (10:00 on 26th July) as we thought that it would be a good way to see a large area of the city in a short space of time and we could then go back and spend more time at in areas we were interested in. This turned out to be a good plan.There were 5 of us and we had 2 guides, Yenda (I think) and Bert. Bert also took photographs along the way which were emailed onto us afterwards which was a nice touch.The Ebikes were great. I was a bit sceptical of how much assistance they would give but I was well impressed with the extra power they supplied especially on the hill on the way up to the castle. You definitely don’t need to be fit to go on this cycle tour. We also flew past the guys on the Segway tours!Our tour lasted around 3.5 hours with many stops along the way where Yenda and Bert did a great job of explaining the history of Prague and kept us entertained with amusing stories. They were happy to answer any questions we had and at the end of the tour they wrote out the names of places where we might like to try based on our questions and even told us which tram to catch to get there. So basically we saw loads of Prague that we would never have seen on our own, we learnt lots about its history and were looked after by a company who really seem to care about their customers. Definitely recommended.

Best ever tour and guide. I had the most amazing ride and experience on my ebike Prague tour on July 22, 2014. The owners are so thoughtful and considerate - they should always do well. "Charlie" my tour guide was the best informed and a very engaging young man. Kinda makes you want to stay on in this fabulous city forever. Highly recommended.

Use the Red Boost button!. This was a really fun tour. We are cyclists and had just completed various cycling tours between the four of us and we loved the electric bikes. Nothing like pushing the red "boost" button when you are heading up to Prague Castle! The two guides were very informative and gave us a heads up about what to expect next when we left the information stops. We only saw what we did because we took the tour. The guided part of the trip was very informative by the guides as we stopped at many places that we then went back to by public transit. We did the evening ride when the tourist crowds were abated. Luxury. Definitely a good time to go. We did not find the traffic an issue then either and the heat of the day was over. The ebikes crew were very fun and careful with their responsibility. They clearly care about providing great bikes, tour, snacks and fun information.It helped to shape our time in Prague into a better visit. Thanks ebike crew!

E-mazing!. Can't say enough good things about the Ebike Prague tour. We took the 6 pm tour and it was a blast. The ebikes almost embarrassed me, they were so easy to ride on, though I really appreciated the motor when we went up hill towards the Prague Castle and breathtaking views of Prague from across the river. We only had 2 1/2 days to see Prague and this was the perfect start so we could follow it the next day with return to places we wanted to see. The guides were very entertaining and knowlegible and surprised us with a light dinner in a park halfway through. Don't see Prague without this tour. If you can ride a bike you can do this.

What a wonderful way to start our visit to Prauge!. My husband and I took a 3 hour morning tour on our first full day in Prauge. It was such a fun time and we saw so much in such a short period of time. From the moment we walked in the service was outstanding. The owners were onsite and made sure we had everything we needed to have a great ride. There was only one other couple on the tour and we had two guides so it felt like a private tour of Prauge. Karel was our main guide - his English was great. We really appreciated all the places we stopped and his knowledge and obvious love of Prauge. Lynda our other guide took us through the Cathedral at Prauge Castle and answered lots of questions we had - she also spoke English very well.We were amazed how easy it was to use the ebikes and they made the ride so enjoyable. The short training was all we needed to be on our way. The tour allowed us to get a good idea of where everything was in the city. We especially love the stop overlooking Prauge where we had a packed picnic (which was so good!). When we got back the owners greeted us all by name and let us know that the pictures Lynda took while on the tour would be e-mailed to us (for free) and they arrived later that day. Karel also took the time to mark our map with places to eat and visit based on items we discussed during the tour. This was a highlight of our trip! Would recommend to anyone that knows how to ride a bike as the best way to see Prauge.

Absolutely fantastic!! . What a great way to see Prague!! Not only were the tour guides very informative but they really tailored the experience to what we were after and we walked away with a history lesson on Prague that we would not have received on a tour bus. Not only were the tour guides great but the owners were so helpful with tips and recommendations on what to do and see. Highly recommend, thanks again!!

awesome experience. Great way to see the city, karel our guide was very knowledgable and friendly. The ebikes make it easy work even in the height of summer. Staff went above and beyond. Would recommend this to everyone wanting to see the real prague :)

Fantastic!. Best way to see Prague! Forget all other tours, this is the one and only. A 3 h tour that will show you this beautiful city in a fun way. We also had a great guide that told us all we needed to know about Prague for a perfect stay.

Amazing. Best way to see the city by far and our guide was terrific very insightful on the area. Overall definately something to do while visiting this city. If you are worried about comfort and fitness fear not little energy is needed even to go up steep hills!

Segway - Best way to see Prague. WE had the best toure on Segway - covered ~ 17 km of main attractions and more. If you never tried Segway, this is the best place to start and fall in love with this vehicle. If you already know it, this tour will give you additional and amazing point of view on Prague. Also very recommended with kids (above 150 cm).As for the fee it was one of the best. We payed ~60 E for 3 hrs. Other companies, mainly the segway drivers/sellers on the streets, ask for the same but for 60 or 90 min. They were willing to try to compete but never did and i really don't like the "market" way of business.Tour includes short break with nice picnic box.

Ebike tour is a terrific experience!. We did the tour on a very hot day (90F and high humidity) and exerted little to no effort. The bikes are a blast to ride whether you're a novice or experienced rider. The tour is a wonderful way to see the city. Our guides Karel (a local) and Bert (an US expat) were awesome, knowledgeable, patient and funny. We learned about places that we returned to during a subsequent outing. It's clear that this company cares about providing an excellent tour experience and they do just that. Highest recommendation here, one of the top (if not THE top) experiences of our three-week European trip.
Excellent!. I had the best time on my tour! Good for all ages, and the tour guides were the best around.. Would definitely do again!

Awesome!!. Had so much fun on this trip! The bikes were so easy and so much fun to use. They made the hilly landscape of Prague easy to overcome. Our guides were wonderful. Karel and Bert really know their stuff and are super friendly and willing to go the extra mile to make it more enjoyable. They even pack you a little picnic to enjoy halfway thru the tour. Go and try this, you won't regret it:-)

Excellent way to explore the Prague City by Ebikeprague Segway Tour. It was really great experience and fun way to explore the city. I would like to thanks with our guide Laura. She told us many stories and history about Prague. She was so caring to provide bottles water and snack box for us to enjoy on the hill overlook the panorama view of the city. It is an unforgettable experience. Also thanks Mary for arrange the private tour for us. I highly recommend Eikeprague tour. It is the best way to see Prague. Don't miss it.

HIGHLY RECOMMEND!!. Excellent way to see the city! The ebikes were very easy to use, which allowed you to travel fast and far but save your energy. Saw all the top sites and had excellent and helpful tour guides. The 3 hours flies by!

Super tour!. A great way to see more of Prague. The electrical bikes are amazing, easy to go up to the hills, where you can have stunning views of the city! Our guide, Linda, was adorable, told us so much about Prague history. I do recommend this tour.

Great way to see more of Prague. E-Bike is a wonderful way to see more of Prague. Since you are on a electrical powered bike, you get to cover a lot more area in a little time. It is a small group, about 10 people and you have a guide in the front and one in the back. Our guides were Karel and Bert and they were awesome. They knew so much about Prague, but more importantly, they worked diligently at keeping us safe. Unfortunately, we were half-way through the tour when it started to pour. Karel an Bert worked at keeping us dry and figuring out the next step. They provided us with ponchos and a light snack. They even kept calling Mary to figure out how to adjust the plans/route. Mary runs the place (more like a family business which is absolutely professional) and she was great from the time I booked the tour and all the way to the time when we were running late. She was willing to bike us out to the group so that we wouldn't miss any of the tour. After the rain stopped, we continued the tour. Although we saw less than planned (due to rain), it was still worth it. Even though the rain was obviously not their fault, Mary offered other options to make up for it. All companies should care about their clients as much as E-Bike. We will be back to do the tour again an hopefully it won't rain. Haha!

Unmissable!!. The best way to see the outer sights of Prague. Get the best view point of Prague's greatest sights while feeling rewarded for making the journey yourself. But dont fear! This tour is perfect for everyone from keen cyclists to those who haven't been on a bike for years due to the effortlessly easy to use Ebikes. You're not restricted to just the old town as you are on walking tours and yet you still get up close and into the sights which the bus tours can restrict. Undoubtedly the definitive way to see Prague. The guides were everything you would want aswell. Fun and entertaining but full of facts, stories and tips about the city. Eager for questions and going above the call of duty to help out. From start to finish totally awesome! Do not miss out or you will regret it.

A fun and great way to see the city.
