What a great fun and easy (it's electronic) way to see the city, don't worry if you're not in shape, once the electronic engine kicks in - you are good to go without any real effort, most of the trip we rode on a bicycle lane so there is no real danger, the entire ride was about 3 hours and we got to see some of the nicest parts of the city including the Castle and its lovely gardens. Highly recommended! Thanks to our guides Charles and Linda, we had an amazing time!

You must do this!!. The bikes were fun & easy, our guides were awesome, GREAT tour with amazing views of Prague! We loved every minute! You will see more in 3 hours than you would walking in one day! Highly recommend to everyone!

Great way to see Prague. The recent reviews on here are spot-on. My guides were Karel & Laura who were enthusiastic and fun but at the same time very knowledgeable and informative. The 3-hour tour flew by and I can’t believe how much we saw. As well as the busy parts of Prague like the Castle and the Charles Bridge we got to see some of the less well-known parts like the parks, the riverside and the quieter areas of the lesser quarter. The views of the Charles Bridge and the city skyline with all of the spires were amazing and the ‘peeing’ fountain is hilarious; the ebike itself is great fun and going up hill on one is an experience not to be missed. This was, by a long way, the best tour I did in Prague and it is a great way to find your bearings in the City so thank-you ebikeprague!

A must do. Excellent way to explore the city and have fun.. We did a tour on June 14th at 6 pm. The tour with amazing and the guide was very knowldgable and pleasent. We many tours within two weeks in Europe, this was one of the best.

Such an amazing experience!. Couldn't have wished for a better way to get to know the beautiful city; friendly and accommodating staff and amazing views are a formidable combination! The EBike tour is a highly recommended way to learn the history and find the best spots around the city.The EBikes are easy to use and make the experience that much more breath taking. It is definitely an experience that I will never forget.

Awesome Bike Tour. Perfect day out. Would highly recommend EBikes. The bikes are so easy to use and you get around with very little effort. Guides are very pleasant and extremely knowledgeable. Lots of photo opportunities.

Great ride. Wow, what a great way to see Prague! We, my teenage daughters and I, set out for our ride with guides Karel and Hank. Both were friendly and knowledgable about their city. The bikes are new and a pleasure to ride - easy up and easy down. Thank you Sol and Mary, what a lovely morning that was.

Excellent, informative and fun way to see the city. I can't say enough about this tour. It's 3 hours of pure bliss. The amazing views never stop and the guides (ours were Hank and Carl) are fantastic. I'm now in love with e-bikes....they make the tour so incredibly enjoyable because you're not huffing and puffing up all the hills. This was the highlight of our trip. Well worth the money (and then some). Just book the tour. You will be so happy you did!

Perfect first insight into Prague. I booked the ebike trip for myself and my friend as we only had a very short time in Prague and wanted to get round quickly and get our bearings. Well what a way to do it. This was perfect. From the booking to the final goodbye I felt well looked after and well informed. The guides we had were great and Phillpe was very passionate and knowledgable about Prague, it's history and how this influenced the history of the wider world too. The ebike was easy to get used to and as others have said makes going up hill a dream. I like the use of the boost button, I felt like I was in some kind of cartoon! As you are getting quite a pace on you get to see lots of the city from high vantage points which on foot you might either miss or would take a while to get there. The tour gives you a taster of what is out there and helps plan the rest of your visit. Lots of unusual things to see on the way too which I will not give a 'spoiler alert' on so you can see for your self. The cobbled streets make some of the biking quite interesting so be prepared to have a little shake rattle and roll but all adds to the fun of it. Perfect way to spend an afternoon.

Fixes jet lag. The EBike trip was great from the start - when we inquired, we reached out to Mary who promptly responded not only with the information, but also the weather. It turns out our hotel was within minutes of the location which was perfect as we just flew in from NY without sleeping. What a great way to see Prague - riding on a bike that moves on its own...all I had to do was steer. It wakes you up feeling energized!Ebikes require minimum knowledge as long as you know how to ride a bike. During the bike ride, the guides focused a great deal of attention on safety except for a long straight away which gave us the ability to go as fast as we can. The tour took you all around Prague and into Prague Castle which I will let you explore for yourself. Throughout the trip, they take pictures and then email you later on. Both the guides Linda and Charles were pleasant, knowledgeable and great fun to spend an afternoon. At some point, we stopped for a picnic eating yummy Asiago croissants, chocolate and water. You did not earn this meal, but how could you not eat looking out at an amazing view. I would highly recommend EBikes if you want to spend a nice trip traveling through the parks on a bike getting an overview of Prague and taking in the great sites. Afterwards, they will graciously spend time with you going over any questions of where to eat and go to through the remaining part of your holiday.

The Tour, The bikes, the sights are A+. Our ebike tour was absolutely above-expectation. We were lucky enough to have Carol (spelling?) as a guide. On the course of the tour, you end up traveling over 17km, primarily on a REALLY NICE bike trail. The bikes do all the work, unless you want to exercise. Just a press of a button and it's a normal bike again. Absolutely loved the technology. The guides were very knowledgeable, and outgoing enough to really share insight into what it's like to live in Prague. I would certainly recommend this tour to anyone visiting Prague,

Great way to see Prague. A great way to see some of the sites in Prague in a few hours on fantastic electric bikes. 5 of our group did this tour and we all agreed it was a fantastic time spent. Our guides ( Helena and Bert) were safety conscious but so very informative and very professional. An enjoyable break was spent with a basic packed lunch overlooking the city. We wished we could have continued for longer. E-bikes are awesome.

Brilliant, relaxing with breath taking views!. I was searching for a fun, informative and relaxing way to soak up all the beauty and historical sights Prague had to offer. I had heard about E-bike tours from a friend and had to try it. First off, the E-cike itself was very easy to use, and very relaxing and effortless. No sweating, no hard work, or vicious pedaling involved. Therefore I got to sit back and look up a lot more and the views were absolutely breathtaking. The Vlata river could be seen more the 50% of the tour. We stopped at a few points in which the entire Prague could be seen and there was time to ask questions and take pictures. We also got to see the main sight which was lovely. The tour guide was very informative, full of knowledge and very energetic. There was also an extremely enjoyable picnic on the grass, with a packed lunch provided by E-Bike tours as well as an opportunity to purchase beer from the bruery close by. Overall fantastic tour, and a brilliant way to really see Prague.

Awesome!. Definitely one of the best parts of my trip to Prague. The EBike office was easy to find, and the staff was very friendly and welcoming. Karl took us to beautiful viewpoints and provided us with thorough explanations of the history of each spot. The bikes were easy and extremely fun to use throughout the beautiful city. Thanks! Will do again on my next trip!

An amazing way to see the city. Definitely the most worthwhile and enjoyable experience that I've had on a holiday. The e-bikes were so much fun and easy to cycle and we had the opportunity to see so many parts of the city. We were taken to some amazing view points to experience the beautiful scenery and the guides were excellent at providing knowledge and recommendations. The packed lunch provided was a nice touch and I wouldn't hesitate to recommend this activity for anyone visiting Prague.

A must do trip!. What a fab way to spend 3 hours and learn and see things in Prague that you wouldn't otherwise see. The Ebikes are the best thing ever and I am trying to think of an excuse to buy one for myself, they make going up hills a pleasure. Our guide Phillipe was very knowledgeable and passionate about Prague and any company should be pleased to employ someone with such enthusiasm.The company seems very well ran and supplied helmets and a packed lunch which was a very nice surprise.It is also worth going on this trip just to hear the owner accent.Thank you all for making sightseeing and cycling up hills in Prague so enjoyable,

The best first day in Prague!. My friends and I decided to go on the Ebike tour to get our bearings on the first day of our trip. It was great because you get to see a lot of the main attractions and get a feel for the city right away. The scenery is stunning and the bikes are so much fun, we had such a laugh! The tour guides that took us around Prague gave us lots of suggestions for places to see and restaurants to visit, even which of the local beers to sample. Definitely worth the money, and would recommend it to anyone!

See the best of Prague in three hours!. My wife and I (50 something's), just finished the Ebike tour of Prague and we couldn't be more satisfied. The machines are truly amazing and propelled us up all the city hills with almost no effort. This enabled us to appreciate the beauty of the city and enjoy the wealth of knowledge of our outstanding tour guide, Filip. We didn't even break a sweat! This is really something the whole family can enjoy, even the grandparents. As a surprise bonus, a delicious free snack and bottle of water was included. When will you guys be in other cities? This tour is a must for everyone visiting Prague.

Best day ever !!!. Absolutely the best way of experiencing Prague. We rented a couple of Segways and I have not had so much fun since my first rollercoaster ride as a child. Our lovely and excellent guide Sage topped of our day with her amazing Knowledge. I highly recommend this trip to all. And for sure I'll come and and use ebike service again and again. Thanks to super nice staff at ebike. Laila & Heidi

Awesome way to see Prague!. We rent Segways. Fun, cool and perfect way to get to know Prague. The staff of Ebike is super friendly! Cheap tour as well (app. 58€ for 3 hrs). Gonna do this again and again! The quide Sage was such a sweet girl and her knowledge and stories about Prague were amazing! Many thanks from Heidi and Laila :)

Sean. My fiance founds this tour online and we weren't sure exactly what to expect but going by such glowing reviews found on Trip Advisor we felt we should give it a try. On such a beautiful day it seemed a shame to be in a buss or car. We were not disappointed. We had two great guides in Carl and Vaclov (hope I got their names right). Even the two who helped us get started at their office were equally funny and pleasant to be around which of course helped to make the total experience an excellent one. The size of the tour group was just right I thought. We got to see some great sights, discovered places in the city we likely weren't going to get a chance to visit otherwise and got some great tips for eating and drinking in a far less touristy part of town. All in all, money and time well spent. Recommend this tour HIGHLY.

Best Way to See Prague. At first when my mother suggested she wanted to take an E bike tour, I was a bit apprehensive. I thought. "Uh! Do I have to pedal everywhere and wear a dumb looking helmet?" I am so happy we went on the tour. Everyone working there was very kind and knowledgable. The bikes, though it took a minute to get used to the bike, made the ride around Prague the best experience. Our group was diverse in skill/ strength ability, but everyone from the youngest to oldest had an incredible experience. The tour itself was a good mix of local and tourist atmospheres and had a little bit for everyone.We had such a great experience with the bikes and this company that we are researching similar tours in the other countries we are visiting.Don't miss this opportunity to see the entire city of Prague!

Best bike tour in Pargue!. The guys at Ebike were fantastic from the second we walked through their doors. Super friendly and accommodating. The ebikes are a breeze to ride and are a MUST in Prague as they help you over the hills and cobblestone paths. The tour was perfect, we got a great overview of the city, amazing sights, informative guide and to top it all off the best packed lunch all included. Our guide went above and beyond to give us any extra help we needed and was happy to sit with us after the tour and give us some extra advise on places to go. His recommendations were awesome.

Don't Miss This Amazing Experience!!!!!!. This was by far, my favorite thing that I did in Prague. When you go, ask for Sage. You will be amazed by all of her insights and stories! This tour is better than any guide book. Everything was perfect from the bikes to the sights. You will be in heaven on this tour! When I return to Prague this is the first thing I will do! Make sure you take this tour, it is so worth your time!!

Most excellent. If you would like to see prague in a unique up close way - this is it! You can leave the city behind you you peddling through parks and very easy bike paths. The two guides were extremely helpful and informative. Also went a step further helping visitors out with tips on where to eat and drink without being in the main tourists haunts.Picnic lunch/ afternoon tea was a pleasant surprise.Very well looked after and easy to do even if you are a novice bike rider.You will enjoy this immensely and great value for money!

excellent tour for families. We are visiting Prague with my 13 year old son, 19 year old daughter, and 75 year old father-in-law, and stumbled upon EBIKE tours. They have bicycles that have an electric assist for getting up hills with almost no effort. My father-in-law loved it. Our tour guide (Burt) was fully knowledgeable about Prague history, and had some good jokes to add in. They are a great bunch, and we highly recommend the company for those that want to really see Prague off the beaten path.

You don't want to miss this tour!. I joined the night tour which start at 6pm and it turned out the be the private city for two of us. We got a warm welcome. Everything is well-prepared - the electric bike, snack box and other necessary information. We went to some local places, such as the beautiful park, that we would not find out by ourselves. We got a lot of explanation for many local things like Czech food, best bar and brewery. The tour guide is friendly, knowledgable. To sum up, we were fully satisfied and appreciated with the tour. It worth our money (even though it's a little costly).

Bikes give superpowers. Great trip seeing green Prague from above and around. The bikes are very easy to handle and you get around with very little effort. Three turns of the pedals and you've crossed the river. Makes you feel ready for the Tour de France. As you will walk a lot in Prague this is a good way of visiting the city and resting tired legs at the same time. The trip takes you trough parks and pathways on "the other side" of the river. It includes a short visit to the castle area and the highest point of Prague. Lots of good photo opportunities. You do not spend a lot of time in old Prague, so it is goes well together with one of the walking tours of the centre.We had two good guides that complimented each other explaining thoroughly recent and old history as well as today's realities. It was a fun trip. Highly recommended.

Unique and fun way to learn about Prague and to see major attractions. Took Ebike tour on our first full day in Prague. Wonderful way to see the major sites in Prague and to learn about the history of the city. Our tour guide was very knowledgeable about Czech Republic's history and Prague's in particular. We had our 18 year old niece with us. She enjoyed the trip as much as we did. Company is well-planned. Had a light and tasty snack for us half-way through the trip. Snack included water, cheese bread, crackers and cookies. Tour includes a guide in the back to make sure all riders are caught up and safe. Well-executed and great fun. Bikes take a minute to get used to, but they are easy and fun to ride.

The very best way to see Praugue!. This was an excellent tour starting with value for money through to the guides and the route taken. You will see sights and views of the city you would never have had time to reach on foot and all from the comfort of an electric bike. They are not kidding about the fact that the only time you will sweat is due to the weather and not the mode of transport. Thanks EbikePrague for an amazing day!

Great experience! Don't miss it. . Another unseasonably hot day in Prague so what better to do than to tour the city on an electric bike. The wind blowing through your hair as you effortlessly pedal the street of Prague and surrounding communities. From check in to the return, the staff was awesome. They made sure everyone was comfortable and gave you plenty of time to see the sights and cruise as your own speed. We had a Czech and an American guide, both shared great stories while providing insight to the city. Nice little picnic at a monastery with optional craft beers. All and all a great way to see the sights, get a little exercise and meet new travelers. Tom & Shervin - San DiegoJune 11, 2014

So much fun!. Great tour of prague! This was super fun! The guides were very informative and made sure we were all safe. One guide in the front leading us and one guide in the back to make sure nobody got lost. It's very easy to use an e-bike (my first time!) and any age can realistically use one of these! A must activity while in Prague!

Enjoy the beautiful city of Prag by cruising on your E-Bike :-). Spontaniously I decided this morning to join the city tour of E-bike and it was just an beautiful experience. The team is very friendly and it´s just great fun to discover Prag by bike. The tour took about 3 hours and both guides gave us a very nice overview about history and culture of this wonderful city. I can highly recommend to take this excursion in your sightseeing program. You will not regret it :-) Thanks to Karel and Albert for this nice experience and also for the personal recommendations for restaurants and bars!

This is the way to go!. If you haven't tried an Ebike, now is the time. These Ebikes are almost new and easy to ride. No more huffing and puffing up hills. Karel and Bert were really informative and obviously love imparting their knowledge of Prague. We were taken above the city for some fabulous views. This tour went for 3 hours with a relaxing stop for a packed snack in a lovely park. My husband and I thought it was really a great way to get a feel for the city, with local knowledge to add interest. We booked online from Australia.

Great fun, great tour!. Ebike tours was a fun way to see some of the bigger but further sights of Prague. Our request for reservations were answered quickly and courteously and couldn't have been easier. Once at eBike everything went smoothly to include payment and getting our bikes issued. Our tourguide, Sage, took us along a 17km route with plenty of discussions and explanations of the sights. There was also a nice "pick-nick" box packed for everyone in the group that we enjoyed during a stop with a tremendous view of the city. After our tour we got great tips on where to eat (India Palace) and drink (Vinograf) in the local area... but that's not all! Mary (co-owner) personally e-mailed pics taken of our tour group by one of the guides, what a nice touch! Would definitely recommend eBike for all ages and abilities, a great way to see Prague with great people!
Great way to explore Prague. Great fun tour with a very informative friendly guide, visited some lovely parts of Prague. Photographs and picnic included in the price.

Excellent, professional and VERY worthwhile. EBIKE Prague was a great experience and can recommend it to anyone. It's a great way to see the city and we would recommend doing it the first day you get to Prague.That way you have a good feel of the areas and a really good general overview. Scenery is wonderful and the back streets they take you on quintessential Prague. The bikes are really easy to use and you don't work up any sweat.!! Such an easy way to see Prague. We did a private tour so just our guide and the two of us. Very handy as his english was perfect, he was very knowledgable and and very good to talk to and find out about Czech life. He also has a genuine love for what he does and we could stop whenever I wanted to take a photo. Mary and Sol the owners, who also speak perfect english, really care about EBIKE and offering a wonderful experience. We give them an excellent rating.

Great time!. We had a wonderful time on our E-bike tour! Helena and Bert, were always watching out for our safety and gave us some great information about the different sites about Prague.The bikes are really easy to use and a lot of fun! Makes you want to buy one...Mary, the organiser was in answering emails and gave us some great directions to get to their office from our hotel. Highly recommend as you will see areas of Prague with great views that you wouldn't normally see if you walking around.

Great way to see Prague.... Did this tour with a group of about 20 work colleagues and really enjoyed it. Helpful, enthusiastic and knowledgeable staff on hand to assist at all times. I wasn't sue about the e-bikes (being a keen cyclist) but was won over as lesser athletes could keep up the pace easily (and I got a workout by leaving mine off most of the time anyway!). A great almost traffic-free way to see a really nice city. Highly recommended.

What a blast!!. As long as you can balance on a bike, you'll have a great time. Excellent overview of city. Phillip, our lead guide, was very informative and funny. We were not on the main roads very much - mostly through parks to get to the sites. Totally enjoyable and we would highly recommend!

Wonderful way to see Prague. I took this tour with my wife and 13 year old son. This is great tour if you want to see Prague's parks and scenic views in a short time without having to walk the hills. The guides where great and explained what we saw from each viewing spot. Beware this is not a history tour but then that's not the point of the tour. The bikes are lots of fun, they gave my son a special bike and he had a great time. He wanted to start the tour again. So if you like scenery and bikes do not miss this tour.

Great time. I was in a party of 10. The guides and other staff were very friendly and attentive. The bikes were great and the route was lovely. We were even fed and given drinks. I have also been emailed with some pictures. Heavily recommend.
Great way to get a glimpse of Prague. Great tour - really enjoyed it. Saw some parts of central Prague that most tourists otherwise wouldn't see.

Awesome tour!. This tour is a great way to get a good overview of Prague, including history, landmarks, views and culture. Tour guides were great, and Mary was so sweet to send the photos taken by the guide during the tour to me, via email. If this is your first visit, or even second or third, to Prague, you would be a FOOL not to do this tour. Bikes are easy to use and you really do cover quite a bit of distance in the three hours of the tour. HIGHLY recommend!

Fun! Fun! Fun!. This has to be one of the best tours we have ever had! Jenda and Sage were great guides. They helped me to enjoy an activity in which I haven't participated in over 40 years! If I can do it, then anyone can do it. The bikes are great and once you get the hang of it you are good to go! I also must say the customer service of this company is outstanding. Anything they can do to make your time in Prague more enjoyable is just a request away. Mary followed up with us to confirm our appointment and after the tour I received an email wishing us a happy anniversary. This activity is highly recommended!Thank you E-Bikes Prague for an unforgettable 41st anniversary!

Amazing views, fun people. The tour guides we had were great fun and very entertaining. They took us to some of the harder to reach tourists place and some areas off the beaten path, but it was well worth it. The shop owners and the guides were some of the friendliest I have met and the ebikes are an incredible adventure. Highly recommend

Great way to cover a lot of ground... ....but a walking tour is better for more in-depth info.This was an enjoyable tour where you got to see a LOT of the city in a relatively short amount of time. It did have a slightly disorganized feel, and we ended up having to bike through a bit of human and car traffic, but I would definitely do it again. The tour guides were super friendly, but not quite as knowledgeable as our guide on the Naked Tour, frankly. Still, it was a fun way to spend half a day in Prague – and along with a more in-depth walking tour, I think will give you a very good overview of Prague if you’re pushed for time

A MUST DO EXPERIENCE!. My husband and I have done city bike tours in most of the cities we have visited, but never before on an electric bike! The electric bike was incredibly easy to handle and was a definite advantage on going up the hilly streets of Prague to get a great view over the entire city. The bikes were in excellent condition, only about a week old, and our entire group enjoyed themselves thoroughly. The tour provides you with a great way to really see outside the 'tourist' walking area and gain a 'real feel' for the city beyond - a must do experience!The guides were extremely informative, friendly and fun, and although there were only 4 people on our tour they provided a guide at both the front and the back of the group for the entire tour which was fantastic. Mary, who works in the office is lovely, and responds to your emails very quickly if you have any questions or concerns.If you're thinking about it....just do it!

A MUST DO TOUR!!!!. We've done biking tour up a mountain in Oahu, biking in Germany, biking across the Golden Gate Bridge. This was the best!!!!!! Not only the scenery but the bikes were AMAZING!!!! Work out as little or as much as you want. We also did a boat/bus tour which was good but this was GREAT!! The tour guide was wonderful! My husband and I HIGHLY RECOMMEND this tour!!!!! A MUST DO TOUR IF YOU GO TO PRAGUE!!

Novel experience.... You have done walking tours, tours on cycles and in some cases Segway ...We experienced something novel: e-bikes : cycles which are powered by batteries!! In a city like Prague where you need to go uphill, without powered bikes, cycling can be arduous...! All you need is to be a reasonably good cyclist...to the extent out 10 year old whose feet barely reach the ground, managed the ebike well...& we had to negotiate quite some busy roads!!Solomon and Mary run ebike tours in Prague and our experience with them was fantastic...aided by a brilliant sunny day! Bohumil our guide was very knowledgeable and passionate about his job..we were a group of 10( sold out!!). The tours was thoughtfully planned and executed: eg: having two guides in a group of 10 was big help as one guide led the front and Linda was there to bring up the rear...they even packed a snack lunch and water in each bike!!All in all a fantastic experience and if you can cycle I would say MUST DO!

E-bike is the best way to see Prague. Today me and my son took the E-Bike tour in Prague and it was great experience. I believe Ebike is the best way to so see real Prague. The Prague has so many green parks and it`s very convenient and save to drive around. First i was a bit afraid that we will be driving on the streets were all the cars driving, but it was maybe 10% of the tour that we were on the streets. Our guide was Jenda, and he was great and funny, i would highly recommend him. The owner Mark, was very friendly and helpful setting up the bike for my son. Thank you guys for the great way to see Prague!!! Ziuljenas and Mat from Lithuania
Fantastic tour Prague. We (2 kids, 2 adults) had a beautifull tour through Praque.The team of Ebike are very kind and helpfull.

Great tour, great people!. We can't say enough good things about our EBike tour in Prague!!! Mary and Karl were terrific! A few of us were celebrating our 70th, and from the moment we got started, we felt more like we were 30. The bikes were well maintained and easy to ride. The tour was well planned and offered a change of pace from the City (which was also amazing). We can't thank Ebikes enough!

Great tour, beautiful views. We chose to do this tour on our first day in the city to get our bearings and see some of the more outlying sights. Our two guides were great--very friendly and knowledgable. Burt is a history buff and provided several interesting tidbits along the way, including a detailed description of the doors of St. Vitus Cathedral. The ebikes are great--you can adjust the level of assistance needed and they make hills a snap! Solomon and Mary, the owners, were incredibly kind and easy to work with, responding quickly by email leading up to the trip. Burt took lots of pictures of our group along the way and then they emailed all of the photos to us after the tour, free of charge. They also provided a nice snack/small meal at a scenic overlook.

E-Bike Tour was E-Excellent!. I sprung the E-bike tour on my hubby and friend 30 minutes before the tour. The guys had no time to say no. We met the owner who was very friendly and helpful. Our tour guide was the amazing Jenda and our safety man was Marvelous Mark. I was skeptical of an electric bike but now am a convert and want one of my own!!! Jenda gave us great instructions and both Jenda and Mark kept us safe. The time flew by and it was great to see Prague from so many different vantage points. Jenda is knowledgeable and has a keen sense of humor which we appreciated. We stopped at amazing coffee place for our lunch break and enjoyed our picnic lunch too. The time flew by and we got a great overview of Prague. There is so much to see in Prague that I wouldn't mind a longer tour with more stops along the way to learn more about Prague.We made lifelong friendships with Jenda and Mark!

So much fun. We booked this tour just after we landed to get our bearings and I have to say it was one of the best decisions we ever made! All the guides and staff were really friendly with a good mixture of fun, banter and history. The ebikes were also incredible, I was actually able to ride up hill without dyeing, and the tour route was brilliant enabling us to see many attractions in the guide bok as well as areas I wouldn't have thought to go! I would recommend this for anyone visiting Prague!

Great fun. Had no idea how good these bikes would be,thought we might have to expel a teeny bit of energy but no siree,not on this tour-the bikes make light work of the steepest hills.Great fun had by al(mom,daughter,best friend),would do again in a heartbeat.Thank you Jenda,it was awesome.

Great service: Didn't feel like a tour. One of the things I dislike about tour guides is that they talk non stop and tell uninteresting history about bricks.Both of our guides were extremely friendly and chill. They let us enjoyed the view and taught the precise amount of history we needed.Great way to experience Prague!

Fantastic tour!. We had a great tour. Our 2 guides Jenda and Daniela are very nice people. Especially Jenda told us very interesting details about Prague. It's great that in a few hours you can see so many highlights.

EBike, Prague, CZ. We had a group of 9 family members that spent two weeks on vacation in Europe. We spent Easter Sunday in Prague and signed up for the EBike Tour. It was all it was billed and more. Our guides were great and very informative. We took many stops so that we could take pictures and they talked our way through the entire tour. The EBikes were very easy to ride and peddle, and made any uphill portion of the tour very easy to ride up. They had a lunch box packed for all of us and we had a nice lunch along the way with a beautiful view of the city. I would do this tour again if I go back to Prague and I would highly recommend the EBike Tour.

Great, well-organized, fun tour. This tour is really well done. There are two guides, one at the front and one at the back, so there's no concern for getting lost. They make several stops and give a lot of interesting information about Prague's history and landmarks. Our guides Filip and Bert knew their stuff and were enthusiastic. Prague is so beautiful and this is a fun way to see a lot of it.
Very good. Please try it. you wont regret. It's the best way to see the city. you'll get to see a lot in only three hours.

So much fun!. Our guide , Karel, was great. We learned a lot about the city in 3 hours without having to walk everywhere. Being on an electric bike is an easy and fun way to see the sights with extra power to get up hills when needed. Mary in the office was very responsive and friendly and everyone was really genuine and enthusiastic about making the experience a good one. I highly recommend it.

Brilliant from start to finish. What a terrific way to see a city (especially a hilly one like Prague). A brilliant tour, with charming and informative guides. The Ebikes took all the hard work out of the hills. The staff / owners could not have been more welcoming and helpful. The picnic was a real bonus. Would recommend doing this early on in your trip and it gives you a great opportunity to decide what sights you would like to return to for a longer visit.I really hope they extend this to more European cities - I will certainly be looking out for them on all my future trips and recomending them to all my friends.

Highlight of our trip!. I was reluctant to go on an Ebike tour, but agreed after my friend threatened a stegway tour as an alternative. As soon as we met the team and saw the bikes I knew I was going to enjoy myself - and I did! The tour was amazing and we had such a laugh peddling around and seeing the sights. Our guide told us all about the city and even took the time out after the tour to highlight some attractions on a map for us to check out for the rest of our visit. Not only would I recommend this to everyone travelling to Prague, I'm now am obsessed with getting my own electric bike!

Ebike Prague Tours = Excellent. This is a great way to see the sights of Prague which most tours miss out.Sadly we did this on our last day in the city but wish we had done so on our first, the guys were all great and very informative and the tour went along at a steady pace.The bikes also make this tour something which everyone can do, you do not have to be an avid cyclist or in great health as the bikes help do most of the work (especially on hills) and are so easy to use.I would highly recommend this tour and am very glad we booked it.Don't let the price put you off either, it's 3 hours with a picnic included, a perfect way to see the city at a pace to suit all.I cannot recommend this highly enough.

The best way to see Prague!. It's fun, it's effortlessly informative, it's easy (to ride an e-bike) and I would say it's the best way to see Prague - you'll visit all the cool places in just 3 hours. And the staff is so friendly and professional. I'm going to recommend this tour to all my friends who want to visit Prague.

Excellent. We decided to take the prague e-bike tour after reading alot about it on trip advisor. We took the tour on our first day in prague in order to get to know the city better and to use the guides' knowledge about the city to understand which places to go and what to do.The tour definitely met our expectations. The ride through the city with the e-bikes allowed us to reach places we wouldn't have reached by ourselves and to go to fabulous viewpoints. The guides were very nice and knowledgable and helped us plan the rest of our stay in prague.We enjoyed the tour very much and would reccomend it to everyon as the first thing to do in prague.

A Must Do in Prague. My wife was reluctant when I booked our tour. Now she wants to rent an Ebike everywhere we go. We are a couple in our sixties who enjoyed this experience tremendously. Our two guides were concerned for safety, informative, and just a lot of fun. We saw so much of Prague from locations most tourists never venture. The entire staff was friendly and upbeat. Do this!

Absolutely amazing tour! GREAT company!. The tour was outstanding and our guide was very personable. We had a blast seeing all of the sites. The staff was incredibly friendly and helpful and you could tell that the business was run by good people. The E-bikes were a lot of fun also. They are almost effortless to ride so that you had energy at each stop and could get around to more places than if you were walking. I would recommend this tour to anyone visiting Prague!

Great way to see the sights of the city. Would really recommend this as an effortless way to see a lot of the city. Think we did about 15km but it was easy as the e bikes do all the work for you. Tour guides were excellent and helped make it a great experience.

Great way to see and get familiar with the city. I was recently in Prague for two days and made the excellent decision to start my first day with an Ebike Tour. I was able to cover so much more ground in a short period of time than I ever could have on foot or on trams. The tour guide stopped frequently and was very knowledgeable about the history of the city, the landmarks and the various neighborhoods. Prior to my visit I had not appreciated the number of hills in Prague. The Ebike has a small electric motor, which is activated with a small amount of pedaling and made for an extremely easy ride, even on some large hills. A large part of the tour goes through city parks that I would have otherwise not visited and there were a number of stopping points on the tour that were overlooking the city. This was very useful in making plans for the remaining day and a half of my visit. As a result of the Ebike tour, I saw much of Prague that I otherwise would not have seen and returned to some areas of the city that I would not have thought to visit.I highly recommend this tour.

Must do on a trip to Prague!. On our second day in Prague, we took an ebike tour. It was a perfect way to discover the most famous parts of prague. The ebikes are an easy way to go on a good tempo across the city with excellent guidance of Jenda and Daniella (our 2 guides).It was perfect, we would do it again! Greetings, Gilles and Doortje

The best way to effortlessly see Prague's attractions and beauty.. My husband and I loved the tour! The bikes are truly amazing and so easy to ride with their battery powered motor. The guys at reception were very friendly and the tour guides were extremely informative and friendly as well. Any questions I asked, they knew the answer. We got to see all of the major attractions around Prague city and some local hot spots. I was very surprised that my husband also enjoyed it because he is a bit of a party pooper at times and also hard to please. Surprisingly, he loved it and said he would do it again! Thank you ebike. It was lovely.
The best way to see Prague. We'll planned and organized 3 hour bike tour. Super beautiful places you would never know in Prague. Good value for money

Brilliant way to see the city.. The guide was very friendly and informative. Made us feel very comfortable on the bikes even though we had not cycled in years. We were never out of breath once as the bike does the hard work for you. The tour took us around parts of the city we would never have seen otherwise and the guides English was excellent. Would recommend this to anyone wanting to fit as much in one day as possible and have a great time doing so.
Absolutely amazing. We had friends over from UK and they came over for a weekend. First day we've done the private tour with Karel which was absolutely amazing. Prague and Ebike rocks! Thanks again!

A great way to see Prague. Ebikes is a great way to see Prague. The Ebikes guides were really friendly and getting used to the bikes was easy. The whole trip was great but the ride through the park on a sunny Saturday afternoon was special-the views were spectacular. Would we recommend it-most definately.

fun way to see more. Went to Prague for just two days with girl friends and we had so much fun on our e-bike tour! We saw parts of the city we would never have packed in by ourselves or on foot , the tour guide was fun friendly and informative (and laughed with us at our antics) , the inclusion of a picnic lunch was a great touch tooHighly recommend this tour company for a fun friendly different way to see a beautiful city! Carly, Katie & Gemma, England
Love it. Amazing tour. Definitely recommend. Friendly people with knowledgeable ride. Please visit Prague and do this tour

Essential activity in Prague. This was the best part of our trip. HIGHLY recommended to anyone who visits Prague. We got to see everything all in 3 houurs (although it felt so short). Because of the ebikes you get to go up large hills as easily as pressing a button, which allows you to see the Prague castle and all the other good stuff so quickly. The tour guides were 10/10, and helped us find some brilliant locations for activities/food later on in our holiday. They also took some amazing photos on a high quality camera and emailed them all to us free of charge! Once again, if you go to Prague you must do this!

If you are visiting Prague DO THIS!. We have just taken this tour and it was brilliant! We were well looked after from the moment we arrived - lovely bikes, great guides who were informative and good company. We cycled 17km around the city stopping at POI & to take photo's, and it was effortless - even climbing the hill to the castle! It's a wonderful way to see Prague and I would highly recommend it!

Major highway of trip. My girlfriend and I were touring Italy and the Czech Republic. We wanted to do something memorable in Prague and this ebike tour was definitely that. We saw so much of the city, and were stunned to learn that one of the guides was from my native Cleveland. On top of which, he was an accomplished yo yo champion and showed us his tricks. Really enjoyed riding through the parks and stopping for lunch. Guides were attentive and watched out for our safety. Looking for something really fun to do...try ebike!!

Not to be missed. My mum and dad did this tour last year and said if we do one thing while we're here then this is it. They were not wrong,this was the most perfect thing to do on our first day in this amazing city. We feel we've got a great feel for the place after spending just 3 hours with the fantastic guides. We covered so much ground and the Ebikes made it ridiculously easy. Didn't want it to end,thanks for a top afternoon Mary and for all your tips on Prague.

Such a laugh. Took this with mates having read the raving reviews. We all had such a great time with the guides who let us really have some fun on the bikes up in the parks.
What a cool, innovative and well thought out tour,a definite must in Prague.

So Loved This Trip. My husband and I took the ebikes as part of our family euro trip and have got to say it exceeded our expectations (and,having read the reviews, ours were high). Our 13 YO has been raving about it ever since,it was the single most fun we had as a family the entire vacation.The guides were really great and safety was their top concern, something we'd been slightly unsure about at the time of booking-an unfounded worry as we came to discover. All in all we'd highly recommend ebikes as a must do in this enchanting city.

Excellent throughout.. Couldn't recommend this tour highly enough. Fun all the way with friendly and entertaining guides who don't bore you with too many facts and drone on with dates you're likely to forget within 5 minutes of the tour ending!. Took some of the best photos of our trip during the ride. Excellent and very worthy of the five stars.

Fun for all.. We was in Prague in October 2013 as a group of 10 friends. We had pre booked this tour, and it turned out to be one of our best days. The bikes are so easy to use, and the guides are fun and knowledgeable.There is a packed lunch included with a drink. This, in our opinion is the best way to see such a stunning city.

Unforgetable experience!!. I've always thought that taking a bike tour whe travelling abroad is the best way to see the city. This was the case with ebike tours! Karel was an excellent guide, who took us all over Prague! He gave us much information on the visited sights as well as the history of the city. Even though the weather was not in our favor, we had a great time! I would highly recommend taking the tour!

Winter tour. Even though we went on the our with ebike before we had to do that again during our winter break. They are closed for winter but we gave a call and they arranged the guide for us, so basically it was like a private tour but it costs the samen (anyway the owner told us that they are open for bookings so dont be shy and give them a ring!). As the weather was really warm (as we were told quite unusall for this time of year) we really enjoyed it! Thx again guys, I´m sure its not the last time!

Brilliant fun. My BF and I agree that this was a highlight of our recent Czech holiday. The ebikes are so cool and we both want one but what makes these guys special is the service-we came away feeling as though we'd made new friends. Thank you all for a memorable birthday treat, we fell in love with both ebike and Prague and we will be back for more.

Fantastic,a total must do.. Back in Prague,this time to top up on the delicious svarak and thought I'd finally get round to posting my promised review of our fantastic ebike trip back in August.It was great fun and my husband and I laughed the entire route. If you've never been on an ebike then you're in for a real treat. Thank you to the very friendly Solomon and the lovely guides. Oh and sorry for the delay.

Family fun. My sisters and I enjoyed our time with ebike and the friendly guides karel and sage.It was a great experience and the bikes are so much fun and easy to ride.The group was small which was nice. We'd recommend it to everybody for the perfect way to see Prague.

Highlight of our trip. I travelled to Prague during a month long tour of Europe with a group of 8 other girls. We stayed in a hostel and were advised by the staff to try Ebike Prague Tours as they said it was a different and original way to see the city! With Prague being such an unfamiliar city to the group, we were surprised that it didn't take us long to find and only had to ask for directions a couple of times! Once we got to the office, the staff were more than welcoming and happy to see us. I have to admit we were all slightly scared to begin with however we had no need to worry as it was easy! All the bikes were in brilliant condition and straightforward to use. After a quick demonstration we started the tour and we couldn't believe how little effort it took to cycle on the Ebikes, even traveling up hills. Our tour guides were excellent and really informative. They seemed to really enjoy taking the tours as much as we did! Half way through the tour we stopped at a place with a wonderful view overlooking the city! Prague has some truly breathtaking views that just could not be seen on a walking tour. During lunch (which was provided for us and was lovely) we chatted with our tour guides and asked them lots of questions about Prague and its culture which they were happy to answer for us. The tour lasted about 3 hours from start to finish and we were sad when it had finished as the time flies by! For anyone wanting a genuinely enjoyable and original tour of Prague city, I would definitely recommend taking a tour with Ebike Prague Tours. It was without a doubt one of the best experiences on my travels and would repeat it again in an instant!

Staff was patient, considerate and safe. One afternoon in late October we took an EBike Tour and it was the top highlight of our many highlights in Prague. This is something I really wanted to do but my wife was reluctant, as she had lost her confidence on bikes after two mishaps in the previous months. We arrived early, just to give her a chance to become a little more familiar and comfortable with the tour. Saul, the owner, took the time to provide her with information related both to the use of the bike (some practice time) and the safety of the route and to reassure her that she could move "at her own pace". While that pace was quite slow at first, her confidence did increase and I would like to credit the guides with that accomplishment, especially Sage. While both guides were good, Sage was exceptional. The tour covered much of Prague, it was most informative, all of the bikes were in good operating condition, the majority of the route taken was without car traffic – it was fabulous!

If you only fo one thing in Prague, take this tour.. The ebike tour was so much more fun than we thought it would be, and we were expecting it to be good. The bikes are really great fun to ride, the guides are great company and very knowledgeable about the city. All in all this was excellent, if there were more than 5 stars I would give them all to this tour.

There is no better way to see Prague, than renting a bike with E-bike.. Although I suffer from Pain in my Knee, I insisted to go to the E-Bike trip ... and as long as I can bear it I will repeat it again and again. I love the trip and I adore the team working their who made me feel I'm within my family and friends and not with people doing their Job (I learned from them how to enjoy what I am doing)

Wonderful way to spend an afternoon!. Had a great time on this trip around Prague! We went across the river, around parks, up cobblestone hills(which the bikes make VERY easy for you!) and around Prague Castle and the summer palace. The tour was full of important historic information about Prague and the Czech Republic. The guides were friendly, informed and always kept us safe and together :) The lunch/snacks were delicious and we stopped for beer brewed by monks and hot wine. Just dress warm, you will be outside for 3+hours! The company provides gloves and warm clothes just in case. Riding the bikes is very easy and intuitive.

Trip highlight.. We had a wonderful time in Prague on Ebikes. We'd never tried them before and, as regular cyclists, weren't sure about 'cheating'.We were soon won over,they were great fun and really did require no effort. It was very cold so Mary's advice to layer up was well received. Thanks for a great trip.

Nice and easy. The ebike tour is one of the best ways to know the city. The bikes are really nice to ride, the electric motor even makes going uphill easy. This makes it more than possible for people of all ages and physical condition to be a part of the group and not get left behind. The staff are extremely nice and the guides are locals and as such have fantastic knowledge and stories to share. I would advice everyone try it and I'm sure you will love it.

Brilliant. It was the first time we have visited Prague, the ebike tour proved to be an unbeatable way to get to know the city. Not only you get to see the city's top attractions you can get to know the side of Prague that the locals get to enjoy. I would definitely advice this to everyone, the staff are knowledgable and extremely nice.

The best of Prague.. Our ebike tour was excellent fun and provided the perfect intro to Prague.Despite the cold weather,we all really enjoyed ourselves(gloves were provided at no extra charge and were essential).Hank and Karel were great guides and kept us informed and amused throughout.We'd definitely recommend this to everybody,it was great fun.

Unique way to see the city. I've been talking about how much fun the Ebike tour was all week. After being in Prague for several months and this was a completely new experience and a nice way to finally get to know the city where I'll be living. The electric bikes are a blast! The sites were amazing and our tour guides both lots of fun and really informative about the city and sites. Such a great way to get to know the city! -Beautiful views, good company, fabulous city & awesome electric bikes!!!

Best tour of the city!. The entire tour and riding an electric bike exceeded my expectations. It was so much fun and barely requires any effort to ride those bikes, all you have to do is pedal. I've been on many different tours around Prague but this one shows you the more scenic side of the city that I've never seen before. You will see the greatest views of the city because this tour takes you to locations which are extremely difficult to get to by simply walking. These e-bikes make everything easier. We had Hank as our tour guide and he's the the chillest guy. He even took us to extra locations for fun. Highly recommend. I want to do this again when I return to Prague!

Such Fun!. First bike tour of any kind. Loved the ebike, made it a bit easier to pedal around. Due to the rainy Sunday of our tour it was just my friend and I with two guides. Love that the tour wasn't cancelled and that it is offered in off season. We covered maybe 12+ miles during our ride, made it all over the city and saw places we wouldn't have otherwise. The guides were great, one native, one expat, both very knowledgeable and just fun to be around. The company provided my friend and I with ponchos, cold weather bike gloves and more athletic type jackets to wear during the tour. They also provided us with water and snacks and took pictures of us throughout the tour which we received via email. Such a fun day, great introduction to Prague!

EBike Prague. We had a wonderful time. Our guides were great! The combination of expat Hank along with our fab Czech guide gave us amazing insight as to life in Prague. The bikes were fun and easy to handle. Couldn't imagine not having the electric assist on the cobbles and hills. Lunch was perfect from the top of the Prague. Would highly recommend this tour!

Fantastic. Just went on a tour with my mates and I can truly say zipping around on electric bikes is an awesome way to see the city of Prague. Throughout the tour, our guides Helush and Marc were so friendly and knew all about the significant buildings and monuments in Prague. They informed us of so many more opportunities Prague has to offer, I suggest going on this tour before doing anything else..such a great way to learn about and see the city!

Great Tour. This was my first e-bike experience and it couldn't have been any better. Super easy to ride, no matter what you skill level. We took off from their building, rode across one of the bridges, and up over to a park/beer garden for photo ops. From there we rode through a park basically all the way to the prague castle. It seems like a long way but it's really a breeze with the bikes. The guides were knowledgeable and helpful. The highlight was a visit to the Brewery at the Monastery near the castle grounds. My only criticism is that they could have been more informative about the various buildings and historical details. They told us a little about living in prague and some about its history, but definitely could have been more informative. Overall though, a truly wonderful experience.
E&G. 16th Nov. A wonderful experience- fun, easy, great guides. We saw most of the main attractions around Prague. Would highly recommend this.

Great fun for all ages!. It was a chilly day today in Prague but we had a great time on the e-bike tour. Electric bikes are perfect for this hilly city, making it so easy - my 13 year old son desperately wants one now! Our guides Helena and Bert were entertaining and knowledgable. We appreciated the loan of the bike gloves :-) I'd recommend this tour to anyone, of any age.

Just do it!,. I confess that I was very nervous about this tour. I nearly backed out at the last minute. I am sooooo glad I didn't! I am no longer a spring chicken, I am a large lady and not exactly fit and I was very nervous about cycling on roads.....but I had am amazing time. The bikes really do make it easy and the guides (especially Bertie) look after you and give you the confidence to enjoy the ride. If you have any doubts about doing this....forget them....and do it anyway....you will be very happy that you did!!

High on views and service, low on information and key sites. First of all I must say the service was really good, the staff very helpful and friendly. The bikes were in top condition, there is also a small picnic included and a bottle of water in the price (37 euros). It was a nice day and the guides (Hank and Helena) were very friendly, we had a really nice bike ride around the parks with some great views. BUT: If you think you are going to see all the main historic sites in the old town, and you are going to learn lots, then you should not go on this tour. If you are really interested in the history of prague, and want to learn about its development, its different periods including the second world war and the socialist era, then this is the wrong tour for you. 90% of the tour is spent on the Castle side of the river, you don't visit the Jewish quarter, or learn very much about the architecture and the old town. If you want to have a nice ride, with some nice views and just a little bit of basic info, then decide whether or not you find that worth 37 euros. I am not sure I did.

No sore feet!. Great way to get a good overview of Prague. the bikes are fantastic and make it so easy especially uphill. Great service including a loan of jacket and gloves. Hank and Helena were perfect as guides. Do it!

Superb way to celebrate my 73rd birthday!!. This event was truly a highlight of my visit to this part of Europe! I loved it!All the people involved were superior. The two guides, Helena and Bert, took such great care that we were all comfortable and able to enjoy their knowledge of Prague. They had perfect language and people skills. I felt that I learned such a lot, not only about Prague, but about feeling young again! Many thanks!!
Best way to see Prague!. Fantastic! A relaxing, informative and friendly tour of Pragues best sights. Great value for money. This tour comes highly recommended.

Fantastic!!!. We booked this activity after reading some good reviews. We were not disappointed. The couple in the office were pleasant and very enthusiastic as they greeted us on our arrival. The e bikes were very easy to use and made it effortless to cycle around the city. We travelled about 16km around the city over three hours, including a little break for our complimentary picnic. We had two excellent guides, one Czech girl and one American guy, and both were fun and informative. They were very approachable. They did not overload us with information but gave us a fantastic perspective of the city. Without doubt the best way to get around the entire city. Would highly recommend it. Fantastic.

Highlight of our trip! . This is a must do in Prague! Had such a great time and really felt like I got to see the most important parts quickly and easily. I got so many great photos! Thanks Mary, Hellena and Hank for such a wonderful time! Unforgettable :)

Top level fun, best memory of our vacation !. After reading the numerous glowing reviews submitted by others, we (two 60+ adults) decided to give 3 hour EBike city tour a try. Not a mistake!!  Mary was prompt with email responses to our questions, husband and native Scotsman, Solomon who we met at check-in proved friendly and hospitable.  Our guide tandem, Helena and Bert ("Beauty and the Beast"), shepherded our diverse age and capability group with care and consideration providing several important tips for safe travel on streets and bike paths. Instructions for use of EBikes was brief but sufficient. All members of our group seemed to easily use the bikes. The bikes negotiated cobblestone surfaces without difficulty. The electric motor smoothly engaged and grade climbs were a breeze. The "pulsed" power boost when needed worked as described and generally was a hoot (great fun) to use. The shop location is easy to overlook--as one enters from the street through a corridor into a somewhat untended appearance courtyard. The shop/bikes are located at the rear left corner of the courtyard. Door to the shop may be closed/locked except when preparing for scheduled ride. The provided snack and water was more than sufficient. Overally, my wife and I found the ride as top level fun, a great way to supplement a tourist visit to Praha, appropriate for anyone who can ride a bicycle, and rates as our best single experiece during 12 day vacation in central Europe.
Amazing Experience!. Well executed tour of stunning Prague. Staff were friendly and knowledgeable, Jenda and Sage were extremely awesome. Highly Recommended!

Great way to see the city. We had a great time riding about the city. The ebike made going up the hills easy and a lot of fun. Our guides, Helen and Bert, were a lot of fun and provided interesting facts along the route. The owners were wonderfully helpful and charming as the fitted us and got us ready to go. This is a must do activity when you visit Prague.

Great experience!. We chanced upon the Ebike tours on Tripadvisor and saw the great reviews about it, so we decided to give it a try! A decision that we never regretted. Mary was really friendly and the guides were great! Love it that they keep the number small - we had only 10 in a group.

Absolutely outstanding!!!!!. We loved, loved, loved, this company and tour!! From Mary and Sol with booking and ebike fitting to our two amazing guides Helena and Bert, this experience was simply wonderful. We felt safe on the bikes immediately, and had the most unique and impressive perspective of this amazing city and it's top sites...and then some! The price is extremely reasonable, particularly for the combination of the ebike experience and the tour itself. This is a MUST do in Prague!!!

Best bike tour of Prague. Ebike Prague is without a doubt the best bike tour you can take in Prague. Make sure to take the tour on the first day of your visit to prague as the guides (karel and Bert for me) have an in depth knowledge of the city and you ask ask them any questions you want. I hope you enjoy your trip to Prague!

A highlight. We plumped for the ebikes as we needed a guided tour and the Segway option looked a bit wobbly. We had a good run round and up to the castle. Followed the guide's advice and later visited the technical museum, thanks for that. An excellent choice of activity, relaxed but we got a lot done

Fav activity in Prague. Ebikes - is definitely my favourite activity in Prague! Forget seagways, big shouting wearying walk-on tours, poor hop-on-hop-offs. This is REALLY the best way to explore THE juiciest places of Prague. This is actually my second time, when I took a ride with the company. Everything just could not be better-you will never be bored (even my 60 y.o. father did it well), you have snacks included, and perfect English guides that know so much interesting stunning facts about the city. The activity is all about great emotions. Simply 5 stars.November 2012 & October 2013

Highly recommend this as how to get your bearings in Prague. When rocking up to the entrance with a couple of minutes to spare and without booking a space on a tour, we were greeted with a cheery smile and a welcoming demeanour. With two groups both made of 4 people, the ratio of 1 tour guide per group made for a really informative and in depth experience around a whole range of different sites in the city. Bert and Helena took us through the back streets on the electric bikes. None of our group had used ebikes before but will certainly be trying to find other tours as this was a great way to get about. The picnic was a great addition to the tour and certainly not expected.I would definitely tell anyone heading to Prague to get involved in this no matter what the weather or your experience of bike riding. Well done guys. All the best, the Scottish group.

Awesome Tour!!. Had an amazing time on the E bike tour!! Was a great way to see all the highlights of Prague! I have amazing pictures! The staff was super friendly and the E bike was easy to use ! Had a great time and would absolutely go again next time I am in Prague!

This is the way to see Pague!. We took the three-hour tour around the city, seeing some of the less obvious spots together with some of the well known highlights. The guides were knowledgeable, kind and relaxed and provided useful tips along the way. This is a good way to start your stay in Prague.The bikes are fun too, effortless peddling, even uphill. Amazing!

Marvellous time with ebike in Prague.. My husband and I thoroughly enjoyed our ebike tour.It was well organised and great fun.The bikes are so easy to use,simply pedal and go. They're in top condition too,polished to a shine.Booking is easy,a simple text to Mary and we were all set.Thank you all for a fantastic afternoon in beautiful Prague.We will most certainly be recommending you to all our friends.Annja & Benji.

Best bike tour we've taken in Europe. And we've taken many. Starting with Mary, who readily changed our reservations from a rainy Friday to a sunny Sunday, to Jenda and Bert, our stalewart guides, who made the tour interesting and enjoyable, to the electronic bikes which made Prague's hills melt away, it was great.Unlike most bike tours, this one actually stops at sights and lets you see them, including St. Vitus Cathedral, to admire the amazing metal doors and the beautiful stained class windows. Bert proved some helpful history and facts in the church while Jenda showed us many hidden treasures and secrets along the way.Also had a nice snack pack lunch and waters provided and some amazing stops and views along the way. Amazing views of the St. Charles Bridge end the trip.Tip: Diouha street is a bit confusing and so make sure you know where the ebike shop is before you get there or you might be late and miss a wonderful ride. Also, the guides work for trips and are well worth generous ones!

Fun ride. We took the Ebike city tour at the end of September. It was sort of a lark to try out the electric bikes, which we had never done and it was another way to get around all those little city streets without having to walk yet another day on cobblestone streets. The bikes are heavier than normal but the motor makes up for it. You start on a low setting and the power only comes on if you are turning the pedals, so you don't get motor assist unless you want it. The handbrakes also cut the motor assist. They had us go to level 2 power when we went up the hill to the castle and you should have seen my normally cautious wife disappear straight up the hill, coattails flying.Intelligent guide, Francesco, spoke good English, from Italy.

Excellent,fun and very easy. Really enjoyed our tour. Informative, fun and mega easy way to get around Prague and see all the main sights. Very friendly service and lovely tour guides. We were well taken care of throughout. Highly recommended.

Highlight of our Prague stay.. We're a group of girl friends in our twenties and joined ebikes as part of a birthday celebration weekend.We all had a great fun time with our guides who pulled out all the stops for us.Ian was amazing and the guy at the back was really attentive,in particular to our Laura who wasn't too sure to begin with.This is a great way to tour Prague particularly if time is short.Thanks for an excellent time and the bubbly at the end-a very nice touch.

Lots of fun. Friends told us about this tour and said we could not miss it.Good advice,my sister and I both had a fantastic time with Karel (the local)and Hank (from the US and, incidentally,the worlds yoyo champ).They made the tour really engaging and clearly have a special love of Prague but then who wouldn't.We covered plenty of ground easily and quickly with the ebikes which made the whole thing effortless (layering up was good advice from Mary). We will be sure to look out for ebikes in other places we visit as it would be hard to go back to a regular bike,especially in places with hills like here.Thanks for a great time,we'll certainly recommend you.

Discover Prague. On our 3 hour tour we saw so much more of Prague than we would have on foot or by bus (not that we'd ever be found sitting on a tour bus).The guides,Jenda and Sage were really welcoming and took great care of us throughout.The bikes are so easy to use and kept everybody entertained and smiling, despite it being less than balmy weather.We found ebike on tripadvisor and it certainly lived up to its outstanding reviews.Booking was very easy and the response from Mary like lightening.If you love getting into a city properly then this is the event for you.

Great way to see the whole city, get fresh air and come close to "everything" without having to wait. What a great way to experience Prague on bike, but without the effort going up and down hills. The E-Bike does all the work for you allowing you to admire the views of this beautiful city from the hills surrounding the city. The bikes are really easy to work and they fly up the hills with very little effort. The ebikes are in top condition, really comfortable and easy to maneuver. There are snacks and water provided which is a nice touch.Our small group (10 persons) enjoyed 2 guides, Bert (from the US) and Karol (from the Czeck republic) who gave us an informative, engaging and at times humorous tour, whilst also allowing plenty of time to really enjoy the bikes.We also enjoyed getting the story of Mary and her family moving to Czeck republic. Thanks to all of you on eBikePrague involved for making our short stay in your amazing city so very memorable!

Top trip. We were recommended ebikes by friends who'd been in the summer and they weren't wrong.We had a really fun time,Prague is so beautiful and the sheer passion of the guides for the love of their city added to our pleasure.It was our first time on ebikes and we all loved them.One word of warning-Mary told us we ought to wrap up but we totally underestimated just how cold it would be,the lack of exercise becomes very apparent and an extra layer would be well advised.To conclude, this is an absolutely wonderful and well thought out tour.11/10,thanks guys for a most memorable day.Raine and the gang,KS.

Excellent Choise. - Good Service: start on time, finish on time, good trip plan, stopping at nice places, guides well familiar wiith city attraction/points, vey good english speakers.- Very safe, guides are carefull, circuit is well planned- easy cicling the e-bikes everybody can do the circuit no matter age, no effort needed.- attentive staff, helpful. it was a cold weather and they borrow me a coate; they gave us, apart of the trip many useful tips about prague location and attactions.- I do recommend them if you are coming to Prague.

A once in a lifetime experience. Definitely a 'must-do' while visiting Prague, I would even recommend it to english speaking residents. Not only do you get to see all of the sites of down-town, the river and the castle, but you get to ride an electric bike! The bikes are really comfortable and easy to maneuver. For the first 10 minutes I could not stop laughing because I was having so much fun on the bike! The guides were very friendly and knowledgeable, and the whole operation was very well organized and put together.

First thing to do in Prague. Possibly the best thing to do in Prague and the best company! We got an amazing tour of the city with so much personal insight shared by the guides! The bikes are so easy to ride - the hills are a snap to navigate. We even had lunch provided (and I'm a picky eater.) The personal attention by the owners of the company has made me a fan forever! Definitely the first thing to do to get your bearing of the city. Better than the non-electric bike tours because those hills would be hard otherwise. Enjoy the adventure!
An awesome way to see Prague!. Loved it, wonderfulviews of the city and your tour guides will give you lots of insider tips on where to eat and drink.

Fantastic Tour, Lots of Fun. Great way to see the city! Made several stops where the guides told history and stories along the way. Guides were informative and funny....1 even gave a special show for us as he's a yo-yo world champion. Some of the stops had excellent views of the city that a general tourist probably wouldn't find. Awesome way to spend the morning....highly recommended to everyone! Thanks for the fun tour!

Choose a tour with ebike on your first day in Prague.. My friends and I had a great time on the 3 hour tour. We loved the Ebikes,they slaughter the hills and are so easy to ride.The guides were both really friendly and patient with us and we enjoyed a tasty little picnic with spectacular views over Prague.It was a great thing to do on our first day.

Fun!. This was one of the highlights of our trip to Prague. We took a 6:00 p.m. tour in September and were awed by the unique perspective riding through the city at dusk allowed. The bikes were fun to ride and made it effortless to navigate the hills of Prague. Our guides, Karel and Hank, were excellent. Mary and Sol at the office were also great, making the whole experience thoroughly enjoyable. I would echo another reviewer’s tip to take the tour toward the beginning of your trip, as it gives a great overview of the city.

A Perfect Tour. This was one of the best tours I have ever taken of a city. Anywhere. The electric bike was a fun and easy toy to play with that alone could keep you entertained for hours. our guides Karl and Sage were relaxed, knowledgeable, and also very flexible. We had a dynamic itinerary bat they didn't hustle us off to the next place if we were interested in spending more time in a place. We even had an impromptu stop at a beer garden ;) I would recommend this tour to anyone. you won't be bored, you won't be dissatisfied, and you will see far more of Prague than you would on any walking tour, especially the hilly areas where the best views are. Thanks again Ebike!

Great tour. Outstandingly good tour through the Pragues sightseeings and other points of interest. Very skilled and friendly guide made the tour realy pleasant despite of a bad weather. The bicycle equiped with an electric motor makes the tour fun even for a no-bikers like me.

Fun time even in the rain.. We loved this tour even though the weather was miserable.The guides were great fun and remained in good spirits throughout which kept us enthused and happy.There were only 4 in the group,probably because of the rain,which made it really personal too.The bikes are great fun and essential for tackling the hills in Prague.Would look out for ebike again,top fun.
great day! well organized!. the ebike tour was great! the electric motor made it very easy for getting around and tge tour guides had great knowledge of the area! thoroughly enjoyed ourselves

fantastic tour. A wonderful tour with great guides and equipment. Really tell you about the unusual 'local' stories about prague and provide great tips on how to see the 'real' prague and save money on the way! A fantastic way to get around a hilly city.Tony & Denise Australia
great. a must do, great view of the city and fun! Guides had great stories to tell. Stopping along the way you get to try some fruits in an almost unknown orchard set up for the city.

BOOK IT NOW!!!. I can't speak highly enough about what an awesome tour this was. For a place to have (at the time of this writing) 97% 5* and 3% 4*, it must be good and this certainly was. I booked the night riding tour this past weekend, and I was the only one who booked. Normally, this would be cause for cancelling the tour, but they went ahead with the tour as planned with both guides. So, I was lucky enough to have a personalized tour with Hank and Karel (might be spelling that wrong).Booking this tour on my first day in Prague was a lucky decision and I highly recommend that others do the same- you'll get a terrific overview of all the great sights, some impressive views of the city, and a great sense of the history of Prague. The e-bikes were in terrific shape, very easy to ride, and they packed a small picnic snack at the halfway point of the tour.This tour set-up the rest of my Prague visit and made the whole weekend so enjoyable.

See a little more of Prague by electric bike. After a day seeing the sights of the centre of Prague on foot it was great to explore further afield on these easy to use electric bikes. The 17km tour was no effort at all and felt very safe as the route was almost entirely on cycle tracks and path ways and whilst one guide led the tour another brought up the rear. We stopped along the way and the guides pointed out lots of interesting sights in an informative and fun way.

Holiday highlight.. Our time spent touring with ebike has been the absolute highlight of our holiday so far.We went for the morning tour on our first day and it was the perfect start to our stay as it gave us a great sense of our bearings.Janda and Helena were both excellent guides and made sure we were happy and safe the whole tour.The bikes are fantastic and make mince meat of the Czech hillsHighly recommended,A+++

Great way to experience Prague. What a great way to experience Prague on bike, but without the effort going up and down hills. The E-Bike does all the work for you allowing you to admire the views of this beautiful city from the hills surrounding the city. Saw all the mains sights as well as a few extras from our awesome guides Karol and Bert. Would recommend to anyone wanting to see Prague.

Easy And Fun Time For All With Ebike Prague tours.. Wow,what a wonderful creation ebikes are,we'd never even heard of them before now but we're well and truly won over. It took a few minutes to get used to, but, zipping up those hills effortlessly was very quickly a breeze.Our guides Jenda and Carel led us safely through Prague and made the tour a fun packed three hours.Mary was excellent with directions and answered all our mails promptly.We're in our thirties and reasonably fit but there were some older people out with us and they clearly found it just as easy.One word of warning though,try ebikes and there'll be no going back to regular bikes,they're way too good.Wishing you the very best of luck with your venture,you're clearly off to a flying start.

The best way to see Prague. We took this tour on our first day in Prague. It gave us a great overview of the city and we saw things that we never would have taken time to seek out.
