The guides were very fun and knowledgeable. They even provided a nice little mid-ride snack and time to relax. It doesn't matter what your biking skill is since the bikes do most of the work for you. Really very little effort on your part. Safe, fun and very interesting. This ended up being one of the highlights of our entire 3-week trip. Don't miss it!

Thoroughly Loved Ebikes In Prague.. With just one full day in Prague,we were looking to maximise our experience.Thanks to tripadvisor,we found this company. It was the best choice for our flying visit and all their amazing reviews really do stack up.The ebikes are in top condition and they give you really cool helmets too.There are snacks and water provided which is a nice touch.Our small group enjoyed 2 guides who gave us an informative,engaging and at times humorous tour, whilst also allowing plenty of time to really enjoy the bikes.Thanks to all involved for making our short stay in your amazing city so very memorable.Nigel & Anna,Norfolk,UK.

Best. Way to see Prague. This was a great tour! Just do it. No great level of fitness is required. As a couple of mature aged travellers, this saved our aching joints. The staff were friendly and knowledgeable. We were asked to arrive 15 minutes before the tour so we were all organised to leave on time. Staff were patient and helpful explaining how the electric bikes worked and about the traffic in Prague. Most of the time we were on bike paths so we were safe. The bikes made the hills really easy. Lunch was provided and we ate together in a beautiful park overlooking Prague. We were shown lots of hidden gems around Prague.

A great way to overview Prague. Thank to all the tripadvisor fellows who reviewed this tour and help to decide on the spot which tour to take! Everything with this tour is great: the e bikes are a great way to cover long distances within the city and at the same time be able to enjoy the views as if you were walking, the guides were friendly and knowledgeable, the path allows stunning views of the city from the heights of the parks near Petrin, and so on! Definitely is worth the money.

Look out for ebike Prague.. You could be forgiven for assuming ebike is a global brand,turns out its a start up. From the initial booking to saying goodbye,everything is so very professional yet friendly at the same time. Everybody you meet seems to have been trained in excellent customer care which is worth mentioning as you may come across some very abrupt service in Prague, we certainly have. They also all seemed very happy in their work,always a good sign.The guides,Karel and Hank were the perfect hosts and we enjoyed our whole 3 hours with them.It's €40 for the trip which is great value,you get a brand new ebike,guiding and a picnic.We opted for the morning tour which starts at 10 so don't go wild at breakfast if you're to enjoy the snacks.The location is very central and easy to find.The route is well thought out and ideal for your first day in Prague,we saw so much in those 3 hours and really wished we'd joined at the beginning of our stay.It wouldn't surprise me if you see these guys popping up elsewhere,good luck with the spread.

If carling made bike tours..... In Prague for 4 days and we decided to do a tour to get our bearings. What a brilliant choice ebikes was. It was an excellent experience and the tour guides, jenda and sage were brilliant. The set up seems very professional and you know straight off your in good hands. Despite the awful rain it's an experience I'd love to repeat. Hope they've got new tours when I return to Prague!!!

Alot of fun and off the beaten path route. I hurt my knee a few days before going to Prague so we switched from a regular bike tour to the ebike tour off the recommendations of tripadvisor. We has SO much fun and it was almost effortless going up the couple hills! They routed us around the perimeter of the city so we saw many sights that we might not otherwise have seen. Our young guide, Linda, was very knowledgeable as well as the other guide that served as safety man at the rear of the group. The instructions given on how to ride this bike were clear and easy to follow. The parks were beautiful as well as the panoramic views. We even had time to stop into St Titus Cathedral in the Prague Castle for a quick look for free! A nice lunch was provided and we ate under the trees and we also stopped for a special treat to pick the Mirabel fruit off the orchard trees we rode past. YUM..definitely recommend doing this on your trip to Prague. It was 3 hours and we enjoyed every minute of it. It was nice to be so effortless yet cover so much "land"!

You're in for a safe and fun time with ebike Prague.. We booked in to do the evening tour with this company and, from the off, knew we were in good hands.The owner was professional and friendly and equipped us with quality helmets before adjusting our seat height to perfection.The ebikes were brand new,great fun and so easy to use, and take all of 30 seconds to get to grips with.We had the pleasure of 2 excellent guides who entertained us at the various stops.The inclusive picnic was a nice touch and what an amazing place to enjoy it,looking out over the city.Great value and highly recommended.

The only word to describe is Awesome. Worried was the word to describe me before the tour began, i have limited fitness level and had not been on a bike for 15 years. well you never forget how to ride a bike and the bike did all the work to my relieve. On arrival the owner made me feel really welcome and relaxed. Marc and Karel were our guides and what a range and depth of knowledge they both have on the local culture/venues. It was amazing the best thing we did all week. Everyone was made to feel welcome and i can truely say i have left prague knowing that i have made some good friends on the tour and cant wait to go back to prague for another ebike tour. If you do anything in prague make sure its the ebikes!!!!!!!

You're so gonna LOVE this!. Nursing a very heavy head,I bravely embarked on the ten a.m tour with Jenda.I'll be honest,it was absolutely the last thing I felt like doing but I'd booked weeks before and felt obliged to show up.The owner was very friendly and welcoming towards me,sorry if I seemed a trifle disinterested (I really was suffering).I was introduced to the rest of the group, hello super enthusiastic fresh people,goodbye sanity or so I felt.Here it is;I could not have been more wrong,infact,perhaps ebike should rebrand themselves as the ultimate panacea for the hangover crew!There really was nothing to it,the bikes cruised along effortlessly,allowing me to sit back and enjoy the breeze. Thirty minutes in and I was so bowled over that I'd even forgiven the absinthe,lol.Great bikes,great fun,top service,exceptional value. I LOVED it.Oh,and there was a picnic included too which looked nice.

Great,Smashing,Super.. The wife n I had a marvellous time with Jenda and Sage out on ebikes.The tour was perfect for us not so fit oldies with our less than agile knees.The bikes are really easy to work and they fly up the hills with very little effort.Friendly owners,excellent value for money and well worth 3 hours of your holiday.

Dont think about it...Just do it!. Took this tour last week and it was FANTASTIC!The bikes are easy to use and even in really hot weather we never broke a sweat...the bikes do all the work for you and anyone of any age group/fitness level will be able to enjoy this tour.This tour is soo much more than the usual generic tourist spots...we saw beautiful areas of Prague we would never have even thought about going - from stunning view points to stunning parks and even local public orchards where the guide showed us that you can pick the fruit straight off the trees.As soon as we arrived at the Ebike base we were made to feel extremely welcome and we could tell we were in for a great day.The guides were fantastic! We were taken out by Karel and Marc and they proved to be very knowledgeable, welcoming and professional...and they had a great sense of humour.The picnic lunch provided was a great mix and thoughtfully prepared...we sat and had lunch in a stunning location...with a view over all of the beautiful city.Simply put this was by far the highlight of our trip and we did EVERYTHING! Dont think about it...Just do it!Thank you to everyone at ebike Prague!!!!

Just do it,with ebike Prague.. We just finished the evening tour on ebike and it was a whole lot of fun,especially the last hour through the darkness.It was around 50 bucks which we all felt to be good value considering there are two guides, (reassuring for the more nervous ones in the group), and it also included a packed box of snacks with water.We'd already visited the castle earlier today and experienced how crowded it gets so, to enjoy it at night has been an awesome and peaceful contrast.The ebikes are great fun and good for all ages,we're family and friends between the ages of 26 and 64 and we all equally enjoyed ourselves.Our only regret is doing it toward the end of our stay as we got to see way more on the bikes in three hours than we'd managed reach in four days.

Brilliant. Did the 10am tour. Staff very welcoming, equipment great and guides spot on. Don't worry about mobility issues, you won't even break a sweat using the bikes.Tour guides were knowledgeable and friendly, spoke fluent English, and seemed to really enjoy their job.You'll see sights you probably wouldn't know about otherwise and get a picnic included in the price, which was about £35 per person. Payment is cash only and all bookings can be sorted by email. Metro stop is very close.Highly recommended.

Must Do. BEST way to experience a remarkable city.. I usually shy away from organized tours (read: NEVER do them), but we were so glad we took the risk and did this. The Ebikeprague team is outstanding. We booked the night tour (offered during summer months) which started at 6PM. Our guides, Karel and Bert, were incredibly generous with their time and stories. We booked last minute, so we had the added benefit of getting a de-facto private tour. Both had tons of insight, and the personal touch was wonderful and not "touristy" at all. Additionally - if you've never ridden an e-bike before, you're in for a treat. We were a bit concerned given the fact that all of old Prague is cobble stone and hilly, but the e-bike does 90% of the work for you while climbing. It's truly a wonderful way to see the city. Do it on your first day to help decide where (and how) you want to spend the remainder of your time in this charming city.

Highly Recommend!!. We very much enjoyed our half-day tour, largely as a result of the young lady who was our guide. The only downside was the other guide riding at the rear who was American (and I'm American!). Our young lady took us to see many interesting sites and shared a lot about the country's history. You'll be very glad you booked this tour in Prague!

The koh-i-Noor of sightseeing tours.. After much deliberation,our group finally agreed on taking an ebike tour and what a tremendous decision it turned out to be.We were greeted by the delightful owners,husband and wife team-Mary and Saul,who were so very welcoming that we all immediately felt like we were in the company of old friends.This warmness continued as we were introduced to two wonderful guides who went on to take us through the whole of Prague in just three hours. They even included a tasty box of snacks and water which we got to enjoy from the most amazing vantage point.We were all ebike virgins to start with but now all want one,and will be seriously looking in to it when we get home. Not for fitness,forget it but for the sheer fun of it,they're brill.Thank you again Mary & Sol and the very best of luck with your future,you've a fantastic product.

Terrific. My wife and I joined the group tour with ebike,lead by Carel and we both agree it was an absolute highlight of our trip so far. We were warmly welcomed by Sol who introduced us to the fantastic bikes which might have been brand new if they were a day.We were also kitted out with top notch helmets before being introduced to the guides (there were two, in our small group of six) and, after a short but clear explanation of the bikes (not much to it), we were on our way.I won't say too much other than we both audibly whooped as the bikes took us on our way,they're incredible fun,so easy and there's no way we'll ride a normal bike again. If you're looking for a safe,fun way to discover Prague and are a tad too cool to be seen on a Segway then sign up with this company,highly recommended.

Ebikeprague Tours. Fantastic experience - this is a must do in Prague - do this ahead of any other tours - imagine all the fun of bike riding without the hard work. The word "hills" does not exist on an e-bike. Added to this is the informative and friendly people from Ebikeprague Tours.

amazing tour, friendly guides. Everyone who works here goes above and beyond to serve their clients. They place a high emphasis on safety and have two guides: one leading and the other bringing up the rear. The guides spoke excellent english and were very knowledgeable. our guides were from the UK and US and were extremely friendly and give you all kinds of an insider perspective of how best to optimize your stay in prague. Use them and you will not regret it.

Two big thumbs up for ebike Prague tours.. What a delightful start to the day.Our friends joined this company last year and couldn't recommend it enough.We've actually visited Prague several times but,since the first requisite city tour several years ago, we haven't actually paid to do any other sightseeing.Anyway,in a nutshell we're thrilled to have broken that chain,this company deserves recognition and their tour is worth every penny. Ebikes are totally under recognised, (I confess I'd never heard of them til our mates started raving), and are absolutely the best way to explore this hilly city.Wonderful throughout and a big thanks to Yenda,you were excellent.

Wow,what an introduction to Prague.. Do this the first day of your stay in beautiful Prague to get the best possible overview.In three hours we saw more or less all of Prague (excluding the old time square and Charles bridge which,believe me,are best meandered on foot). Our guides, Jenda and Burt,were wonderful and balanced a well thought out mix of ebike experience and history just perfectly.Highly recommended to anyone and everyone of all ages or capabilities.Thanks guys, Jenna&Dave, Islington,UK.

Best way to orientate yourself in Prague. With a busy conference and not much time, I wanted to get beyond the packed areas of the city. This was a perfect 3 hour introduction. Never having ridden an electric bike before, I was unsure of what to expect. The team were fantastic from start to finish and there was nothing to it - I loved it from the moment we set off. With plenty of opportunity for stopping, hearing about the city, taking photos etc, the tour still kept us moving and we covered a lot of ground. I'm not a 'tour' person but this was informal, friendly and informative and didn't feel like a tour - just a lot of fun. I'm sold on electric bikes now, too. I would recommend this highly as the best way to see a lot of Prague in a short time and to see bits of Prague that you wouldn't necessarily get to if you are only there for a brief visit.

Simply Kilo India Charlie Kilo Alpha Sierra Sierra!!!. I have lived in Prague for 14 years and over that time I have received many friends and family for visits. Since I am not much of a tour guide, when visitors ask what to go see or what should they do, I would usually respond with, 'buy a tour book!'After my first eBike experience, the next time someone ask those questions, I will respond with, "book an eBike tour. Especially on the first day in town because they (eBike) give you the lay of the land and you see and learn a lot. And can I join you?"Also the bikes are awesome cool and they make you look like you are attacking a hill while you are barely pedaling! That coming from a fat 47 year old!

This tour pips the lot.. Undoubtedly the best experience I've ever had on an organised tour.The electric bikes are magnificent and once you're used to them (after about 5 minutes),there'll be no going back to classic bikes. You still pedal but with no effort,it's hard to describe but they entirely exceeded my expectation.The 2 guides were brilliant,fun and informative enough without becoming tiresome. As a single traveller,I could not recommend this tour highly enough. The cruise down through the vast orchards after the picnic was truly exhilarating.Perfect for a break away from the conference,I thoroughly enjoyed every minute.
Amazing sights!. I highly recommend this tour if you want to focus a bit less on cycling and more on seeing this beautiful city.

A Truly magnificent experience.. Awesome is an overused word normally, but not when in relation to EBIKE Prague. My son and i experienced it yesterday, and from arrival we were treated like VIP's, with nothing being too much trouble. The tour is spectacular, the guides, Jenda and Carl were friendly, easy going and knowledgable about their subject matter, and their City is stunning. I truly have no hesitation in recommending this as a way to see Prague, and the bikes are enormous fun, requiring no effort ATALL! Thanks guys.

First time in Prague and first time by e-bike. Dear All,it was my first visit to Prague and first experiance about e-bike. I can say that it was really good excursion. The guides were very smart, frendly and really care abour safety (because it was a little bit rainy during the tour). The route is good - not too long and not too short, very good places to see Prague. What is also imprtant - bikes are in good shape, quite new.So my conclusion - strongly recomended as a first day excursion to see city in general.Regards,Andrey Petrov

A must do!. Absolutely excellent - couldn't recommend it more! Interesting, fun and learnt so much. The staff were very friendly and professional. So glad we couldn't find the bike tour we originally planned on because there is no way it could have beaten this tour!

As Simon would say,its four big fat yeses for ebike Prague tours.. We all want an ebike,I bet everybody says that but they really are that good.The four of us,all girls in our forteens :-) totally adored our time with Jenda and Linda,it was awesome. The bikes rip up the hills with soooo little effort,it's ridiculously easy and so much fun. There was a nice snack lunch provided with an amazing view and they even posted our photos on Facebook afterwards,happy times.A+ all the way.

A must do. Having studied in Prague for 6 months and then returned for a summer I thought I'd pretty much seen it all. I was wrong. Ebike Prague Tours is the fastest way to see more of Prague than a normal visit would ever allow. Great panoramic views of Prague from above with detailed facts about the history of the beautiful city before your eyes. Why stay on foot and see little when you can get a set of wheels and zip all over the city!

Great tour around Prague with ebikes!. Had this tour booked by a friend, and really met our expectations and was very funny!! It is a great way to see the city of Prague from a different perspective, in a nice and healthy way. We had Jenda and Mark as our guides, Jenda being local and Mark from the United States, and they hay many funny and interesting stories to tell us on our way through different parts of the city, including the castle, the metronome, the "Czech eiffel tower" (as tall as the paris one, if you count the mountain as well) We also had a nice packed snack box, with water, fruit, chocolate, some nuts and a nice piece of pastry. We really enjoyed the tour, and as it is for a maximum of 10 people each trip its perfect to go around without having to wait long times for people. The bikes were in perfect condition, so were the helmets and all equipment needed. We had a nice break for our snacks on a mountain overlooking the city, from were we could see the TV tower as well, known for being the 2nd ugliest building in the world. Overall a great experience, recommended for everyone as long as you can ride a bike :) Will repeat if xominf back to Prague!

Great way to visit Prague!. I done the tour in the summer and it was a great way to see Prague and the e bikes were really easy to use, even though I'm not the sporty type! The tour guides were very helpful and showed us many of Prague's hidden secrets that you won't find it the tour books! I would definitely recommend the tour to anyone who wants to take sight seeing to the next level, ill be looking out for more e bike tours! Best part was the picnic in the park overlooking Prague :) Big thanks to our tour guides!!

A must in Prague. It was a well organised tour. A great way to get an overview of Prague. The bikes are comfortable and easy to ride and you can just cruise up the hills to see the beautiful views of the city. We had 2 tour guides for a small group. One at the front and one at the back to keep a good eye on everyone The tour guides were fun and knowledgeable. A treat was the little lunch box picnic and drink enjoyed at a high spot overlooking the city. We would certainly recommend this tour Kiwis

we loved it. A very nice way to see Prague by cycling around it. People at ebikeprague are very friendly and the routes they took us through open some excellent panoramic views. We had immense fun and heard some amazing stories! Highly recommended

This one's not to be missed in Prague.. Their glossy leaflet caught our eye. It read very well and we decided to give it a go. What a fantastic decision,infact the aforementioned brochure doesn't do it justice but how do you put it into words?How about Ebikes make you smile? That was certainly the case for everybody in our group. The guides karel and Bert pulled out all the stops to ensure we all had a most fun and memorable time. Safety was paramount and the bikes and trendy helmets pristine.Saul was welcoming and friendly too and definitely deserves a mention-we wish you the very best of luck with your new business,you've certainly got an amazing product and a professional yet down to earth approach. Dougie and Su, Halifax.

Great way how to get your bearings in Prague!. If you want to get your bearings quickly in Prague, join this tour. You will experience fantastic views (from Letna and Petrin hill), try something new and you will receive crash course in history and some good tips for the city. The three hour length was just enough and you will receive a little snack along the way. I drove an ebike for the first time in my life and I found it perfect for going around the city. Even though I have lived in Prague for most of my life I have discovered several things I didn’t know before. I would especially like to thank my tour guide Sage for a wonderful time.

Great way to get your bearings. I had never been on an ebike previously and have to say these are great. The tour takes in a number of hills and these were absolutely no effort. Our host was eager to please ensuring all were right with the bikes. Our tour guides were informative and very pleasant. They provided us with a few extra bits of information along the way rather than just the scripted blurb. Many of the site we stopped at we visited again in later days. If you have only a little time in Prague this is a good way to see a lot in a short time. If like us you have a few days you will surely discover what you want to come back to.

Perfect way to introduce you to Prague!. I have been living in Prague for a year now and am pretty familiar with the lay of the land. My friend invited me to go on the Ebike Prague tour with her. I thought it would be fun and decided to join. The tour route gives you a really great overview of the city. My personal advice is to do this tour as one of your first activities in Prague as you will see great views of the city and also go to the top highlights of the city including Prague castle. Our tour guides were extremely knowledgeable of the city including its architecture, culture, and history. The bike was a lot of fun too! I'm not sure why I haven't had an electric motor on my bike all this time... All in all, two thumbs way up! Enjoy your visit!

Awesome time on the Bikes with great Folks. My wife and I took an e-bike tour the later part of the week of August 4th. It was a fantastic tour of Prague and gave us a great overview of the layout of the city and its history. Having Linda and Brent as guides was wonderful given their in-depth knowledge and great personalities. It was a fun time and very informative. They also provided a nice lunch for our tour. It was the first time either of us were ever on an e-bike and I tell you it is the way to go. Don't know if I will ever take another bike tour without the electric part. Gave you that extra boost to get up hills and was easy to use. You still pedal your bike but not nearly as much or as hard. It is definitely easier for the older crowd (that's only what I heard, not telling where I fit in). Overall this was a wonderful tour and the owners and their staff were very welcoming hosts. This company and tour is another reason why we liked Prague so much.

superb ebike tour. An impressively run tour, excellent guiding and a very professional and friendly atmosphere. The group was small and added to the personal touch. We managed to cover a lot of ground, learnt about Prague, and the bike makes the hills and travel quite effortless. The snack was a charming added bonus. Well worth the time and the money. They have a great product. If not raining, not to be missed when in Prague.

Awesome experience! Do it.. Don't be out off by the price of this tour as it was well worth it. We covered lots of Prague that we didn't know existed. Chris our tour guide was excellent, he had fantastic local knowledge and was able to answer any question. Our group was small with only 4others which made it fun, personal and good for banter.We stopped off at a local beer garden, highly recommend this place, good beer and cider and nice on the wallet too!The Ebikes were really fun -couldn't have made it on the hills without it. They made it quite effortless and the leaflet is right-you really for break out a sweat!I recommend you do this at the beginning of your holiday so you can visit all the places you hear about on the tour after the tour. Do it.

Wowed by Ebikes in Prague.. This was one of the best tours I've done,such fun and with many stops covering all of the city.The bike was very easy to use and very helpful up the steep hills.The guides were patient and kind and I had a wonderful time. There was also a nice snack and water provided in the price.
Fun and informative. I found out about ebikes from a friend. Many different people on the tour and the tour guides were a lot of fun.

Splendid indeed.. Found ebikes on tripadvisor and the reviews convinced us to sign up.We could not have been happier with our choice,it was fantastic from start to finish.We joined two other couples on the tour and it made for a really romantic evening,especially at petrin hill,which definitely was the perfect spot for lovers.Highly recommended.

Had a total blast.. Did the love Prague ebike back in May (got soaked through as it pouredthe entire time) but couldn't fail to have fun-laughed out loud severaltimes, wondering what we were thinking doing this in such weather!Guidesreally great,must be even better in the sun!Thanks for a great time,willrecommend.

Most amazing bike tour ever!. This tour is a guaranteed good time to share with anyone really. There were many age groups in our tour and everyone was able to enjoy it, from a 16 year-old to a 65 year-old. This is possible because of how easy it is to learn how to control the ebike, and how well it propels you up the hills for truly amazing views. The guides are amazing and committed to helping you have a good time and learn what interests you. Since the groups are small and there are two guides, its really easy to get in-depth knowledge of the city and what else to do until the end of your stay. I really enjoyed the views, the explanations, and the fun time riding a different kind of bike up and down the hills of Prague!

Do it!. Oh, this tour was a lot of fun! The bikes are easy to drive–you simply pedal as usual, and the battery adds on its oomph. It is like moving yourself by willpower alone.The tour is a great one: just the right length–a good introduction to get you acquainted and curious about Prague, or a grand farewell–well-timed breaks and pauses for photo op's; the guides are knowledgeable, friendly, and multi-lingual; and it goes through the northwestern corner of the central city area, across the Vltava River and back.Good value and a satisfying snack/light meal is provided about halfway through the tour, with a killer view.

Outstanding time.. We signed up for the 3 hour ebike tour with Ian as our guide and really enjoyed ourselves. Like other reviewers,this was our first time on ebikes and we found them to be way better than expected,so easy to use and great fun.Booking was simple too,I think Mary replied to our mail within a minute which was impressive.We're all in our 20's but there was an older couple on the tour too,maybe in their 50's and they also loved it so it's good for old people too.

Awesome bikes, awesome guides!. Such a cool trip! There's no way we could have covered so much ground on foot, and the guides were great -- entertaining and they really know their stuff. Bring your sweetheart; the tour stops in a rose garden where tradition says you must stop and kiss to keep your love safe for another year. Safety first, folks ;-)

Great review of Czech history while jetting around to the best sites on Ebikes!. Skip the walk up the hills and take an ebike instead. You can peddle as much as you want but the assistance of the motor is great on those Prague hills. Ian was a great tour guide (sorry I forgot the name of the second guide). He is quite knowledgeable about the history of the Czech Republic and was able to answer all of my questions. We were able to see a number of sites in a short amount of time. Walking that route without a guide would have taken a whole day or more! The ride concludes with the opportunity to bomb down a huge hill. It was a great climax, they really should highlight that more in the advertisements. I highly recommend this tour!
Ebike very fun!!. I rode ebike today with friends, very fun. Great guide. Highly reccomended! We loved every minute of the the gorgeous sites and highly informative.

Shed loads of laughs,100% fun and the highlight of our trip so far.. We always sign up to do at least one outdoorsy tour on vacation but these ebikes entirely exceeded our expectations. As regular cyclists,we really weren't sure what to expect but both agree it'll be hard to 'go back'. The guides,Jenda and Sage were wonderful,very safety conscious and informative enough without cutting in to the whole ebike experience. How to describe the bikes? Well it's kinda like riding on the flat even uphill so its insanely easy but it's more than that,somehow they seem to make you smile,sounds weird I know. Just try one,you'll see what we mean.Thanks y'all for an awesome time.

Give it a go, nothing to lose by doing so....wonderful. I was in Prague recently and my partner was keen to do the tour, and admittedly I took a little to convince.In saying that and doing the tour, I thoroughly enjoyed it as well as my partner. The staff were terrific and supplied good information at the various stops along the way.I am 62 and had no problem with the bikes, which really required very little effort and were easy to operate.So anyone visiting Prague who may consider themselves a little on the old side, forget the age bit and do it.It was most refreshing and far better than being on a small bus with a group of people and getting on and off at various place.Water and snacks and a piece of fruit and chocolate were provided,the cost was 1000 CZK, and is not expensive and lasts 3 hours.Bob H Sydney and Cluj

The best way to see Prague!!!!!!!. My family really enjoyed our Ebike Prague Tour!!!! The absolute best way to see the city! We didn't want the tour to stop. My 14 year old daughter usually is not into sight-seeing, but really enjoyed this tour so much that she didn't want to stop sight-seeing & wanted to take the ebike back home with us! My 16 year-old son and his friend also both enjoyed the tour. Both tour guides were very knowledgeable and really friendly. Did a great job!! I would highly recommend this tour, and would do it again when I get the chance.

Awesome way to see the city!. We loved every minute of it! Our tour guide Jana was very accommodating, knowledgable and extremely friendly! She took us all around the city and stopped whenever we wanted to take a picture. I highly recommend this tour if you want great views of Prague and a fun filled day!

Highlight of our hols.. My wife fancied a Segway trip but,frankly,I wouldn't be seen dead on one. I'm sporty,she's not.Ebikes seemed like a happy compromise.We were both delighted,the 3 hour tour was great fun and made very light work of the steep hills in Prague.The tour itself takes you up and over the city,avoiding the bustling centre and is perfect for anybody (of any capability) wanting a good overview.The guides were professional and friendly, and provided many entertaining tidbits along the way.The whole tour,with its complimentary picnic and top notch equipment, far exceeded any expectation we had about ebikes.Thanks a zillion Jenda with a J,you were superb.

Great way to see the city!. My husband and I really enjoyed our E Bike tour. The guide was knowledgeable, safety was paramount; I felt we'll looked after. Picnic at a park on top of a hill overlooking city made me feel like a native. You can go places on a bike that you can't in a car and would probably not go by foot. Enjoyable activity with a bonus of a tour!

Loved every moment of peace with Ebike Prague tours.. This was a huge success for all of us(2adults,2adolescents,2 weeks into our euro trip and tensions rising).The main guide,Ian was fantastic,we could not believe he was Czech,his English was immaculate.Anyway,talk about entertaining two teens for three hours-they were in their element (as were we).The ebikes were great fun,so easy to ride and a perfect distraction for our kids who've clearly had enough of being dragged along with us' uncool parents', on one sightseeing tour after the other.They tell us ebikes are in Barcelona too,it'll be our penultimate stop and we'll definitely be signing up.Naturally,we love our kids but many thanks for three blissful hours of respite!
we love ebikeprague!. wundervolle guides - tolle ebikes - sympathisch - tolle Prag einblicke & ausblicke - super freundlich - we love!

Great way to see the city-riding is a breeze. Count us as converts to electric bikes! We'd never ridden them before and although I'm a regular bike rider, my husband is not, and we knew the hills around Prague would be a challenge on normal bikes. These ebikes make it possible to zoom up hills that would have ordinarily killed us!Our guides Linda and Brent were very informative, full of interesting tidbits about Prague. We appreciated the added safety of a guide at the rear of the pack. They provide a snack which was a nice diversion as we stopped in a park and sat on the ground to eat like we saw so many locals do. Our group had 8 people, all from the US, but from many different places. So it was nice to meet and chat with others. All in all, a great experience. So much so that we came later in our stay and did the whole thing over by ourselves. Thinking about buying one of these for myself--much easier to explore the hills of Tennessee!

Fantastic day out!. I would definitely recommend this tour early on in your stay! We did the 3 hour tour (you are not biking all this time and when you are the E bikes make light work of the journey!). This was just the right amount of time to see some key Prague sights and stop for lunch (provided as part of the tour). You also get to see some areas of Prague that might take you a while to get to otherwise!The owner and guides were so helpful and clearly passionate about the subject matter.For two people who commute to work on road bikes - it just isn't the same now we're home!!!

Ebike is a must do in Prague. Absolutely fantastic, we thoroughly enjoyed every moment of the tour. The bikes are very comfortable and make going up inclines very easy thus we were able to see a lot of Prague's beautiful sights and spectacular views. Tour also included a snack box with food and water which we enjoyed in a park overlooking Prague. All the staff were extremely friendly, welcoming and informative. A truly brilliant and fun 3 hour tour of Prague that we would highly recommend. Thanks especially to our tour guide Linda and also Mark for giving us a wonderful memory of our time in Prague. JRJ South Australia

Great, laid-back experience. Our tour guides Jenda and Mark made this a very fun and informative experience. They knew the city and culture and enjoyed sharing it with us. Best of all they were just cool guys to spend a morning with.The start of the tour was easy to find, the bikes were great, and a small lunch was provided.Overall a great experience.

All the E's make for an excellent ebike experience!. It was a toss up for us between Segway and ebike and in the end we opted for the bikes,not least because they were on our doorstep (cheaper and faster too).We were over the moon with our choice,the bikes are quite amazing,so easy to use and great fun. We're not sure we could ever go back to a classic bike having breezed up those hills!The guides were a lot of fun and ultra safety conscious which was nice.They even provided nutcase helmets which impressed us so much,we've since ordered them for our kids.If you're looking for a fab 3 hours in Prague then you can't go wrong with this fun and professional company.

Brilliant.... Absolutely highly recommended. Great way to see the city. Our guide Linda and Bert was superb. They wee extremely friendly and knowledgeable of the city. The ebikes worked well and is a pleasure to ride. A novel way of seeing the sights of prague.

See the coolest spots in Prague without breaking a sweat!. The company's HQ is dead in the centre of town and is therefore super easy to find. The staff are extremely welcoming and helpful. It couldn't have been easier, helmets are provided as well as a quick briefing about the e-bikes (extremely easy to get to grips with), and a little snack for the road. Our tour guide Jenda was the coolest, funniest, knowledgable and most suave tour guide I've ever come across. He was also extremely motivational when we thought we couldn't make it any further in the extreme heat. The e-bikes make cycling a breeze and therefore the long distances covered seem like nothing, meaning you can cover all the coolest spots in Prague without breaking a sweat. I highly recommend this tour, I guarantee you won't be disappointed.

Getting to know Prague on ebike.. With just one night in Prague,this was the best choice for me. We covered so much more than we would've walking and the views were spectacular. We climbed some hills but the ebikes made really light work of them.Hank and Ally were great fun and gave lots of info without waffling on.Ideal if you've limited time in Prague,I really felt as if I'd got to know the place.

A fantastic Bike tour. A very well-structured, entertaining, and informative tour of Prague. The guide (a knowledgeable young Czech, with a perfect english accent) was well-informed about the history and culture of the city, and was amenable to unscheduled stops and explanations + extra local detail. The bikes are fantastic; even an unfit person would be able to cope with Prague's hills with the extra oomph the motors give you. Central hire location in the city is BEAUTIFUL, in a picturesque courtyard. At the end, the guide took us for a beer in a beer garden overlooking the city. Incredible. AND they provided bottled water and twix bars. Perfect.

Excellent ebike tour. I highly recommend the Ebike Prague Tours. The owners were very helpful and went out of their way to answer all of our question prior to the excursion. It was a great way to see the city and our guides were friendly and knowledgeable.

A perfectly wonderful evening.. My wife and I joined this tour by chance having seen an earlier group out and about at the castle.Having had a brief try we signed up for the evening tour.We were so lucky as there were only four of us on the ride and we really hit it off with the other couple.The guides, Ted and Bert were so friendly and adapted the tour to us,allowing more time for me to take my many different camera shots-Prague is a photographers paradise.It was cold when we visited and you sure feel it on these amazing bikes which really do 'do the work for you' so an extra layer would be recommended during colder months.All in all,a very memorable time had by all. Thanks guys and sorry it's taken me so long to post.

Brilliant time in Prague.. My brother and I joined some fellow travellers on the evening tour and we all had a blast. The group was really mixed but we all got on well,especially at the little picnic stop as you've chance to get chatting. Thanks everybody for a great time.

Supercalifragilisticexpialidocious!. My title says it all! From the splendid helmets to the briefing (no training required),the zest and zeal of fantastic guides to each turn of the ebike wheel,this tour was amazing. Professional,cool,sophisticated, relaxed, I cannot say enough good things about this company. If you're looking for some serious fun in Prague,choose one of their tours,thanks Jenda & Sage-you rock,Mazza&Gus,Oz.

Electric Bike Tour of Prague - evening ride. We had the most fun and enjoyed every part of our Evening E-bike Tour of Prague. Can not recommend this tour more highly. It was our first time on electric bikes (we are bike riders) and found them to be so much fun! Initially a little startling - as you peddle they accelerate - it did not take very much time at all to get used to the E-bikes and to really enjoy effortlessly climbing hills and enjoying the scenery. This tour takes care of everything - safety, food, water, location, views and historical background. There is a toilet stop along the way near the Queen's Summer Palace - just remember to take some Czech coins to pay the attendant.Absolutely brilliant!!

Fabulous!!!. This bike adventure is fabulous, one of our favorite excursions in Europe! Ian and Sage (our guides) were wonderful - their combined knowledge in history and facts were an awesome addition to the trip. All staff members were helpful and provided advice and suggestions for the duration of our stay. Beautiful sites, great people and a very pleasant ride :) We will always remember your tour, thanks for everything!!!

E is for Enjoyable Evening. Our ebike tour of Prague was a wonderful experience. It was a great way to see the highlights of such a beautiful city. Our guide was full of information, and the bikes themselves were so much fun to ride! We were visiting in July so the 6-9pm tour was the perfect time of day. This was a great way to get oriented around the city so I would suggest taking it at the beginning of your stay in Prague.

Simply Wonderful.. My girlfriend and I took the love Prague ebike tour yesterday with Ian as the guide. We're staying round the corner and were recommended it by a fellow guest. We had the most wonderful time,the ebikes are so easy to use and really make you smile. No effort involved,even on those hills so we finished feeling totally fit and ready for our busy party evening ahead. Highly recommended to everyone visiting Prague especially if you're not a fan of stuffy tour buses.

Ticked all the boxes.. I really enjoyed this tour,actually a lot more than I thought I would.It was extremely hot and I was wondering whether or not to go ahead, afterall 3 hours on a bike in intense heat is not really my idea of fun.Anyway,I could not have been more wrong, ebikes (as I discovered) aren't bikes at all,I mean they look like bikes and you still pedal but its so ridiculously easy that they probably deserve recognition in their own right).There were 2 excellent guides-Linda and Bert-snacks and extra water (provided free of charge) and the magnificence of a most beautiful city making this an experience I'll certainly remember.Like other reviewers,I so WANT an ebike,they're the biz.

Wow, thanks sooo much!. Chose this after reading reviews, and on the first day so we could then plan out the next two days. It was so much fun and the best way to see Prague. The bikes were great, safe and effortless....I want one! The communication from home was great from Mary and she knew it was our 20th anniversary and gave us a bottle of fizz at the end - so nice..I'm so glad we did this and chose ebikes and the guides were brilliant, and helped you in anyway about the history, where to go to see a "different" prague away from the crowds and also gave advice on places to eat etc... Nice idea to stop for a picnic which was provided.Will be recommending to all my friends. Thanks soooo much for helping make our day so special.

Best fun getting oriented in Prague. If you have ever ridden a bike you will love this tour. The electric boost is a little disconcerting at first but quickly becomes brilliant fun heading up to the castle and beyond. Lovely guide -(with great voice projection!) had us all safely through the few trafficked roads and around to some lovely vantage points overlooking Prague. Lots of fascinating stories shared on a 3 hour tour with picnic included. Serendipitously the best walking tour guide in Prague (Marcus of "The Naked Tour Guide") just happened to be coming along on our ride, and so we topped off our visit with some lovely garrulous rambles on foot! Combine E Bikes with The Naked Tour Guide for some Prague loveliness you definitely wont regret.

Ebike Prague tour- great value!. myself and a friend were in Prague for 3 nights and wondering the best way to see all the sights and also learn the history behind it, so our hostel had an ebike brochure which sounded like a great idea to us. our guides were Allie and Hank and they were really great, full of information and very personable. enjoyable to be around. I would highly recommend this tour to anyone in Prague. the bikes were great to.Amy and Mieka- Australia

Wow,wow and wow!!!. I want an ebike,they really are the only way to ride. Supreme Ebikes (sparkly and clean), excellent guides(Mark and Linda) and top service from the owners (Mary and Saul). A real must do in Prague, especially in the hot sun.

Way to go.. I'll start by saying I'd give these guys ten stars if I could,what a very professional yet relaxed set-up. We were delighted with our choice of evening tour,it was the way to go at this time of year (not so busy and less hot).The ebikes were great fun and insanely easy to ride.There were two guides and a limit on riders which was nice.Water and snacks were also provided FOC. Sol (the friendly owner) was really welcoming too and kitted us out with super cool nutcase(?) helmets before adjusting our seats perfectly (sorry, I think I went up and down at least twice, you were very patient with me)!We'll look for ebikes again,what a top experience and waaaaay cooler than Segway :-)

Best way to see Prague!!. This bike tour was awesome, no boring history spiels, only interesting and funny (and informative) stories. The bikes are so easy to ride and the route makes sure you get the best views of the beautiful city. The guides are also amazing, funny, knowledgeable and always ready to give excellent recommendations for food, going out, anything really. If you're going to do anything in Prage make sure it's this tour!!

Highly recommended!. Myself and my sisters decided to do the ebike tour on our 3rd day in Prague, though we met some who were already on the tour after stepping off from the plane!! I would highly recommend it, the owners were really friendly and we got to see amazing views of Prague and stop off at good locations. The two tour guides, Hank and Ally were really friendly and knowledgeable also, which kept the tour interesting from start to finish! The bikes themselves were extremely easy to ride with a lot of ease and lots of fun! Definitely an experience if you have never ridden an ebike before! No calories burnt whatsoever, even up those Prague hills. Overall, highly recommended!!

Excellent way to view Prague. We chose the love Prague morning tour and were delighted with our choice. Mary was fantastic at communicating,explaining directions so clearly.Our group of eight all got on well and we had two guides with us the whole time-Ally and Hank(both lovely). The ebikes themselves are knockout and glide up those hills with total ease,they looked brand new to me. It was so hot yesterday but you do get a nice breeze as the bike takes you along. A top experience which I'd definitely recommend.

Excellent easy visit to Prague. We enjoyed very much a city visit despite the rain. The guide was extremely nice, the bikes brand new and the visit very interesting. We would recomend it to everybody.

Fun, friendly, relaxed but so very professional. My daughter and I chose the evening tour as we thought the summer heat would be easier to contend with. It was, and the other big bonus was the smaller crowds around the attractions we visited. Our two guides (Jenda & Sage) looked after us extremely well, and were particularly kind in getting my daughter used to these weird but wonderful bikes. They took us on a well planned tour with interesting information; it was great to get out of the old town (which is easy to see on foot) and see more of this beautiful city from some amazing viewpoints. Ebikes beat Segways any day of the week, you travel further, quicker, in comfort...and you don't look like a berk! We were out for three hours plus (Jenda & Sage are not clock watchers) and we went at our own pace. The bikes were surprisingly comfortable and easy to handle, 90% of the ride is on dedicated cycle paths (not cobbles) which really helps.Ebikes are a completely professional outfit, everything was first class from the safety instruction and helmet fitting before we went out (all completed in their time and before your 3 hour trip starts), to the picnic snacks provided, their brand new equipment, the speedy email responses prior to our trip...and their guides are amongst the best I have come across in any city.We were on a tight budget and this trip did account for a chunk of our holiday spends but after we completed the tour we both felt it was great value for money and the highlight of our 4 day stay.

The best (e)bike tour we've ever done.. Beyond doubt,this is the best guided tour we've done so far and this company deserves a mention. They offer a friendly yet professional service with a fundamental concern for the safety and welfare of the customer. Ian and the other guide (2guides to each small group) were both really friendly and gave us a lot of laughs both on and off the bike. We saw all of Prague in one evening,more than we'd covered on foot the previous day-thanks ebike Prague and good luck for a prosperous season. Connor and Lynne,Belfast.

Great bikes, lovely staff.. Have been to the tour with friends visiting Prague and been really impressed. Solid and safe bikes, friendly and educated guides (Burt and Jenda thnks guys!!!), lovely weather and stunning views. The best experience on my way across europe.

The best way to see Prague (and top fun too).. Our concierge recommended this company,we're staying just around the corner so it was convenient and easy to get to. It was the best thing we could've done for our first afternoon here,we feel like we've gotten a real good sense of our bearings.The cost per person was €40 which we felt was good value as the group size is capped at 10 and there are two guides. It took 3 hours and included snacks and water. The Ebikes were great fun especially uphill and the guides told us heaps of interesting stuff. We'll look out for Ebikes again-not sure we could ever go back to regular bikes now! A definite must do in Prague.

Fun way to see the great attractions of prague. The Ebikes were very easy to use, all you have to contend with is the cobble stones. One of the highlights i found was that they provide you lunch and they take plenty of photo's throughout the day, So a camera is not necesarily needed. The tour guides are fantastic and great to get along with, full of knowledge. I would defnately do it again.

Great Way To Tour Prague. Ebikes are as easy as riding a regular bike and absolutely necessary if you plan to venture up the hills of Prague on a bike tour. The bikes take a couple of minutes to get used to...when the battery assist kicks in it catched you by surprise the first couple of times, but everyone in our group adapted in minutes.The tour itself was primarily around the perimeter of the city...not through the Old City. Theis was great for us since we did a walking tour of the Old City. The guide was good. Shared some interesting facts about the city and its history. Could have been a bit more torough in his explanations and depth compared to other similar tours.The tour isnt cheap...about $50US, but I felt that it was worth it, particularly given the topography of Prague.

Great way to see the city. We signed up for the tour after seeing the wonderful reviews on TripAdvisor, and we are very glad we did. We took the evening tour of the city, and it was absolutely beautiful. Our guides, Mark and Burt, were a lot of fun and pointed out many interesting facts about the city. The bikes were easy to ride, and the owner, Mary, responded to all my email questions very quickly. Overall, we were very impressed with the company, and we would definitely recommend them!

The best tour by far with ebike Prague tours. We took this tour with Ian as our guide and were both really happy with it. My other half's a keen cyclist but not I so this was the perfect compromise for us. Ian was really nice and most informative balancing the guiding well,between historical fact and folklore. The bikes are ridiculously easy to use so there's no calories dropping here but what the heck,we're on our hols! Great fun and one for all ages.

Such a cool idea.. Did this with my family in the afternoon and we all agree that it's the most fun we've ever had on a tour. The Ebikes were so much fun and made inclines feel flat. It lasted 3 hours which felt just about right,we saw much more than we would've on foot and the guides told some amusing and interesting facts along the way.

Best way to see the city!. My friend and I were travelling round Europe and we came across ebike prague tours, the tour was excellent and the bikes were really good, who knew going up a hill could be so easy! Our tour guide was super friendly and knew a lot about the city, it was very informative and lots of fun! They even provided a nice packed lunch which you can enjoy whilst admiring the view of Prague. Out of the 11 cities we visited whilst travelling this was by far the best tour we had, would strongly recommend it and definitely beats a walking tour, try it out!

Awesome ebikes. Took a 3 hour tour with ebikes this morning and were very happy with our choice. The ebikes offered some welcome respite from the intense heat as you cruise along without actually doing much at all. The 2 guides were pleasant and informative and we got to see all of Prague in just a few hours.

Great way to get a feel for Prague. Our ebike tour was one of the highlights of our Prague weekend. We got a great sense of the city and covered far more ground than we would have by walking everywhere. Visiting the places we saw from the high points on the bike tour made everything come together. Allie and Bert were warm and informative and it was interesting to hear their American perspectives on Prague and Czechs. The little picnic was a delightful touch and a good time was had by all. Our only criticism is that the guiding was 'lite' and without much depth, especially in comparison to other organized tours we did in Prague. It still gets two thumbs up!

A great way to see Prague!. This tour was an amazing experience and my favorite part of our trip to Prague! The tour guides were very knowledgeable and taught us a lot about Prague and its history. We stopped at a bunch of interesting places including a stop for lunch on a hill with great views of the whole city. I don't think any trip to Prague would be complete without this EBike tour!

Excellent and fun way to visit Prague!. Great way to see Prague and learn some interesting facts. Very nice and competent guide, great bikes and nice tour. A fun 3 hours! Great with teenagers!Small group which was good.

Wow and wow again. I finished this tour with a sore jaw having smiled so much,it was way better than I'd expected,the bikes are in top condition and require zero effort to operate.There were two guides-jenda (sp?) and bert who were both super fun and truly informative. I'll be back to visit ebike Prague when I return in September,highly recommended to those of all ages.

Ebikes,the future way to tour?. Did this today and were blown away,our concierge recommended the evening tour on account of how quiet Prague would be and we weren't disappointed,it was great fun and the guides were brilliant. It took 3 hours but the time flew by and we would've happily ridden longer. Whether you go by ebike or walk,visit Prague castle at night,so amazing.Thanks everybody,especially the guides,we loved listening to all your anecdotes,sorry we left the picnic,it looked tasty but our table was booked. Looking forward to further exploring everywhere again tomorrow.

Exceeded our expectations by far.. The guys at ebike have got it down,they're simply fantastic and we all want one. They were much better than we thought they'd be as the bikes really take no effort at all. The top highlight of our Czech trip thus far.

E bike tours are awesome!!. We just completed the Prague e bike tour today. Saul, Ian and Bert were fantastic and very helpful. The e bikes are a great way to see the contra and our guide, Ian and Bert were very knowledgeable. We would highly recommend the tour to anyone wanting a fun way to learn about Prague!

Ebike,the new Segway?. Personally I'm a big Segway fan but,travelling with my wife, I didn't get my way in Prague-having tried it in Vienna (and not enjoyed it)my wife wasn't confident enough.Anyway,dare to say, I'm a convert-the ebikes were really superior,much easier and faster too.There were two guides, Linda and Helena who were both amazing at reassuring my wife. The tour was well organised and great fun,a definite must do.

A different way to see Prague. This tour was the first thing I did in Prague and it gave me a brief introduction to the main sites and a good knowledge of the city's history. The tour lasted three hours which was the right amount of time and the bikes were new and of excellent quality. They were such fun and you could alter the power if you wanted to have more exercise. The tour guide was very friendly and professional and the small group sizes meant you could ask lots of questions. I would recommend this tour to anyone!

Excellent people and great way to see the city. This tour was absolutely great! The tour guides were very knowledgeable and personable. The owners were also a pleasure to work with and very flexible. The weather wasn't ideal the morning of our tour and they offered to let us change the time or cancel but we decided to do it anyways. Even though there was only 2 of us, they still did the tour for us. The bikes were very easy to ride and a lot of fun! It was a great way to see the city. The picnic food was very good and the spot to eat had a great view of the city. I would recommend this tour to anyone!

Ebike tour Prague. Booked the tour to see Prague, as hate bus tours and in fact they are particularly old and uncomfortable in Prague.Karol our guide showed us all we needed to see and Sol and Mary ( the friendly owners) met us with a great picnic half way around .The E bikes turned out to be great as we made our way up the hills to the castle and over the cobble streets with great ease.Thoroughly recommend using E Bikes with this company as a great way to see and learn about.Prague on a 3 hour tour.Colin and Bernadette UK

A Fabulous Way to see Prague. This was a lot of fun and a great way to see the sights of Prague. The bikes were easy to ride, our guides were very knowledgeable and everyone at Ebike Tours were helpful and friendly. 
This was a great experience and I would highly recommend it.

Greatest way to see Prague.. This was by far one of the best parts of my most recent trip to Europe. Our guides (Karel, Ally and Laura) were great, the route was great, the views were great. All in all it was a fantastic experience. We were able to find many areas that we wanted to further explore while in Prague. The tour cost 1000 crowns (but we had a 20% off coupon from our hostel). That included a 3 hour tour and picnic lunch. The bikes were very easy to operate and lots of fun. The guides gave us a lot of good recommendations and answered all of our questions. HIGHLY RECOMMEND!!!!

Would never believe it could be that much fun!. Just returned from the tour and I must say, I was blown away. You can cover so much ground on these bicycles without even breaking a sweat, and you really feel like you have seen Prague. Highly recommend it!

Wow, MUCH better than expected!. Didn't realize these bikes would be so much fun.Super fun and easy to use.A friend recommend this and I'm glad they did.We effortlessly zipped up and down the hills and it proved to be a great way to see the city.A lot of territory is covered and the sights are truly stunning.Guides are very pro and really watched after our safety.Highly recommended.Thanks eBike team!

E-Bike tour in Prague. This is just the most marvellous way to do Prague. A guided tour with enthousiastic people allowing you to see all of Pragues highlights by E-Bike. Don't care about the hills in the city, or even Pertin's hill top; this bike will get you there, don't underestimate the power of these E-Bikes. Good material, good tour guides and you are out in the air and see what you want to see. No way to compare this to any other way of doing a tour, this is the best, as you will get to places the cars and busses can't get to and which are too far for walking. Will surely do it again when returning to Prague.

First time on a eBike tour and loved it. We only had 3 days in Prague, so we decided to do this tour on day 1 and it was the best choice. We got a good overview of the whole city and its history and got to see some very good scenic views. The guides, Linda and Burt were awesome. They were very knowledgeable and entertaining. The whole experience was great and it was also very easy on the legs.... having just completed an Ironman race 2 days earlier, it was nice not to have to work hard to get the bike up the hills in Prague. Highly recommend it.

Prague by Ebike. Brilliant. Bikes powerful enough to deal effortlessly with the relatively steep hill to the castle, yet easy to control. Well organised, (snack lunch provided) with two witty, knowledgeable guides (Jan and Bert) providing both informative commentary as well as advice on how to obtain the best performance from the bike.

The best way to see Prague. My friend and I did an ebike blue route tour with Jan as our guide and it was loads of fun. Its probably the best orientation to Prague you can get. Our guide, Jan, was not only a friendly fun chap but was extremely knowledgeable about all aspects of the journey and the sites. A must do in Prague.

REAL PRAGUE TOUR. Excellent bike tour of Prague with some great historical information with modern twist! Prague Tours was professional, fun! Nothing short of great day in the city Don't worry about a snack to take with you all provided with the water with no additional cost !! See the city from different prospective!

Cruise in Style. This was fun and easy, and the guides were very knowledgeable. We would not have found a lot of these unique sites on our own. It was very time effective and a great way to get an overview of the city. The evening ride is most pleasant for avoiding the crowds. Loved it!
The beautiful sights of Prague via green parks. Excellent cycle tour - friendly owners and great guides that take you off the beaten track. Highlight of my trip to Prague.

Fun exploratory bike tour. We did this tour as it met all of our requirements. It covered some key points of interest that Prague has to offer. It'd let us cover a lot of area in a short amount of time. Biking is always fun and e-bikes addressed the knee problems that one of us had in that biking was effortless. As an added benefit, we met Ian and Allie, our two guides on this tour, who were just absolutely wonderful. They were fun, friendly, very accommodating of our slowish pace and most importantly, very knowledgeable about the places we visited, the history, the architecture, etc. We learnt a great deal during this tour and are very glad we did this. We highly recommend this tour.

Amazing way to experience an amazing city. This was the most fun we had in Prague. Mary and the gang were all friendly, helpful and knew lots of interesting stuff about Prague with some great historical anecdotes. The bikes were awesome, don't know how we will ever go back to riding a basic bike now! The best way to experience such a beautiful city with lots of great stops, great views and great company! We wish there we e bikes in every city in Europe!

Spoiled by Ebike. Five of us girls spent a few days in Prague to celebrate our 30th birthdays, and I must stay, this was truly the highlight! Ebike Prague Tours was professional, organized, clear, and most importantly, fun! Our experience was nothing short of great. Instructions just to get to the location was detailed, clear, and concise. The tour guides were knowledgeable, informative, and flexible (not to mention, great photographers!). We got to see and learn so much about the city in just a few hours. And the ebikes... maximum distance with least amount of exertion. Need I say more?!Once you go Ebike, how can you possibly go back to anything but?!

EBike is the way to go! A MUST DO IN PRAGUE. Being a solo traveller it’s great to do a tour. Ebikes Prague provided the perfect one, despite me being the only person that day - I had two tour guides Ian (the Czech) and Bert (the Yank). Both were incredibly passionate about their city and it felt like I was travelling with friends rather than guides! The day was bordering on rain so I was provided with a poncho which fortunately I didn't have to use. The bikes were so easy to use, pedal away and off goes the engine, it just zipped up those hills with complete ease and no stress on the legs. I had previously done the 6 hour walking tour the day prior and this gave me another perspective with extra and different information. The PERFECT MUST DO in Prague. It was one of the best things I did on my trip. I would highly recommend it!!!!! Susi, Perth, Australia.

Couldn't go wrong even in -10C weather with Ebike Tours!!. This tour was awesome. I just showed up and to my surprise it was the first day of operation for the season and one of the coldest days of the year. So I opened the season as I was the only crazy tourist brave enough to go on the tour. I had a great time and the tour guides were awesome!!! They pointed out some great local spots during the tour that I would have never known of. I highly suggest this tour for everyone. Seeing the city from a bike ride is a neat experience. Ebike you rock!!!! I will see you again in September!!!

Soaked But Worth It. Did Ebikes as part of a pre-booked hen weekend.Despite non stop rain we went ahead,got soaked but had a scream!The bikes were fantastic but what made it so special were the guides who,with their endless enthusiasm, managed to keep us entertained and buoyant throughout.Sol and Mary welcomed us back with waiting bubbly,what a most welcome and unexpected surprise. An excellent experience,would highly recommend.

Trip Highlight. A group of ten of us signed up for the E-bike tour of Prague last September. We had a perfect day, sunny and not too warm. We had two guides, one of which was Bert. I was the slowest person on the entire ride and Bert was very patient and extremely helpful, especially when we had hills and valleys. Another person in our group joined us about halfway through and she was just as impressed as I was. Taking the e-bike tour, we saw sights that few others got to see. The bikes were in excellent repair and the lunch break was delightful. All in all, this was one great highlight of my trip. Barb Collins

Great time had by all. Did the evening tour with Ebike and had a great time,the people were extremely friendly and Mary is the best communicator we came across in Prague.The bikes do the work for you so no calories dropping off on this tour,lol and with the beer place over the road we enjoyed the perfect end to our trip.

Well worth it with ebike Prague.. Ebikes were fantastic,perfect for our short stay in Prague.All the staff were really friendly and the presence of the second guide was really nice as one member of our group was really nervous to start with but the guide really helped put her at ease. Fun and easy to use,you cannot help but enjoy yourself.

Baby friendly E-bikes. We enjoyed the private tour with our baby son Tobi, he is only 6 months old. E-bike owners were really helpful and arranged baby seat and helmet for him. They organised a special "baby friendly" tour. Despite the weather the tour was absolutely breathtaking and we enjoyed very much! Must do for everyone, even with babies! Becasue babies rock´n´roll! :o)) Once again big thanks to Mary and Sole!

Loved Ebikes. We opted for the evening tour and it was amazing from start to finish.We've visited Prague before and couldn't believe all we'd previously missed.The castle was serene,so peaceful (until we all started yodelling at that weird acoustic circle).Fantastic bikes,great guides,nice snack and top weather.

11 Out of 10 for ebikes. Decided to book this tour having read some of the raving reviews on tripadvisor. We weren't disappointed,I hadn't been on a bike for years but felt at ease as soon as I entered the shop,these guys are totally professional yet friendly, ultra safety concious yet suitably relaxed.It was busy the morning we went and very hot,we were well organised by the guides who kitted us out with fab helmets and briefly explained the bikes before setting off dot on time.They even provided extra water and SPF at no extra charge, a very nice touch indeed (I can't say we encountered such high standards of customer care anywhere else in Prague).The ebikes were great fun and so easy to use,infact because the bike does the work for you,it was the perfect way to tour in the heat.There was a small but tasty picnic provided,enjoyed all the more as the spot is hand picked and we got to see so much more than we'd ever have seen on foot.All in all,a fantastic and fun way to tour this charming city,especially in intense heat.Great guides,fun and informative and the perfect get-to-know option for your first day in Prague.A++++++

Awesome way to see Prague!. We only had two days in a prague and really weren't sure what to do and e so we thought we'd give this a go as it had great reviews. So glad we did! This was the best thing we could have done. The ebikes were so much fun to ride, they are effortless and even the most unfit person could easily manage a tour on one. The tour guides were excellent very knowledgable and friendly. The owner of the ebike place was also such a cool guy and super friendly. Got lunch provided, it wasn't a huge amount but enough to keep us going so have something to eat before you go if you tend to get hungry quickly. It was a great way to see lots of Prague's history and included good explanations for us. Well worth the money and would definitely recommend this tour. If you have a few days in Prague, do this early on as it will assist you in figuring out what things you want to spend more time at etc.

Spectacular experience best choice for sightseeing. We did this today and it was the best experience. The bikes are very easy to ride they almost move by themselves. The bikes were extremely comfortable and the 2 guides we had were extremely knowledgeable about the history of the city, its buildings, castles and bridges. Linda and Brett our guides spoke perfect english and we very imformative about life in Prague. The owners were very accommodating in every way. It was a great day in Prague and we would encourage everyone to do this rather than sit on a tour bus...
Great tour. Great way to see Prague. We really enjoyed it and so did our two-year old from his seat. The electric bikes are great fun, like riding downhill all the time. Very friendly staf.

Mobile air-con in a very hot Prague. By far,this is the best tour my partner and i have ever joined,communication was really thorough upon booking,the staff were totally friendly yet professional,Saul even provided sunscreen for us,who knew prague was this hot? The bikes are fantastic and definitely the way to tour through heat. We had two guides which was excellent as one girl in the group was nervous to start with but the second guide looked after her really well.Highly recommended,we will tell everybody about you at home.

Outstanding ebikes. We did this last night on our first evening-wow.I always 'use' trip advisor but this is my first review,I felt compelled as the guides were well informed,caring and kept us nicely entertained at the many stops. Like other reviewers I didn't want the tour to end :-).It was so hot but you feel cooler with the breeze from the moving bike which really are effortless,something I wasn't totally convinced of before joining.There was a picnic provided which was nice but more so the water was plentiful with no extra charge,quite something.This is the best and easiest way to tour and we'll look out for ebikes again,especially in such heat.Absolute must,thank you to Mary,her husband and wonderful team.

E bikes prague with toddlers. This was the most fun amazing tour, the kids loved every minute (1 1/2 and 3 1/2 year olds) my son made a point to tell me that "this is sooooo much fun mum!" The guides were brilliant as well as the owners, we got to visit most of Prague and because we were alone the guides really tailored it to our needs, stopping at a park along the way. The picnic included was very thoughtful and yummy for all. The e bikes are really state of the art and easy to handle, riding was a breeze, even uphill. They do all the work for you! Would recommend this tour to anyone and loved it sooo much I asked for brochures for my hotel!

The best choice sightseeing experience. I was in Prague only for 1 day and I had to choose how to see Prague as much as possible and also with fun. I decided to try EBIKE tour and did not regret about this. It was exciting: super-friendly staff and guides, great views during the trip, ability to get photos after the journey, electric bikes. So, I would to thank you for this fantastic experience and greetings from Moscow!

Fantastic insight into a beautiful city. We had a fantastic time on the tour. We were also the only two on our tour, I assume the rain had something to do with it, but the weather on the day was absolutely perfect. I have to say, it's a strange and funny feeling on these bike as it literally rides for you, which is awesome as you can cover more distance in less time. We saw some beautiful sights of Prague and the wealth of knowledge our tour guides Ian and bert had was fantastic!! They were laid back enough that we felt at ease but professional enough to know we were getting an A grade service. I recommend you do this on one of the first couple of days you are there as it gives you a great overview of the whole city.. The two owners of the business were so lovely and easy to chat to, which was a nice change from what we had encounters on our first night in Prague.. All in all a fantastic tour which I highly recommend!!

Perfection in prague. This was a perfect and fun way to see all the sights of this enchanting city. I was a little nervous at first as had not ridden a bike in years ! Soon felt at ease with the expert eye of Ted and Bert watching over us. By the end of the tour I did not want to get off. An excellent way to see the sights without breaking a sweat. Highly recommended for all ages. A great three hours spent.

Absolute BEST Tour in Prague. First off, I would give this tour and this company ten stars if I could. They were absolutely brilliant to work with and made our time in Prague that much more amazing. The owner was easy to work with and communicated very thoroughly via email regarding location, what to bring, and what to expect. When we arrived, we found out we were getting a private tour that day (guess the rain scared everyone else off…better for us!). Our tour guides were literally some of the friendliest people we have ever met. They knew all sorts of interesting history about the city and chose very cool and fascinating places to stop and visit. They even packed us a little snacky lunch to enjoy while overlooking a perfect view of the city. We had two tour guides so one could lead and one could hang in the back to ensure everyone remained safe. A lady getting out of her car almost opened her door into me while we were going by, but the rear guide saw it coming and his warning shouts prevented an accident. The bikes themselves are ridiculous amounts of cool. They have a motor that senses your pedal motions and pretty much does all the work for you. It takes a second to get used to and can feel like the bike is running away from you at first, but it is very easy to adjust to and then you feel like superman going up those hills and not exerting an ounce of effort. Riding them over cobblestones is quite the bootie-massaging experience. All in all, I would highly recommend these guys. We began our time in Prague with them and their expertise allowed us to tailor the rest of our trip to further exploring the things we were most interested in. Everyone we met while working with Ebike was so nice and genuine and we left feeling like we had made four new friends. We even bumped into the owners while walking around Prague the next day and they were still just as nice! These guys are legit and I would absolutely recommend this tour as a must do to anyone and everyone visiting Prague.

service could not be better. My husband and I were the only two on our tour but as promised we had front and rear guides. Both guides could not have been more pleasant and helpful. They knew we had visited Prague before so sought out the less well known attractions and hidden gems of Prague.
