Michal is a knowledgeable and entertaining guide and provided new insights into Prague. Don't miss this great way to see Prague - you will have a blast!

Do it.. This was an amazing adventure with one of the best tour guides I have ever experienced (Michal). He was well knowledgable, extremely personable, and answered all questions with his extensive mastery of the city's architecture and all around history. It was a pleasure taking this three hour tour to see all the beautiful sites as well as some amazing vantage points around Prague. 10/10, would recommend.

Perfect introduction to Prague!. This 3 hour electric bike tour is a very scenic ride along all the nicest spots of Prague and is the perfect way to start your Prague citytrip! We often stopped at certain points to get some background information by our very friendly and informative guide Mikhal, who led us during the whole tour and he also assisted us in taking pictures.The electric bikes were top quality and made it a breeze to discover the city, they were like mopeds. The bikes required almost no physical exercice to get going and they can reach quite some speed on straight lanes, I was impressed! It was really cool cruising with these bikes, they seemed a much nicer transportation than the abundance of Segways you see around Prague.I'd definitely recommend this trip to anyone as a to-do in Prague as a first activity, we regret waiting until our second day, as it's a great way to get started on discovering this charming city.

All the fun, Less of the Effort!. We had a great time trying e-bikes for the first time with Mikhail. The ride is sooo easy, you needn't be concerned with becoming a sweaty mess or being unable to keep up. With just one other couple, the group was small and friendly. We saw many sights and covered a LOT of ground in 3 hours. If you're looking to explore the city, don't miss this trip! We did have a difficult time finding the shop/start point, so give yourself plenty of time.
Fantastic tour. Fantastic trip through Prague on e-bikes.Excellent guide(Michal) with perfect english skills and knowledge of all the sights.

Excellent way to see Prague - very informative and interesting. We just completed the 3 hour tour today and had the best time. Michal was a great guide and picture taker with lots of knowledge of all the sites. We made several stops and the e-bikes were a perfect way to see everything. I would highly recommend this for anyone wanting to get a great idea of the Prague sites. Prague is a beautiful city rich in history and this tour was definitely the Highlight of our stay. Highly recommend!

A really good way to see Prague. We went on a three hour tour with e-bikes. The guide said that we were a large group, we were 6 + the guide. I think it worked fine. It was my first tour on an E-bike and it was not at all difficult :-). We took the tour on a Saturday at 10 AM and it was a lot of people around on some places. If you are in Prague I think this is a really good thing to start with. Then you can see all the areas and return later on or another day. A lot of places to good pictures from.

Good way to get familiar with Prague. Bikes were easy to ride, just had to be aware when riding near crowds of people. Saw all the main attractions in Prague and plenty of stops to take photos. Igor our guide also took photos and emailed to us.

Prague by ebike - friendly family company providing the perfect experience. Friendly and focused this small electric bike tour company covers all the main spots but keeps u occupied and intrigued as u cycle around. Michal is the son of one of the owners and he knows his stuff. Also enthusiastic and encouraging when 1 of the group wasn't used to cycling. She is now! Best bit are the orange safety helmets. Bright!

Excellent way to experience Prague!. We took a three hour tour with e-bikes. We were six people and a guide. Some places were really crowded, like the Astronomical Clock and the castle, but most of the time we could ride our bikes without problems. We had lots of opportunities to take great photos of Prague. As it was e-bikes you didn't have to be in good physical shape. You had to be alert though, because of the traffic and all the tourists.

Amazing and informative. Me and my boyfriend did the electric bike tour during our 3 day trip in Prague. The tour was just amazing, guide perfect and very knowledgeable, bikes so easy to ride! Definitely recommended!

A lovely and interesting tour of Prague by electric bike. This tour by e-bike was a wonderful experience. Without doing any effort - as the electric motor was doing all the work - we visited the most interesting spots of this beautiful city Prague and got a clear and bright explanation from our guide on each one of them: in the footsteps of the Czech kings, the Habsburgs Emperors, Stalin, and many other historical persons, the Czech Lands' history unrolled itself. This and the splendid views on the city from different vantage points, makes this tour unforgettable. Highly recommended for anyone who wants to become familiar with Prague in a short time.Philippe and Karla - Belgium

A fantastic way to see Prague. My wife and I have recently returned from Prague and one of the highlights of our trip was a fantastic bike tour with e Bikes. Michal and Igor showed us around the sights on their fantastic e bikes and what a tour it was! We saw and sampled sights of the city with a great commentary by Michal and we learned so much about this great city. The bikes are easy to ride and Michal maintains safety at all times. this was great way to see the city and was far more than we expected. All in all it took about three and a half hours with plenty of stops along the way for photographs and commentary. Michal also e mailed the photographs that he took along the way that very afternoon. It was a fantastic experience. Keep up the good work Michal!

Excellent way to start your trip to Prague!. My wife and I visited Prague in March 2015. On the first day of our stay the hotel receptionist recommended to us Prague By E-Bike tour. She called their office and one hour later we were already driving electric bicycles for the first time ever. They were very easy to handle and took us with almost no effort to Prague best viewpoints. Our guide was very knowledgable and gave us a lot of information about the history and about life in Prague in general. On the second and third days of our visit we went back to some places (Prague castle, Jewish quarter) but our e-bike trip was definitely the highlight of our visit.

Great fun. We took a three-hour morning tour on our first full day in Prague. This was a great way to become familiar with the city and we were able to see so much in such a limited time. Our guide was friendly and helpful, with an excellent pre-tour briefing, explaining to us how the electric bikes worked and making sure we were entirely comfortable before starting our tour. My wife and I were the only people booked, which was of no issue whatever, so we effectively had the use of a private tour guide to show us around. As others have said, the electric bikes were very simple to use and are a brilliant concept, especially when cycling uphill. Complimentary water and rain ponchos provided. No clock watching, our tour overran by about 15 minutes. Our guide took photos of us, with our permission and emailed them to us straight away when we finished.. A great start to our break in a truly beautiful city.

Brilliant eko ride!!!. I came to Prague with my girlfriend for a weekend trip. Bike is very easy to ride and the trip gave us definitely more that we expected. Especially our funny groupleader Michal gave us several tips what to see or visit with the rest of our time. Tour goes all around the most famous architecture places. I garanteee breathtaking and extraordinary experience:-)
Excellent!. Great way to enjoy Prague! We would chose it again. Our guide was very nice and helpful. You will definitely enjoy it!

Amazing experience!. The tour we've been on took place in the summer, when Prague was extremely hot. I must say: The e-bikes made the experience so much better! We got to see almost everything that the beautiful city has to offer, without breaking a sweat! The guide was extremely friendly and spoke perfect English, which really was the icing on the cake. Would definitely recommend to anyone!

Best Prague outdoor activity ever!. Prague is hilly so we opted for e-bikes. Prague By Ebike was recommended as one of the best value for money to us and we were not disappointed! It was both fun and relaxing experience with lots of sight seeing on top. The guide was very friendly and knowledgeable about Prague (both known and less known sites). When in Prague next time I will do this again - that time on scooters which these guys are renting as well!

Thank you Prague By ebike. Since I had been in Prague couple times already, this time I've decided to try one of the new company's around and it really was a good choice. The only shame is that all of the tours in Prague seems to take the same route ( Letna, Petrsin, Castle ), that I already did over a decade ago while visiting the first time. Otherwise the customer service same as the bikes very good quality and i would sure recomend it to others.

The best thing we did in Prague. The tour was amasing, the guide very educated And very friendly, My wife, my son And I got to see the most important parts of Prague in 4 hours. When we booked the tour we were a little afraid to ride the bikes And to go uphill but the bikes have a battery that works fantastic, dont be afaid of extreme effort because you wont even feel the pedalling. Highly recomend this tour.

Amazing!. We took this tour at the beginning of November during our weekend stay in Prague so the weather wasn´t so nice... anyway the tour was amazing! The guide was very helpful and knew many interesting facts about Prague and the ebikes are really easy to ride! Highly recommended to everyone!

A lot packed in 3 hours!. We found the brochure in our hotel lobby and as we just did an e-bike tour with our river cruise a few days earlier we knew how much fun they can be. The place was easy to find and the service was excellent. Our guide gave us a lot of information and pointed out interesting sights we would have not noticed without an expert guide. The bikes are easy, fun and well maintained. I'm not the fittest person and I found the bikes very easy to handle. You really do see as much as possible in a very short period of time. Michal took pictures of us at various scenic spots and emailed them to us so we had them upon returning home. Just Excellent!!

Great Tour. Really enjoyed the tour with Michal, a great guide who gives a slightly different perspective on some of the cities landmarks and some nice anecdotes. The e-bikes make it so easy to get around we never broke a sweat and you see parts of the city you might have otherwise missed. It is a little expensive but so are the segways and the e-bikes are much more comfortable. I would definitely recommend this tour.

Best Prague tour ever!. We went on e-bikes with couple of friends and it truly was an amazing experience. I would totally recommend it to anyone who wants to see as much as possible from Prague without much effort :D. E-bikes are really amazing and fun!

Touring Prague by E-Bike with Michal. When we visited Prague on our vacation this month, we started the day walking around the beautiful city. However, we didn't really get to see and know this beautiful place until we took a tour via Prague by E-Bike. I can't say enough great things about our guide, Michal. He took us on a wonderful visit of the city and enabled us to not only view the breathtaking sights but to learn about the tremendous history of this place. MIchal was extremely knowledgeable and made our tour absolutely perfect.The next couple of days we were in Prague we were able to go back and spend time visiting several of the places he pointed out to us while on our Prague by E-Bike tour. Had we not taken this tour which I call seeing Prague "up close and personal", we would have missed out on so much. As a result, our visit to Prague ended up being our favorite stop on our European trip.To anyone who wants to visit this beautiful city, I most definitely recommend seeing it by going on a "Prague By E-Bike" tour. Be sure and ask for Michal. He is the best! Thank you for making our vacation most memorable.The Hamiltons

Best way to see Prague without a lot of walking. Michal gave us a very good, 3+ hour, tour of Prague on the E-bikes. He was very knowledgeable about the area, stopped often to explain the sights and took pictures of us. My wife had been having hip problems and was afraid that she could not do very much walking when we got to Prague. But she said that riding the bike was very easy & comfortable. The E-bikes are very easy to use - you start pedaling and the motor switches on very smoothly. You make about a half a turn of the pedal and then you seem to "coast" for a few hundred feet. The bike has 7 gears which we rarely used. Twice, Michal warned us to shift down to first gear before going up a steep hill. We had to pedal constantly going up the steep hill, but it was like pedaling a normal bike on a level surface.The start location was easy to get to on the #9 Tram. This was one of the high points of our visit to Prague. Thanks, Michal!

Let the e-bike take the strain.... Highly recommended. An effortless e-bike tour of the main sites of Prague coupled with the local knowledge of Michal was pretty much the highlight of our short trip. Suitable for couch-potatoes, chain smokers and asthmatics alike, similar effort to gentle walking despite a few sharp hills en-route. Easily the best way to get to see the main sites in a short space of time complete with stops for photos plus time for milling around some of the buildings and gardens. Thanks Michal.

If you take one tour of Prague...do it with this E-bike tour!. Michal, our tour guide, was friendly and knew his history and way around the back alleys of Prague. He took pictures of us on the tour and then emailed them to us...which was a nice plus. E-bike is the way to go to see Prague, given the cobblestone streets and hilly areas. You won't regret taking this tour!

E bike tour in Prague.. I can't imagine a better way to get around and see Prague. Susan, our guide, is an Architect student and knows her stuff! Although it is hilly in some areas, the electric bike made it a breeze! The tour encompasses all of the major landmarks and allows you to get a "big" picture of the city. We are only in town a few days and took this tour as "a get to know the city" our first day in town. I recommend doing this tour your first day so you can decide where to go back and spend your time.

The best way to see Prague!. We were recommended this tour by the helpful staff at our hotel, and we were not disappointed. Our Prague by E-Bike tour was one of the highlights of our month long trip in Europe!We were lucky enough to be the only two people booked on that afternoon's tour, so we effectively had a private guide. Michal was very informative in terms of the history of the city, and it was really interesting to have the perspective of a native Praguer in regards to our questions about contemporary Prague as well. At first I was hesistant, as I am not a regular or confident cyclist, but my fears were totally unfounded - it was very easy to ride the e-bike, with basically no physical effort required! You just coast along and press the 'zoom' button if you need a bit more oomph! Experienced guides and quality helmets are provided, and you are lead along a very safe route, with little interaction with road traffic at all. In addition to the fun of riding the e-bikes, the interesting tour of Prague sites and commentary from Michal, another added bonus was the photographs he took of us throughout the tour, which he promptly emailed to us, completely free of charge (we took several day trips and tours throughout our holiday in Europe, and many companies tried to charge as much as US$5 + per image!). I am really glad we chose to take the Prague by E-bike tour, especially over one of the many Segway tours available in Prague - we saw huge mobs of people in these groups who could not possibly have been receiving the one-on-one guidance that we received, and who would have been unable to cover the amount of ground that we did on the E-bikes. I highly recommend the Prague by E-bike Tour, you will not be disappointed!

Best bike tour ever. I have never written a review, but after today I feel it is necessary. Traveling around on the e bike is easy and the best way to see Prague. It is so fun and effortless that you can't help, but have a good time. Miroslav Vojtek was our guide today. He had the knowledge of a university professor. We were on a 3 hour tour and every stop we made he provided the most detailed information you can imagine. In the tour I feel as though I learned the entire history of Prague and saw every important building and part of the city. If there is a better way to see Prague please tell me about it. If you have a chance to go you would be foolish not to take this tour.

Awesome and funny way to see Prague. I was having the first full day in Prague and didn't know at all about the city. My guide, Ivana, told about stuff so well that after trip I felt like I know quite a lot about the city and the history of it. We went through everything what is worth checking in Prague and after the tour it was easier to check the city by myself, cause i already had some idea of the city and where places are. Worth every penny!

Great way to see Prague. Had loads of fun on the e-bike tour. Not only are the bikes super cool, but our guide was amazing as well. He really knew his stuff and was able to answer all of our questions. Very highly recommended!

Something different!. We received a recommendation in our Hotel for this e-bike tour and we did not regret it at all! We drove around the city with our guide Michal on very well maintained e-bikes. It was very easy and almost relaxing to drive with them. Michal has a lot of knowledge about the city and the history of Prague. All in all it was just perfect! We would highly recommend it to everyone!

Prague by e bike. We were very pleased with the tour and Zuzana our guide. She explained so much of the history and architecture clearly and knowledgeably. She was very attentive to us as following riders, as she led us around beautiful Prague. The bikes and helmets were in excellent condition, the bikes were easy to,ride.It was really fun and great orientation for three hours.We highly recommend this company and Zuzana.

Best Way To See Prague!. Easy and simple to use, friendly and insightful guide, and whole lot of fun! My guide, Zuzana was magnificent! She definitely knew her stuff about the wonderful city, taking me around to see beautiful views as well as through main attractions of Prague. Zuzana was very patient and relaxed, even when I wanted to take photos of everything I saw! A 3 hour journey which leaves you with brilliant memories. If there's one thing to do in this city, it's definitely Prague by E-bike!

Prague Tour - The Tops. We were recommended the e-bike tour as an alternative to the numerous Segway tours and my wife and I are glad we did. Susan, our host, showed us many of the points of interest in the 3 hours tour with the highlight being the journey along town park from the borders of the New Town to the Funicular. The bikes were easy to ride and effortless on the hills. Highly recommended.

A great experience!. We did the e-bike tour with Michal while we were in Prague two weeks agon. Michal was an excellent guide and had a good knowledge about the city. The electric bikes were very easy to ride. We had a lot of fun during the tour and we would recommend Prague by E-bike to all visitors!

Super and Fun Introduction to the City. We did this on a sunny Saturday in late May. Michal was an excellent, motivated guide. He knew his material and was proud of Prague. In addition to basic facts, his English was spot on. Our 3+ hour tour was a perfect way to get oriented in the city. Because of cobblestones, hills and no designated bike lanes (like in Berlin), there are few regular bikes in Prague. The electric bikes let us cruise uphill effortlessly and cover much territory. We crossed the river twice and saw many of the major attractions. Michal was polite and always patient with us stopping to take photos. We would recommend Prague by E-Bike to all visitors. Well worth it!!

Great way to know Prague. This was our first ebike tour and we had a great time! We got to hidden parts of the city but at the same time visited the most famous monuments. The guide had a good knowledge and was extremely helpful. We were just a small group so no hurry, we could take our time and really enjoy the trip. The bike is easy to ride (i´m not a good biker but to ride this one it was really easy). When we visit Prague next time, we will take the ebike tour again, for sure

Fantastic day. Thanks to Petra for a wonderful time on the E- bike tour. The bikes were incredibly easy to use,fast, and very enjoyable. We had a wonderful time biking around the city. Petra was full of knowledge about the city and shared so much with us. A highly recommended way to see Prague.

Wouldn't want to do Prague without this!. The electric bikes were fun and easy to ride, and they enabled us to see parts of the city buses and cars can't go. The guide was extremely friendly, a local, and had a good general knowledge and answers to all our questions. The groups stay small and quite personal. There is lots of time for pictures that would not be possible as bus passes by. I am glad I did this to get an overall knowledge of the city, after we did the tour we could find our way back to our favorite parts for exhibitions and additional exploring!

Excellent Tour from Prague By E-Bike. We visited Prague only for several days and we have been advised by our friends to participate at Prague By E-Bike tour. That was an excellent choice from the start till the end. We had a very professional and knowledgeable guide, their bikes were very comfortable and safe. It is a very good option for the beginning of your trip to Prague as you can come back to places you liked the most in following days. I can highly recommend this tour.

Great First day in Prague!. This was my second time on electric bikes, they are SUCH a blast! I was lucky enough to have a private tour with Michal which was fantastic. He was incredibly knowledgeable and explained so many things in the city that I would have NEVER known. The tour is great, and gives you an overview of Prague and all the amazing stories and history the city has to offer. It allowed me to get a better understanding of the city, and the next day I was able to go back and explore what I found most interesting. The bikes make it so easy to get around and see more in 3 hours that you ever could by walking. I was lucky and was there when it was not too crowded but I could see that it might be hard to bike all the places we went if there were more people. I would HIGHLY recommend taking this tour to get a great history and overview of Prague. Michal the guide was professional, knowledgeable, and made sure everything went smoothly. The bikes are so easy to use! This is a great way to enjoy being outside, going places where the cars cannot, but not having to work that hard :)Thanks for a great tour!

The best experience my family had when exploring Prague. I invited my family from the USA for a spring holiday. I prepared the whole plan for them to enjoy the city as much as possible. Prague is situated on both banks of Vltava river and to explore it can be quite challenging to walk..So i took the ,,adventure way with a more comfort,,....I picked Prague by E-bike cause they were very professional and a great value for money and I could see the perfect attitude from them as I am Czech. The tour was simly amazing. I am a Prague citizen and I was able to see the places I have never seen before just because they were hard to reach on walk...After the whole day of e-biking everybody said that they would never take the bus tour. Prague by .E-bikes made their holiday a beatiful experience

Prague by Ebike. we took the trip last week.we were 4 friends with petra the tour guide.she was very knowledgeable about the history of Prague and czech.the tour i\was very easy since the electric bike is a great solution for the not so sportive people.we got to see all the main attraction of Prague and it is recommended to do the tour on you first day and than decide what you want to see at the rest of your trip

Awesome way to see Prague!. There were 2 awesome things that made the tour special. 1) tour guide 2) the e-bikeMartin our guide was very knowledgable and sincere. He gave us a superb intro about this city and was able to took us to spots with stunning views. The E-bike makes peddaling so much easier which made it possible for us to visit all those stunning spots which would be difficult for a tourist to go. We really enjoyed cycling along the river and climbing up hills with the e-bike. It was simply the best 3 hours I've spent in the city. Highly recommended!!

Great way to see Prague. It was an amazing experience! The guide spoke excellent English and was very knowledgeable. I really recommend this kind of tour, it´s great way to see Prague in a few hours and the Prague hills are no problem with the electric bikes :) I was there with my grandmother who is almost 70 years old!

E-bike tour is the best!. The moment I saw the ad for Prague by e-bike, I knew I want to do this. And it was absolutely the right decision. The tour was great! The e-bikes are such fun and so easy to use. After 3 hours-tour you're not tired at all, because you just sit on the bike and the bike does the work :-) And I was lucky to have the best tour guide Michal - his English is perfect, his knowledge is enormous, he is a really great guide. His boss should be proud of him :-)

Great way to see Prague. We did this tour our first day in Prague and it was fantastic. Our guide Martin was incredibly knowledgeable and this was a great way to see a lot of Prague in 3 hours. As we were able to see so much of the city on our first day, it really allowed us to narrow down the places we wanted to spend more time at all. Also, the e-bikes were a lot of fun and made the whole tour very relaxing as you don't have to pedal hard to get going. I would highly recommend that anyone going to Prague book this tour for the first day of their trip.

Ebike tour! Convenient and Exciting!. I was a little nervous to get on an ebike, not ever having been on one, but it turned out to be so much fun!!!!! And it was super easy and intuitive!!!! As for the tour, our guide was highly knowledgeable of the city and thoroughly versed in local and European history! The ebike tour gives you a chance to visit to all the city highlights but in a convenient and exciting way. Bonus: you will travel to heights of the city that you'd never do otherwise! The views are stunning!

A real highlight of our weekend in Prague. From the moment we sat on our electrically assisted bikes we knew we were in for a real cycling treat without the usual accompanying exhaustion. We seem to cover one end of Prague to the other seeing it from different vantage points that we would never have found ourselves and cycling effortlessly up hills and through beautiful parkland with total ease. . Our tour guide Petra was friendly and efficient and her knowledgeable discourse opened our eyes to the history , culture and folklore of Prague and we were left with a much fuller understanding of what has shaped the Country and it's people. The best bit for me though was seeing so much of the city in such a short time - over three hours- and the feeling of freedom and exhilaration of being on a bike without the aching legs!

Amazing Experience. From our first hello with Miroslav we knew that we were in good hands and going to have an unforgettable biking experience in Prague! Not only was he through in his explanations of what we were going to do BUT his attention to safety issues and making sure we were totally comfortable was great ! His knowledge of the history of the country and ability to help us understand the building blocks of the Czech Republic thru the centuries was incredible and at every stop on our journey he opened our eyes to the magic of Prague and her people. The bikes are the most incredible we have ever used and almost brand new ! We took all the hills with ease and frankly wish we could export them to the US for all our bike travels there! We saw Prague from the very best vantage points and with a really wonderful guide! Just go for it and you will be really pleased !

great day in Prague!. It was a wonderful way to spend 3 hours in the beautiful capital of Prague. We covered a lot of ground and saw Prague from many vantage points that tourists don't normally get to see. We live in Prague and learned some new and interesting things. Loved being able to bike up steep hills with help from the comfortable electric bike. I would have never tried to do this without this tour, and so I am quite happy with my choice. You get as much exercise as you wish - you can pedal with or without the help of the motor. Our tour guide, Michal, was very knowledgable and fun to bike with. All-in-all a great day!

Most effective way of seeing Prague. Though only 3 hours, I find it one of the most effective of seeing Prague from different place and angle.My tour guide, Miroslav is also very attentive and knowledgeable.Extremely pleasant experience and I will be back!

biking in Prague !. I truly enjoyed my day of e-biking in Prague. Michal was our guide. He was a true pleasure and extremely knowledgeable with the history of Prague. I learned so much! The E-bikes are so much fun. That extra boost really makes a difference....especially when biking up the hills. Prague is a beautiful city and I'm so glad I got to experience with an awesome tour and guide. I definitely recommend Prague by E-Bike!

An interesting, fun, and not too strenuous way to see a lot of Prague. My friend and I took a tour with this company in July 2013, on quite a hot day. Getting the extra boost that their bikes provide really helped when it came to climbing the many hills in this city. (And it was fun!) The company also allows people to just rent the bikes, I believe, so that could be an option too. When my friend and I chose this tour, it was before I realized that there were many electronic bike companies, and also many free walking tours in this city. However, getting to see the city with our smart, friendly, and kind native tour guide was definitely a plus!

Great tour. This was the single best thing we did in Prague. Martin, our tour guide, was wonderful and very knowledgeable. He catered the tour to what we wanted to see and answered every question we had. i would HIGHLY recommend this tour to anyone looking to see Prague.

If you do one thing in Prague - this is it!. In three hours our electric bikes took us all over the city - gorgeous parks, all the glorious sights and many more places we might never have discovered on our own. Our guide Michael was awesome - being a local he was able to share an insiders perspective of life in Prague both past and present and he took loads of great photos of us and had emailed them before we even got back to our hotel. We cruised right to the top of the city effortlessly - the e bikes were fabulous fun and we now have a great insight into this amazing place and know what we want to explore further. We absolutely recommend this - amazing value and very professionally put together.

Brilliant exciting and easy afternoon. We wanted a bike tour of Prague, so booked onto Prague by E-bike. It was our first electric bike experience, so we can't compare with other e-bike tours, but we absolutely loved it. The bikes made cycling up the steep hills as simple as cycling along a flat piece of road. Electric bikes are a little heavy, so some of the shorter members of the group struggled with mounting/dismounting at times, but our guide was there to help and only travelled as fast as the slowest member of the group. The route was a mix of small narrow street, hills, parks and long flat stretches where you could really flex and enjoy the bikes' full power and speed.Our guide, Miroslav, was excellent - friendly, courteous, and helpful. He only moved on from stops when we were happy to, and was happy to answer questions about Prague's history and culture. This was truly the highlight of our time in Prague.The only thing I would say is if possible try and scope out where the bike office is beforehand so that you don't get lost on the morning of your ride.

very informative, fun and breathtaking views. Thanks for an amazing time and great insight into Prague's history, culture, legends and heritage. I am so glad Tereza recommended Prague by E-bike, otherwise i would have left Prague after a month stay with no much awareness of its rich culture. I tried Prague E-bike initially for the fun part of riding electric bike in Prague but after two hours i walked away with more knowledge about Prague and of course with lots of amazing photos and laughter . Prague by E-bike team was very down to earth, friendly and informative. Some of the walking tours and open car tours does not provide this much insight into Prague's transformation from medieval times to current. I highly recommend anyone to try Prague by E-bike probably early in the trip, so you get to know more places and plan your adventures accordingly, because some of the place Prague by E-bike took us were simply breathtaking. Many thanks guys. I will give 11 out of 10.

Can not say enough good things!. Prague By E-Bike was amazing! Our guide, Petra was enthusiastic about the city and answered our many questions. She even snapped some amazing pictures of us along the way. The bikes were super easy to use and were a great way to see many sites in this beautiful city. I highly recommend Prague By E-Bike and Petra was just the best!!! Donna from NJ.

Best way to see Prague. After a boat cruise on the Danube for a week we extended our trip via train travel and spent two days in Prague. Without much time to see such a dynamic city, not much in the way of pre-planned activities, and achy feet from all our walking, we caught a glimpse of a flyer for an E-bike tour. Best investment of our two weeks in Europe. Three hours of riding through the main attractions on both sides of the river, up and down hills and to some of the best vantage points in the City, it was well worth the money. Our finicky teens thought it was fantastic. We invested in a private tour for the four of us. Miroslav was extremely well versed in the history of the country, spoke wonderful English, and enjoyed the trip as much as we did. The E-bike concept is terrific. When you pedal, you get boosted power. You never feel like you're struggling. All the way up to the castle without breaking a sweat. Would do this again in an instant.

Awesome e-bikes, awesome tour!. This was our first visit to Prague and our first experience with e-bikes. Simply awesome! E-bike is a great way to explore this hilly city, it is very easy to ride on, just as a bike - hand breaks, gears and all, but every small move of your feet gives a great push to go forward and you feel yourself as a superman. The day was very hot for Prague (38C), but effortless ride on e-bike gives you breeze and don't make you sweat, b/c you don't have to do hard work at all. Much better then walking streets on foot. We covered great distance. Our guide Michal was very enthusiastic, friendly and told us a lot about the city, history and up-to-date information. We had a great pleasure talking with him and exploring this beautiful city. Galina from Texas

Awesome way to explore Prague. This was by far the best way to get a good understanding of both the history and the sites in Prague. Our guide, Michal, was very accommodating and knowledgeable. He gave us really cool insights about the different historical landmarks around Prague. The E-Bikes were very easy to use, and made the tour very easy, even when going up steep hills. The route was also well planned, with limited exposure to traffic and gorgeous views throughout the tour. Highly recommended for anyone visiting Prague.

E Bike/Best way to see Prague. My son, grand daughter and I just returned from a visit to Prague, without question our favorite activity was touring Prague with a wonderful guide from PRAGUE BY E-BIKE. This was our first experience on E-bikes and I can't say enough good things about them. We started off on our three hour tour with our guide Martin giving us a quick lesson on the E-bikes. The three of us, ages 10, 48 and 71 were equally comfortable on the bikes. Martin, a native of Prague was a wealth of information about places to see and the history of different areas. We were able to go many places where cars couldn't go including some parks and the famous castle, stopping several places for photos. After we finished our tour Martin recommended a wonderful place to go for a delicious Czech meal.

BEST WAY TO SEE PRAGUE!. We have done many bike tours throughout Europe and South America and THIS WAS THE BEST! Not only due to the e-bikes (which I LOVED) but our tour guide Michal was knowledgeable, friendly and helped make our trip to Prague a perfect way to see this amazing city. I would highly recommend this tour.

Amazing way to see the city. Thia was the best tour of a city I have ever done. Our tour guide Mikal was great. Very enthusiastic and knowledgable about Prague and its history.With this tour you will get to see the city up close but also ride through the park which sport some incredible views of the city. This is hands down the best way to see Prague. Book this tour now!

Fantastic!. If you only have a short time in Prague, Prague by E-bike is the ideal way to get an overview of this wonderful city. With Mikhail as our knowledgeable guide, we were shown the city and learnt so much about its history and people. The bikes were easy to use and allowed us to cover a lot of ground in a short time, picking out what we would like to return to later.

Prague by E-Bike Czech Republic. I would definitely recommend this company and as a way to see Prague by an electric bike. The guide we had (Andrew) was excellent, very knowlegeable and enthusiastic about his city. There was a lot of flooding when we went but he led us around to other areas to view the city. The Prague Park is a wonderful place to ride through and view the city and statues.Unfortunately when the tour was finished I left my wallet in the bikes basket. I called later in the afternoon and the owner of the company responded immediately. He drove 20 minutes out of his was to go back to the bike office and then brought my wallet directly to me at the Grand Hotel Bohemia. I was so grateful to him for taking the time and trouble to do this. All in all we had a fantastic time in Prague and would defintely come back again.

Exciting E-Biking around Prague. Just came back from an awesome tour of Prague on e-bikes and didn't even break a sweat! The electric bikes are the way to go in hilly Prague. So much fun! Our lovely tour guide Petra took us to the best locations covering more popular tourist spots as well as unknown gems. Petra was very informative and friendly and made our visit to Prague memorable. Thank you Prague by e-bike for a great day!

Great for anyone old and young. My mother and I like to do something active when we travel. She is now older and as such, has slowed down a bit. Taking a tour via e-bike seemed like just the thing. The bike does most of the work, yet we were able to still feel like we were biking through the city like real cyclists. The tour guide, Andrew, spoke English very well and knew the city and history as he was from Prague. Booking was simple and flexible. We booked the 10AM tour and it was raining. I emailed requesting a later tour time and immediately received a response from Jan that it was no problem. When my mother and I got back to the hotel, she realized she forgot her wallet in the bike bag. I emailed the company while my mother called. Jan dropped everything to go to the office and check the bike. He found her wallet and then even biked to the hotel to deliver it. Great, honest company. I would highly recommend this for anyone old and young. It was worth it.

Most Amazing Way to See Prague :). My husband and I love walking around to see what the towns that we visit are like, but the Prague by E-Bike tour offered us an easy and stress-free way to see all of Prague in one afternoon. Not only did we had a lot of fun riding around the city, but also we learned a lot about Prague from our tour guide, Michal. He was kind, helpful (especially, when I had difficulty getting on the bike because I'm 5'1) and also very knowledgeable. The bikes were absolutely amazing - it had a boost button that you can press when you're going uphill and it will take you uphill with ease. I highly recommend this tour if you're only in Prague for a couple of days and you don't have the time to walk all over the city.

Cool way to see a lot of Prague!. We have never been on an eBike before, but after a short explanation it was pretty easy - in the beginning I found it very surprising how fast you'll speed up! On the bike you see most of Prague's Sights and it's easy to make lots of kilometres. Even the hills to Prague Castle are pretty easy because of the support of the bikes.The bikes are pretty new and good quality, the helmets are good as well, so one feels safe all the time.Michal, our guide, was great, he took all the time to answer our questions and told us the important facts about Prague.The sportive character is missing a bit because of the "e" in the bikes, but it is a fun way to see Prague and even though the weather wasn't it's best, we enjoyed the tour and I would definitly recommend it!

Easy way to discover Prague.. We used bikes from "Prague By E-Bike" to visit a lot of cool places. Very good way to see all old Prague around from hills without any sweat drop. Just push the pedal and bike runs by itself. Easy way for me (as old fat smoker) to feel myself like young sportsmen :)
Thursday 27th October. Our Segway guide Ali, was extremely patient with all 9 of us!! The overall experience was great fun and well organised.

Good choice. We were 2 people and took one hour guided tour.
The tour guy was very professional - spoke a lot about all historical sights, Prague and Czech in general. He took us to all nice places worth to see and we really enjoyed the ride.

One hour city tour . Alex was our leader and it was perfect.
We took the tour at old square and this nice guy learned us to use the machine and we started to enjoy quickly.

Fun and time saving. We discovered that the segway is the quickest and easiest way to see the city. A city tour takes up too much time. With the segway it was faster, easier (no walking up to see the castle), and a personal guide made it more enjoyable. Sightseeing on segway is going to be the rule for me on all holidays, now.

MOST AMAZING TOUR YOU WILL EVER DO!. On our first day in Prague we went straight to the Old Town Square and it didn't take 5 minutes before we were approached by someone offering a segway tour. And then someone else from a different company and so on and so on. Within 30minutes we had 5-6 different leaflets in our hands.We had a look at them and were quite surprised by the prices offered by the different companies for the EXACT same tour. The options were 1h/1h30/2h.EuroSegway wasn't the cheapest at all.. BUT they were the ones that seemed to have more groups going around and their guides had a very good English. Funny enough we hadn't been approached by them. So we enquired one of their reps and told them that we had had a cheaper offer (which was true) and he straight away matched it. he then tooks us to the office were the segways are parked. After signing the contract we were introduced to Alex, our guide. Put our helmets on and straight away he explained the safety procedures and we had a test drive (as it was our 1st time on a segway). We did not start the tour untill we were comfortable on them and Alex was more than patient while he explained it to us over and over. The teaching time did NOT count for the 2 hour tour. We then set off and went for the tour... it couldn't have been any more perfect. Alex gave very clear instructions when to turn/stop/go/slow down and always keeping an eye on us. The segway becomes really easy to control as we go along... He stopped to explained the sights, to take pictures when we asked for them and even stopped and helped us when we needed an interpreter to go in a pharmacy for a cream and in a shop to buy gloves (and stopped from getting a rip-off from the shop owner). Never rushed us and answer every question we had...At the end of the tour Alex gave us list of recomended restaurants and even pointed them out on the map... he just couldn't do enough for us. The tour itself is fantastic and we got to see all the top sights Prague has to offer. It's a very different way to see the city and its just gorgeous. Its a MUST DO when in Prague!!! We definitely recommend this tour and this company!!
Great! . The Segway enables you to see the city of Prague from a different perspective. If you try, ask to go to the high garden near the bridge. The staff was very friendly.
Fantastic experience. I had a fantastic tour of Prague despite the cold snowy weather. The guide was very informative and the Segway were in good condition.
Best Segway trip . I't highly recommended to take tour with Euro Segway and Alex is the best guide and it take us to amazing pleases

Fun way to hang around the city. I took a private tour with Segway and it is quite convenient and fun a lot.Even though you don't know how to ride it, it won't take much time to ride it as an expert, I recommend to take it if you are tired of walking.

Excellent experience. We went on a 2-hour tour in the morning, highly recommend playing Segway in the morning as there is less tourists and weather is breezy. Excellent tour guide Martin, very knowledgable and energetic. We are able to cover lots of famous and iconic spots. Must give it a try~

Great "off the street" Segway ride! . We wanted to try a Segway and bargained with this company who had representatives in the old town square. Alexander (the tour guide), way great with my friend wasn't steady at first on the Segway and really helped her out. He was very funny and gave a great and fun tour on the fun Segway's. As for the rest of the staff, the woman in the office was a little rude and condescending. Ask for Alexander or "Sasha" for a great time!

Nice way too see the city.. Son never went on a Segway, he picked it up in 5 mins. I went with my 9 year old son, best thing we did. We went for 60 mins and I think that was just about right...son started to get tried.Jeffery (the guide) was nice and gave us some info about the near by POI.

Excellent. We went for a Segway private tour and had a really good time. Our guide was very friendly and was able to talk about any monument/topic we asked about. Because it rained heavily in the middle of our tour, we were able to pause the time and have a break to avoid the rain which was great! Definitely recommend to anyone

Great fun and get to see lots of the city. We didn't know the city and we were approached by one of the sales folk scooting around the main square on Segways. After walking to their office we agreed to do a 1.5 hour trip.I'd never been on a Segway before and, in my fifties, was less keen than my teenage son. But it takes very little time to learn and is quite easy after only a couple of minutes. Just go for it !!Absolutely great! I would highly recommend the company and the tour we did (up to the castle). A wonderful way to see the city. Our guide (Konstantine) was absolutely brilliant, providing us with little bits of information on the sites were saw.I would suggest that, in the winter months, you wrap up warm and remember to wear gloves - the Segways can travel quite quickly and the longer tours can mean you will be quite cold by the end of them.
A must do. A great tour and a lovely experience. The Host Stephania was very informative and fun to be with. The ride through the mountains is not to be missed.

Age-Less Fun. As the mom that I am, I had my doubts about trying segways, but since the training I realized how easy they were to ride.Definetely the best way to combine history, sightseeing and fun! Our guide Stefi made sure of combine this perfectly; myself and my boys (17 and 11) loved the experience, even the youngest one asked Stefi to start working with her on eurosegway and of course we wanted more time than just 1 hour and a half.Really recommended!! :)

Euro Segway Prague. We had been to Prague in May. Segway tour offered by Euro Segway Prague made going to Prague a beautiful experience. The team managing the tours is amazing. Our guide Constiantine was very helpful and accomadating. He took care of our entire group with full dedication. I would recommend their services to everyone travelling to Prague, who is game for a Segway tour of the city.

Amazing Segway tour . Euro segways was the highlight of my Prague trip...thank you to our tour guide David! We went across the river to the castle and petrin hill where we had amazing views. We then stopped by a monastery and got beer from the 500 year old brewery there. Delicious!

A must-do trip!. Myself and my friend were visiting Prague and had already seen quite a few sights but fancied a Segway tour. We were approached in old town by George from England who was really nice and gave us great information about the tour. Then we got a two hour tour with Jeffrey who was amazing and a definite recommend. He's so impressive and knew everything about Prague. Jeffrey really made the trip as he asked what we had already seen and took us to new places and the parks around Prague. He also took us for a beer which was a great pit stop. It was also a private tour with just me, my friend and the tour guide which really made a difference. He also helps guide the Segway if you get scared going down the hill. Overall there is no doubt that this is the best Segway tour in Prague made even better by really helpful and nice staff. Thanks Jeffrey and George!

Fun and informative.. On Tuesday our family did a one hour Segway tour with Yaroslavl (sorry, we are not sure of the spelling of this name), a 19 year old, Prague born, guide. He was a gentle and funny young man who knew all there was to know about Prague. He also took the time at the completion of our tour to be sure we had ideas and directions for other activities for the remainder of our day. Thank you!

Worth every penny. We visited prague and booked this trip as a way to see the city. It was amazing. Our guide Anna was knowledgeable and very funny. Segways are a very unique way to visit all main sights. Would highly recommend. Fab trip
Worth every penny!. Super fun experience, a must do in Prague. Our guide Marek was the best guide ever. Did the 1,5 hour tour to the castle and around. Highly recommended!
A must DO in Prague!. Awesome experience. Even though it was raining, we had a great time. Highly recommend! Stanley, thanks for a great tour!!

Awasome experience!!!. Highly recommend! We had a great tour guide that his name is Alex.
We took one hour tour with a fair price.
The office is in the center of Prague -great location.

Very fun!. We went on a 30 minute Segway tour with our tour guide Jeffrey. Before we set off he gave us a lesson and let us practice until we felt comfortable and confident to set off. He was very knowledgeable telling us about the City and he was also very patient and helped us be safe on our Segways. It was very fun and good value and I would highly recommend it.

What a day to go Segway !!! 😉. It was my first time and it was awesome !!!!!i came with my uncle & cousin (whom is disable) and they gave us the best time of our lifes!!!Very professional & very kind Thank you David & Luka!!!You guys are the best !!!
Great Tour. What a great way to see this amazing city. Our guides were helpful and knowledgeable. We got a great deal through Jan in the old city square.
Awesome morning. Our family of four loved it. First time on Segways. Covered a lot of Prague and kids were smiling the entire 90 mins. Would highly recommend.

Fantastic experience. Our family of 4, none of whom had ever been on a Segway, decided to take a plunge thanks to the persuasive skills of Tiko. He allowed us a little ride and convinced us that this would be quite an experience.We decided to and Victoria was our Guide and what a guide. She was patient, extremely friendly and knowledgable and we had a blast during our 3 hour session. Prague is beautiful and the Segway was a great way of seeing both the Old Town and the newer parts. For those of you who have thoughts of doing a Segway tour but are scared, let me tell you that we mastered it in 10 minutes and it can be exhilarating. We were lucky to have met two people who were passionate about what they do and really enjoyed the experience.

Had a great tour with our guide Jeffrey. We had a great time exploring Prague by segway. Jeffrey was our private guide which made the tour a lot more personal. He did not only tell about the history of Prague but also told us some funny things about some buildings and statues. It's definetely something we would do again.Thank you Jeffrey.Tom & Merel

Great fun. Went on the 90 min Segway tour with my wife who was a little apprehensive about going on the Segway but our guide Jeffery couldn't have been nicer. He was really knowledgeable and made the whole tour interesting and fun. Highly recommended

Amazing Segway tour with Jeffrey. Our first time doing it and we had the most amazing Segway tour with our guide Jeffrey, he went above and beyond and was so friendly, he spoke about the history and recommended places to go and places to eat/ drink. Will definitely do it again when we come back to Prague!!

Fantastic even for first timer!!. This was the first time I tried Segaway but must admit our tour guide Nailey is such a fabulous person. We booked for a small 1 hour open your but as we were the only ones who turned up it became a personalized tour. This tour is worth every penny as you don't have good hop on hop off buses in Prague I wasn't sure how best can we looked around the city but trust me Segaway is simply a great option especially if you have a guide like Nailey who can train a 10 yr old or. 70 yrs old person in no time at all. The Segaway were of good quality too. Thanks Naily and euro Segaway for such a pleasant experience
Prague Segway . Oleg has been a great tour guide for our 1.5 hours Segway tour in Prague, highly recommended!! It's also available in Barcelona

Great guide Stanley!. I had a wonderful Tour right before noon with Stanley. We decided not to visit the places with a lot of tourists, but instead visited two parks and stopped for a drink.I really enjoyed relaxing in a quiet atmosphere, with a lot of space to ride the Segway.Stanley is really relaxed and a down to earth guy. Definitely worth it!

Amazing experience . Our guide was Stefi. She was helpful and talkative. Extremely professional and cheerful. We joined the 60mins trip seems not enough. Should have more than 4 hours to explore the whole city with Stefi. The car is easy to control. Colourful helmet with a wide range of size. The whole trip was exciting but really safe. She also recommend the most famous ice cream shop in Prague. Best experience we have ever had. Billy

Great fun way to see Prague . Thoroughly enjoyed our 90 minute tour with Jeffrey. He taught us well to use the segways so we grew confident quite quickly. A great way to see a lot of Prague (and the ideal way to get up the hill to the castle) in a short time, and Jeffrey made it a fun tour but imparted a lot of information along the way (and tips on where to visit in Prague). (nb family visit rather than friends!)

Amazing!!. The experience was superlative. Our guide Nelli was really helpful and very patient.I would recommend it to all visiting Prague!!I am in love with this city and especially after Segway ride.

Really good. Easy to get there, affordable price and couldnt ask for a better tour guide. Alex was amazing at explaining the cities history without boring anyone even the teenagers were intrested. Segways were fun and didnt malfunction . would defo come again ;))

Awesome segway tour of Prague. We did a 2 hour private segway tour with Konstantine. He is an awesome guide - knew a lot about the city's history, presented it in an interesting way and took us to some very interesting places we could not have gone to without a segway. The tour price was very reasonable and they also put a GoPro on one of our helmets so we could record all the memories :) Would highly recommend the tour!

A should do when in Prague. On a short visit to Prague we took this tour because we saw a lot of segways in Prague and for sure we decided for a great company, helpful staff and Stefi was our guide, she is a charm. She was really helpful teaching us how to drive and explaining about the city. Even our wifes and friends who didn't take the tour regret it when they saw us return with a tremendour smile as small kids with a new toy. Thank you Stefi and Eurosegway Important note: Just 1 hour is too short, take longer tours

Cool Experience. We're convinced to join a Segway tour while visiting around old town Prague, and was actually a very good experience thanks to our great guide Stanley. He made the experience! The tour is a great way to explore the majority of the city sites in a short amount of time.

Great first time on a segway. Booked on line to go on a 1 hour tour of the centre of Prague Old Town. I think they take up to about 20 people per group but there was only me and my and my boyfriend so it felt like a personal tour. We were guided around by Sergey, he was really friendly and stopped at different locations to tell us about the history, didn't overload us with information, just told us the interesting things. I didn't think I'd be able to balance to begin with but something just clicked after I started. Really good value and they give you a helmet, there are so many segways speeding round the centre by the many pedestrians - didn't see any other groups ith helmets. Definitely recommend Euro Segways!

You have to try this!. When my friends suggested we book a Segway tour of Prague I was, to say the least, apprehensive. I am 50+, unfit with zero balance. I can't drive or even ride a bike...However, I have to say this was without doubt one of the best experiences of my life. After fitting our crash helmets, and a brief training session at the offices, we were off...Our guide, Kireille, was very patient and informative. The Segways were very stable and it wasn't long before I was fast on the heels of my friends, whizzing through the streets of Prague Old Town. The actual tour was interesting and covered everything necessary, without being too long or boring. We had booked the 1.5 hour tour and I feel this was about right. We were able to get a good idea of the various tourist attractions, which we then visited in depth the following day, on foot. The long road up to The Castle was a little daunting but with Kireilles help we all made it and I even managed to wave to the other tourists we passed on the way. If you are considering this activity, I would definitely recommend it. If I can do it, anyone can!
Segway Tour in Prague. We had a wonderful time with Alex who was very friendly, fun and informative. A must when in Prague. Don't worry the Segway is very easy and its really impossible to fall.
First Segway experience!. We had the chance to visit Prague on segway for two hours. Our guide Alex was very motivated and enthusiastic. It was a funny experience and a unique way to discover Prague.
Awesome. Nelly was the best tour guide! Highly recommend it. Very good instruction and a great value for families.

Great trip with Jeffrey. Had a great trip with Jeffrey. He showed us how to ride the Segway and it was much easier to handle it compared to what I thought. He had a lot to tell on our trip and was a good company. He communicated really well. I would like to recommend a trip with Jeff.

Funny and interesting visit on segway!!! :). We went for visiting the city on segway with Konstantine, and actually I just can suggest you to do it! You can discover the town in funny way! Konstantine knew a lot about the city, and its history, he will show you the best place, on the same time you are on the segway, it's funny, you don't get tired, and you can discover the city.Thank you for this nice moment.

NEVER HAD A TOUR GUIDE BETTER. LOVED IT!!! Jeffrey made us feel so welcome in Prague, sharing his knowledge- not just of historic prague, but local tips too! Recommend to take a tour with Jeff! Tour was fun - BEST WAY TO SEE PRAGUE IS ON A SEGWAY

Not half as good as expected. We got to Prague at 6am with nothing to do, and while we were walking on the street, we ran into Neil on a segway. Seemed like a nice guy, he had just bought his coffee and donut in the morning and gave it to a homeless dude, quite impressive. So he convinced us to do the tour, and and since we were anyway considering it, we said yes. Next day we land up for the tour, very excited and our guide Oleg (OG) asked us if we wanted a historical tour or just a random segway ride. Obviously we wanted the historical tour. Well, it was far from historical. He did not know a thing about the city, monuments or history, and in fact we, being tourists, knew more about the city than he did. We asked him questions, which he could not answer, so he decided to WIKIPEDIA and give us answers which were not good enough. We got fooled into this. We did enjoy the Segway ride, but that's about it. So much for the 'historical' segway tour. NOT RECOMMENDED. I would say go with a different company, we ran into some others on segway tours and their guides were interesting and knowledgeable.

Great Experience!. We had a fun 2-hours guided tour with Alex. It was very informative and quite a pleasant ride to all the main sights of Prague. Cool dude as well - fun to hang out with! Absolutely recommendable! We'll try it soon in Barcelona.

segway . best way to see any city JUST DO ITguide was super and the trip was an hour. we pre booked on viator app and made good saving. euro segway just off old town square. don't worry if you are segway first timer as it's easy after some tuition

Great experience. We had a chance to visit the beautiful and magical Prague. Because of sore feet, we decided to try on the Segway and take a two-hour tour. It was a wonderful experience in my life, we got a lot of fun. Our guide was Alex and he showed beautiful landscapes near the Prague Castle and the Petrin Tower. He told story of all the historical places and was very friendly. I recommend everyone to try segways !!!

Amazing experience. Our guide Alex was brilliant, first time ever on a Segway for both me and my other half and he taught us very well! His knowledge of the city was great and was never boring! Definitely would recommend doing in any country!

Great experience. It was my friend's first time and my second time on a segway and we had a blast. Although it was the marathon and we couldn't see a lot of the big attraction, the guide, Stanley, made it even more fun. It was great and I definitely recommend it to anyone who wants to do something new and exciting.
A very nice sightseeing on segway.. A very nice sightseeing on segway. Our guide Stanley "The superman" made the tour exciting and funRecomended

Prague castle. Very nice tour with a very nice guide! Konstantine gave us time to make pictures and gave answers to all our questions! Enjoyed the Segway tour very much! Our youngest is 13 years old and managed just fine!

Actually better than i imagined.. Never went on a segway before, but Niel told us it would be easy and it was actually a lot more fun than i thought it would be. our guide ( i forgot to ask her name) was a great guide, made sure we were safe. really easy to get into it, r8 10/10 m8 would do again

Unique Experience. My segway experience in Prague was truly unique. It is practical, fun & worth every single penny. Amazing prices for such an unforgettable experience. Friendly guides & beautiful scenery.
Nice way to see prague. Great way to see prague. Go for the 2 hr tour. Covers the main areas of the city. Our tour guide was Nanny. V nice with perfect English.

A great way to see Prague through "fresh eyes"; very nice and friendly staff (Nelly is a great guide)!. I've been to Prague 4 times before and had seen most of the places before multiple times, so I booked the 1-hour trip mostly for the benefit of my friends I was showing Prague to. And I am so glad I did! We had a wonderful time, a company of four, and everyone enjoyed every minute of it. I think we were lucky to do the evening tour and enjoyed spectacular sunset views over the river, as well as the lights of the city. Seeing Prague on a Segway added another dimension to the experience and I would definitely do it again next time I go. For those who are crowd anxious - don't worry, the route is selected so that you don't drive through the biggest crowds and is very risk-free.Специално за българи: задължително попитайте за Нели! Бяхме много изненадани, че осигуриха гид, който говори български (а българският на Нели наистина е много добър). Освен това е изключително приветлива и усмихната, отнесе се с нас с много търпение и внимание.

Very friendly, helpful staff and a great way to see the sights. A group of us decided to try Segway and found this place just off the main Old Town Square. After a bit of bartering the boss gave us a really good deal. We only did the 30 minute tour but it was fantastic. Our guide was Kirill, a young guy who was so patient and helpful. He let us practise for about 15 minutes in the back street before we headed out with him into the town. I asked if he could take a few photos for us and he was so obliging. He carried my camera with him and took loads of great pictures for us. The tour itself was also interesting as he took us through the Old Town Square then we headed out along the river bank where we managed to get up a bit of speed then on to the Charles university where we were lucky enough to catch a Red Bull Promotion. Kirill really made the experience a fun one and the girls in the office were also fantastic and nothing was too much trouble for any of the team. I can highly recommend this company and would definitely do Segway again as it is a great way to see the sights.

Very pleased. We were four women of over 45 years of age and we had a wonderful experience with this company the guide whose name was Kirill was fantastic and made sure we were taken care of, they could not have been more helpful.

Hands down best way to see Prague!. I was in Prague for 2 days with my brother when we were approached in old town square on our way to go on a bus tour by one of the guys on a segway. We decided that would be more fun than a bus tour so we did the 90 minute segway tour with Konstantine. He was AWESOME!! It was so easy and SO much fun!! Segway is by far the best way to see Prague. You cover so much, you can stop and take pictures and they explain everything of significance that you pass. I hope to make it back to Prague soon and when I do, I'll be doing the 3 hour tour with Konstantine again!!
Fab!. Loved this tour! Great way to see everything! Out tour guide Jeff was great - very knowledgable and made the tour really fun! Definitely recommended, thank you! :)

Awesome experience . I have been on eurosegway tour. It's very good and amazing way to explore city. It was our first time with segway driving, Our guide NELLY was really very supportive and our experience was very good with her. We have taken 1 Hr trip and didn't realized it ended so soon, As we were so involved in our first segway sightseeing. Nelly narrated beautifully various aspects of prague. She was knowledgeable and I would recommend everyone to visit eurosegway and ask Nelly as their guide

An awesome way to see the city. Great way to get to see and know the city, highly recommended to take on the first day of your visit. Our guide was Stanley, he is very knowledgeable, kind and funny.It takes a couple of minutes to get used to the segway, but afterwards you don't want it to stop.

Recommend this to anyone!! . Myself and 4 friends have been interrailing for the past 3 weeks and this activity was definitely the highlight of our trip! Our tour guide Alex was so good to us and helpful throughout the entire 90mins! I would definitely do this again if I got the chance. Great experience whilst taking in the beautiful city of Prague!
Great tour! Stefi, excellent guide. We took this tour with Stefi from Mexico. She was a great guide. My children, 10, 11 and 14 yrs old had so much fun. Thank you

Must do in Prague!. We had a great Easter Weekend in Prague and the 3 hour Segway City Tour was the icing on the cake. Never been on a Segway before but had no trouble finding the right balance. Our tour guide Stanley was not only very knowledgeable about the City and its rich history, he was also fun and very courteous. We certainly recommend him and his company.
Euro Segway Prague Review. Our tour guide was Stanley and we did the 30 minute tour. Stanley was awesome!!! It was extremely fun and a great way to end our visit in Europe.-Alexa, Dana, and Ali

Perfect 1st thing to do in Prague!. We pre booked with Euro after seeing the reviews on TA.We went for the 2 hour tour which was perfect! Our guide was lovely, and gave us lots of information about this beautiful city!! She took us round all of the main areas, and in and out of some great places. We had anticipated being cold, but didn't realise how cold we would be after 2 hours of not moving any limbs - so make sure you wrap up!Very highly recommended!

Great fun and a fab way to see Prague.. We had pre-booked a 1 hour segway tour with Euro segway Prague. Having not been on segway before we were not sure how easy (or not) it would be, but after 5 mins practice it was feeling natural so off we went. Our guide Alex was great and showed us all of the main sights as well as some smaller things and shared lots of interesting facts about the city. Had a fab time and would definitely recommend Euro Segway Prague.

Amazing Segway Tour with Damian!! . Went on the segway tour today with my friend, we got taken out my damian who was extremely fun to be around and told us so much about the city! He was friendly and very happy, always happy to help, my friend fell of her segway so he took her all along the route, damian let us stop and look around the palace. Very reasonable price and SO worth the money!! Would definately come back and do it all again, thank you again to damian again for being a brilliant tour guide! Highly recommended
90 minute tour . Had such an amazing tour around Prague today with Damian, seen some beautiful places, and was so fast getting round the city on the Segway! Defiantly recommend it!
Prague on wheels . Rene knows fluently 5 languages. So he manage to explain everything in portuguese. He took me to the most iconic points of Prague and made our tour very pleasant.

Great experience!. We had a tour with a guide named Rene.The tour was very fun and interesting, the segeway were easy to control.Rene had a lot of knowlage about Prague history, and very kind to us.Ask for Rene :)

Great fun, even for Segwey beginners. We did the 60 minute tour this morning with Stanley. The tour starts with a quick "how to" to demonstrate how to use the Segweys be for setting off. Stanley was a brilliant tour guide and eased our concerns. I was rather cautious and Stanley regularly checked in and tried to lift my confidence. We covered lots in our 60 minute tour, taking in both the Old and New Town. Stanley was also able to give recommendations of other places to visit afterwards. We thoroughly enjoyed the experience and would highly recommend it to anyone visiting!

Great way to see a beautiful city!. I would highly recommend this segway tour. We did one for 90 minutes & we got to see so much. Our tour guide was called Stanley and he was so young yet had so much knowledge! He made us feel really comfortable and showed us so much!

Great tour, thanks George and Geoffrey.. First time in Prague and after being approached by George on the first day at the main square we decided to book it up for the following day. Geoffrey was our guide for the 90 minute tour and we enjoyed every moment of it. The company also runs Segway tours in Barcelona, will definitely be booking with Euro Segway for our next visit to Barcelona. Huge thanks to George and Geoffrey. Highly recommended.

Fun :). Easier to pick up than we'd expected! We just turned up at their office and asked if we could take a couple of segways out for around half an hour. We negotiated our price (I recommend you do this since it seemed pretty flexible...), had a quick lesson and then went on a ride around Prague! We really enjoyed it- if you don't want to commit to a full 2/3hr segway tour of prague this is a good way of trying them out without getting ripped off (better than going with the people hanging around on old town square).

Just right. We were approached by George in the old town square and given a great rate for the 90 min tour. We decided to think about it so he gave us his number and some key local info. George was so friendly we decided to go with them, booking was easy and took the tour the next day. Our guide Jeffery was very pleasant and informative during the tour we visited some key sights and Jeffery would discuss some important facts about the area. Not a history lesson, just interesting facts. What a great time I will recommend this to anyone going to Prague. Thanks to both guys for making this so enjoyable

Quick and easy to get around in Prague . Very fun and quick way to get a good picture of the whole city. We took a tour for 90 minutes and our guide Damian (+420773869714) was very good and helpful. He had a lot of knowledge of Prague and we learnt a lot of things that we would've missed if he didn't tell us! It is a very touristy thing to do but the second day we knew exactly where to go. It was the first time on a Segway and it was a bit hard in the start but you get a hold of it pretty fast. Enjoy!
Value for money. I was given a great tour by Dimien on 19/2/2016A very knowledgeable guide with great info.I highly recommend this tour company

Great experience. We were approached by George in the square who offered us a great deal on the 90 minute tour, which we took on the following day. Our guide was Alex who gave us a fantastic tour, very informative and great fun. Both George and Alex were extremely friendly, will definitely recommend to any of our friends that are going to Prague. Thanks George and Alex

Fantastic segway tour! . We had Rene as our guide and he was excellent. Gave us some time to practice before we started and made us feel comfortable on the segways - even when I fell off! He gave a brilliant tour around the sights of Prague and told us some interesting stories. Lovely tour overall, and Rene was just a lovely tour guide :) would recommend! Was 700czk each for 1hr.

Wish I could do it again! . Me and my partner really wanted to take a Segway tour as you are bombarded by them in the centre of Prague. We found that we were bombarded with so many different people giving their flyers and offers for their Segway company but we were impressed by George. He definitely persuaded us and was good to see someone from England who could relate to us. He was lovely, funny and realistic. We were guided by Alex who was a great teacher and made the experience oh so fun. We were so upset when our time had finished and we had to give back the segways. I recommend everyone to give it a go!! And if you can, find George!!
So worth it!! . We had Kinill as our instructor and had such a good time!! We did 60 mins and wish we had done more!! Segways are so much fun!! You get to see the whole city too!! ❤️

Amazing experience. Super nice people that work there. They knew lots of history or would take you around just for fun to see the city. Great way to see the city quickly! Mark was our tour guide and he was super fun and made it an amazing experience. Great prices

Thanks George and Alex, Segway was great!. We were talked into this by lovely friendly George in the main square. Gran is 73, first time on Segway for us all. Alex took us on a 30 minute tour. Fantastic, a highlight of our holiday! Thanks George and Alex!

Good tour. Our guide was friendly and we had a good tour. I recommend going on this tour. We were approached by a guy in old town square who worked for the company and he gave us a better deal that's offered in the brochure. We played for the 2 hour tour but got the one hour price. 1300czk each I think.

Best way to see Prague. First time on a segway, and loved it. Alex, our tour guide was friendly, knowledgeable and immediately made us feel at ease.The segway is easy to manoeuvre and we saw all the sights. On hindsight we maybe should have done this on our first day rather than the last-it certainly beats walking!!

Perfect way to visit Prague. Centrally located, professional, and helpful. We had a great time on our Segway tour - we did the 90 minute tour and it was perfect to get an overview of the city. We went in the morning before everything got too crowded which also made it easier.

Super Segway & Guide Rene D. First time on Segway. Was Taught well by Rene D. What a great way to tour a city. I took the Hour tour, saw the Jewish Quarter, then crossed over the River and saw lots of Sculptures & the John Lennon wall amongst others. Rene gave a explanation of the places and things we saw. Some not in the guide books. So a great experience. I would highly recommend doing this tour. I did this tour solo, brilliant. I would also recommend doing a longer one if the weather is okay. Next time thats what I will do. Great change from Walking everywhere :)

Stanley was great. Best Segway tour in the city, nice tour guides and showed us everything we wanted to see. Think his name was Stanley but he was great, knew a lot about the city and had good banter.

Good fun . Really good experience. Had hour and a half tour on a cold January day which was more than enough due to the weather. Our guide,Damien, was really patient and kind and we learned a lot about this beautiful city. Would recommend this experience to friends.

90 min Segway tour. Just finished our 90 min tour of Prague City Centre and Prague Castle. Fantastic fun!! Very organised with a demonstration before committing to the tour, safety briefing and supplied helmet. We had our own guide Stanley for our party of four. Stanley was great fun showing us how the Segway worked and had great knowledge of the Prague sites. Definitely do it you'll have a great time.
